String.Dest: Victory! {0.SimFirstName}'s team delivered a clutch performance and won the soccer game!

String.Source: At first I joined out of curiosity. It was exciting! Who wouldn't want magical little buddies that help you out with life? But lately they're... starting to scare me. They get bored so easy. They show up demanding entertainment whenever they feel like it. All the time! They're getting relentless. For years I've been telling myself it's worth it, but now I'm not so sure.
String.Dest: At first I joined out of curiosity. It was exciting! Who wouldn't want magical little buddies that help you out with life? But lately they're... starting to scare me. They get bored so easy. They show up demanding entertainment whenever they feel like it. All the time! They're getting relentless. For years I've been telling myself it's worth it, but now I'm not so sure.

String.Source: I joined because I needed better grades.
String.Dest: I joined because I needed better grades.

String.Source: I joined because I had found myself with an excess of baked goods and needed to offload them fast. I didn't realize at the time this was a long-term commitment type of thing. It's nice community to be a part of, though!
String.Dest: I joined because I had found myself with an excess of baked goods and needed to offload them fast. I didn't realize at the time this was a long-term commitment type of thing. It's nice community to be a part of, though!

String.Source: My family has served the Sprites for generations. It is our duty to protect them and keep them at ease.
String.Dest: My family has served the Sprites for generations. It is our duty to protect them and keep them at ease.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is being visited by a Sprite! Sprites love a good show, so make sure to entertain them with Mischievous, Funny, or Romantic Socials with other Sims. A happy Sprite is a generous Sprite, and {M0.he}{F0.she} certainly wouldn't want to be a bore...
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is being visited by a Sprite! Sprites love a good show, so make sure to entertain them with Mischievous, Funny, or Romantic Socials with other Sims. A happy Sprite is a generous Sprite, and {M0.he}{F0.she} certainly wouldn't want to be a bore...

String.Source: (From Being a Bore to a Sprite Visitor)
String.Dest: (From Being a Bore to a Sprite Visitor)

String.Source: A well-researched and well-written Research Paper is a rare thing. Sort of like a gnome. Helpful but just a little dangerous. Also flammable! Anyways, this one was exceptionally done! {0.SimFirstName} will be compensated with {1.Money}!
String.Dest: A well-researched and well-written Research Paper is a rare thing. Sort of like a gnome. Helpful but just a little dangerous. Also flammable! Anyways, this one was exceptionally done! {0.SimFirstName} will be compensated with {1.Money}!

String.Source: As far as Research Papers go... that one was pretty good! {0.SimFirstName} can actually feel proud. {F0.She'll}{M0.He'll} be compensated a total of {1.Money} for the effort.
String.Dest: As far as Research Papers go... that one was pretty good! {0.SimFirstName} can actually feel proud. {F0.She'll}{M0.He'll} be compensated a total of {1.Money} for the effort.

String.Source: Not all research is equal, and that paper was only 'okay.' The effort was clearly lacking, and, therefore, so will be the pay... {0.SimFirstName} has been paid {1.Money} for {F0.her}{M0.his} work.
String.Dest: Not all research is equal, and that paper was only 'okay.' The effort was clearly lacking, and, therefore, so will be the pay... {0.SimFirstName} has been paid {1.Money} for {F0.her}{M0.his} work.

String.Source: I don't know why you're kicking me out… maybe because of all those weird things I did that one time? Well, it was nice while it lasted. So long!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} received {1.Money} as bribe money, but word got out and now the public knows {0.SimFirstName} has no integrity as a judge. As an embodiment of the legal system, you really should have known that crime doesn't, in fact, pay. This will surely set back your otherwise bright legal career, and it will take a while for the stench of corruption to be washed from your name.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} received {1.Money} as bribe money, but word got out and now the public knows {0.SimFirstName} has no integrity as a judge. As an embodiment of the legal system, you really should have known that crime doesn't, in fact, pay. This will surely set back your otherwise bright legal career, and it will take a while for the stench of corruption to be washed from your name.

String.Source: What better way to learn than from the hands-on, real-life experience of another Sim? The students loved the presentation, and {0.SimFirstName} has been paid for speaking at the University.

String.Dest: Every contribution adds to the Electromagnetic Research Archive Machine's pool of data. We thank you for your part in making ERAM the web of information that it is today. You've received a payment of {0.Money}.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} just acquired {1.SimFirstName} as a client! The firm will be so pleased. As a bonus for gaining new clients to represent, {0.SimFirstName} earned {2.Money}.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} just acquired {1.SimFirstName} as a client! The firm will be so pleased. As a bonus for gaining new clients to represent, {0.SimFirstName} earned {2.Money}.

String.Source: What were you thinking, {1.SimName}, when you cheated on your school work? I'm very disappointed in you!
String.Dest: What were you thinking, {1.SimName}, when you cheated on your school work? I'm very disappointed in you!

String.Source: The power of artificial intelligence is mind blowing, but what negative repercussions come alongside it?
String.Dest: The power of artificial intelligence is mind blowing, but what negative repercussions come alongside it?

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} learned various tips on how to become a better public speaker.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} learned various tips on how to become a better public speaker.

String.Source: The speaker has {0.SimFirstName} pondering what the world will be like when wired technology is no longer relevant.
String.Dest: The speaker has {0.SimFirstName} pondering what the world will be like when wired technology is no longer relevant.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} was moved by the speaker’s passion for eliminating bullying not only in schools, but everywhere else too.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} was moved by the speaker’s passion for eliminating bullying not only in schools, but everywhere else too.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} had heard of the three laws of robotics, but was happy they were able to learn their origins.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} had heard of the three laws of robotics, but was happy they were able to learn their origins.

String.Source: This lecture really highlighted the most important things to focus on when studying for the BAR.
String.Dest: This lecture really highlighted the most important things to focus on when studying for the BAR.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} feels the methods they’ve learned here are going to help improve communication in their relationships.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} feels the methods they’ve learned here are going to help improve communication in their relationships.

String.Source: There was so much information to take in during that lecture. {0.SimFirstName} may have to attend another one to retain everything.
String.Dest: There was so much information to take in during that lecture. {0.SimFirstName} may have to attend another one to retain everything.

String.Source: There are so many moving parts in a trial, maintaining a grasp on all of them is going to take a little more practice.
String.Dest: There are so many moving parts in a trial, maintaining a grasp on all of them is going to take a little more practice.

String.Source: Law regarding business sure seems complex. {0.SimFirstName} understands why lawyers can specialize in this topic alone.
String.Dest: Law regarding business sure seems complex. {0.SimFirstName} understands why lawyers can specialize in this topic alone.

String.Source: Seeing students adapt to the ever evolving technology being used to help them learn was intriguing.
String.Dest: Seeing students adapt to the ever evolving technology being used to help them learn was intriguing.

String.Source: The technological advances that games have brought to learning are astounding. Imagine what educational games will be like in another 10 years.
String.Dest: The technological advances that games have brought to learning are astounding. Imagine what educational games will be like in another 10 years.

String.Source: Facial recognition software is becoming very reliable, the speaker showed examples of how so on stage.
String.Dest: Facial recognition software is becoming very reliable, the speaker showed examples of how so on stage.

String.Source: Learning about the manipulation of atoms and molecules was extremely fascinating!
String.Dest: Learning about the manipulation of atoms and molecules was extremely fascinating!

String.Source: Who knew facilitating yourself as a role model in the classroom would make such a strong impression to the individuals you are teaching.
String.Dest: Who knew facilitating yourself as a role model in the classroom would make such a strong impression to the individuals you are teaching.

String.Source: The speaker was well informed and {0.SimFirstName} feels exponentially more informed about federal law.
String.Dest: The speaker was well informed and {0.SimFirstName} feels exponentially more informed about federal law.

String.Source: The stress of educating children for some various paths in life seems intense.
String.Dest: The stress of educating children for some various paths in life seems intense.

String.Source: Although the speaker initially looked a bit nervous on stage, they ended up feeling much more comfortable by the end.
String.Dest: Although the speaker initially looked a bit nervous on stage, they ended up feeling much more comfortable by the end.

String.Source: Emotions tend to run high in civil law cases, the evidence was clear from what was taught today.
String.Dest: Emotions tend to run high in civil law cases, the evidence was clear from what was taught today.

String.Source: The speaker didn’t seem very prepared for this topic, maybe next time they’ll have a better presentation.
String.Dest: The speaker didn’t seem very prepared for this topic, maybe next time they’ll have a better presentation.

String.Source: Sensors are great when working properly, but {0.SimFirstName} worries about what happens when they don’t.
String.Dest: Sensors are great when working properly, but {0.SimFirstName} worries about what happens when they don’t.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} realizes how important organization is and starts to ponder the ways they can save time by doing so.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} realizes how important organization is and starts to ponder the ways they can save time by doing so.

String.Source: Wow! It was amazing to learn how influential helping children develop fundamental academic skills early on is.
String.Dest: Wow! It was amazing to learn how influential helping children develop fundamental academic skills early on is.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} wonders how augmented reality will impact their day to day life when they will have access to it.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} wonders how augmented reality will impact their day to day life when they will have access to it.

String.Source: It was interesting to see the various learning styles of students. {0.SimFirstName} will have to keep that in mind when teaching others new things.
String.Dest: It was interesting to see the various learning styles of students. {0.SimFirstName} will have to keep that in mind when teaching others new things.

String.Source: The lecture on laser beam machining captivated {0.SimFirstName}’s interest.
String.Dest: The lecture on laser beam machining captivated {0.SimFirstName}’s interest.

String.Source: Students are evaluated on English and Mathematics very heavily with this testing standard. That must cause a lot of pressure for students.
String.Dest: Students are evaluated on English and Mathematics very heavily with this testing standard. That must cause a lot of pressure for students.

String.Source: The larger the class size the more difficult it becomes to cater to each student.
String.Dest: The larger the class size the more difficult it becomes to cater to each student.

String.Source: On television they make courtrooms swift and action packed, but they actually tend to move at a much slower pace.
String.Dest: On television they make courtrooms swift and action packed, but they actually tend to move at a much slower pace.

String.Source: The judge holds a majority of responsibility in the courtroom, it’s no secret why they refer to them as honorable.
String.Dest: The judge holds a majority of responsibility in the courtroom, it’s no secret why they refer to them as honorable.

String.Source: There are so many different types of lawyers. {0.SimFirstName} wonders how one goes about deciding what path to take.
String.Dest: There are so many different types of lawyers. {0.SimFirstName} wonders how one goes about deciding what path to take.

String.Source: Over the last few years circuit boards have increased heavily in power, it’s exciting to think about what they will be like in a few more.
String.Dest: Over the last few years circuit boards have increased heavily in power, it’s exciting to think about what they will be like in a few more.

String.Source: Imagine a world where wireless networks could be created anywhere.
String.Dest: Imagine a world where wireless networks could be created anywhere.

String.Dest: Intellectual Property may not sound intriguing to some, but the speaker had {0.SimFirstName}’s attention the entire time.

String.Source: The speed and efficiency at which robots are able to perform operations is fascinating.
String.Dest: The speed and efficiency at which robots are able to perform operations is fascinating.

String.Source: This lecture interested {0.SimFirstName}, they may want to attend another one.
String.Dest: This lecture interested {0.SimFirstName}, they may want to attend another one.

String.Dest: Emotions tend to run high during these years of teaching. It must be hard to keep students focused on completing their work.

String.Dest: Being a part of a mock trial is something {0.SimFirstName} will never forget.

String.Source: The University of Britechester holds nearly a millennium of history within its traditional halls of learning. Having taught every type of student from royal to unknown, the university prides itself in educating both minds and morals, molding students into well-rounded and upstanding Sims, ready to enter the world and make a difference.
String.Dest: The University of Britechester holds nearly a millennium of history within its traditional halls of learning. Having taught every type of student from royal to unknown, the university prides itself in educating both minds and morals, molding students into well-rounded and upstanding Sims, ready to enter the world and make a difference.

String.Source: Consistently rated as a premier university, Foxbury Institute boasts a modern campus with impressive facilities and a broad swath of alumni who have emerged as innovative leaders in their respective fields. The university is always looking for students who dare to dream big.
String.Dest: Consistently rated as a premier university, Foxbury Institute boasts a modern campus with impressive facilities and a broad swath of alumni who have emerged as innovative leaders in their respective fields. The university is always looking for students who dare to dream big.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} put in enough work to get a decent grade out of that class, though {M0.he}{F0.she} saw some other students seeming to learn more proactively. Still, {0.SimFirstName} thinks this'll help with {M0.his}{F0.her} final grade.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} turned in {M0.his}{F0.her} homework confidently that class and squeezed every bit of knowledge {M0.he}{F0.she} could out of it. That kind of effort will surely be a great help to {M0.his}{F0.her} final grade in the course.

String.Source: My university academic advisor is calling... should I pick it up?
String.Dest: My university academic advisor is calling... should I pick it up?

String.Source: Computers run the world. So technically, {0.SimFirstName} isn't just a constructor of Computers {F0.she}{M0.he}'s a constructor of our entire lifestyle... Mind-blowing!
String.Dest: Computers run the world. So technically, {0.SimFirstName} isn't just a constructor of Computers {F0.she}{M0.he}'s a constructor of our entire lifestyle... Mind-blowing!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is a biological processor that processes artificial processors. If {0.SimFirstName} processes an artificial processor that has superior processing skills to {F0.her}{M0.his} own, can you actually say that the artificial processor was superior? After all, its superiority is a direct result of {0.SimFirstName}'s own superb processing skills. Food for thought.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is a biological processor that processes artificial processors. If {0.SimFirstName} processes an artificial processor that has superior processing skills to {F0.her}{M0.his} own, can you actually say that the artificial processor was superior? After all, its superiority is a direct result of {0.SimFirstName}'s own superb processing skills. Food for thought.

String.Source: Near the peak of {F0.her}{M0.his} career as a computer engineer, {0.SimFirstName} is soaring beyond the capabilities of consumer electronics, pioneering advancements in robotics and artificial intelligence. One day, {0.SimFirstName} could create a robotic colleague that's willing to put in the same long hours that {F0.she}{M0.he} is!
String.Dest: Near the peak of {F0.her}{M0.his} career as a computer engineer, {0.SimFirstName} is soaring beyond the capabilities of consumer electronics, pioneering advancements in robotics and artificial intelligence. One day, {0.SimFirstName} could create a robotic colleague that's willing to put in the same long hours that {F0.she}{M0.he} is!

String.Source: With a comprehensive knowledge in computer hardware and software, {0.SimFirstName} has the experience to truly innovate and push {F0.her}{M0.his} field forward. With enough processing power and creativity, {0.SimFirstName} could create whole simulated worlds with the digital inhabitants that wouldn't even realize they weren't real!
String.Dest: With a comprehensive knowledge in computer hardware and software, {0.SimFirstName} has the experience to truly innovate and push {F0.her}{M0.his} field forward. With enough processing power and creativity, {0.SimFirstName} could create whole simulated worlds with the digital inhabitants that wouldn't even realize they weren't real!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} couldn't wait for the opportunity to help Sims solve their problems... the trouble is, 90% of problems are solved by "turning it off and on again." {0.SimFirstName} feels like a broken record and, at times, wonders if {F0.she'll}{M0.he'll} ever get to tackle the more important issues that face the world.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} couldn't wait for the opportunity to help Sims solve their problems... the trouble is, 90% of problems are solved by "turning it off and on again." {0.SimFirstName} feels like a broken record and, at times, wonders if {F0.she'll}{M0.he'll} ever get to tackle the more important issues that face the world.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} was really worried that this internship would involve running around to get coffee. Instead, it's felt like one long, endless code review meeting. {F0.She}{M0.He} really wishes someone would bring {F0.her}{M0.him} a coffee.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} was really worried that this internship would involve running around to get coffee. Instead, it's felt like one long, endless code review meeting. {F0.She}{M0.He} really wishes someone would bring {F0.her}{M0.him} a coffee.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} thought that {F0.she}{M0.he} knew all about algorithms but there's nothing like a good apprenticeship to show how little one actually knows. Some days feel like drinking from a firehose while trying to remember basic arithmetic but all the training will be worth it in the end!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} thought that {F0.she}{M0.he} knew all about algorithms but there's nothing like a good apprenticeship to show how little one actually knows. Some days feel like drinking from a firehose while trying to remember basic arithmetic but all the training will be worth it in the end!

String.Source: No longer an apprentice, {0.SimFirstName} was ready for big, important tasks. {F0.She}{M0.He} should have realized what was to come when {F0.her}{M0.his} manager gave {0.SimPronounObjective} a book about needing 10,000 hours of practice to master a skill. That really sums up this stage of {F0.her}{M0.his} career: Endless practice...
String.Dest: No longer an apprentice, {0.SimFirstName} was ready for big, important tasks. {F0.She}{M0.He} should have realized what was to come when {F0.her}{M0.his} manager gave {0.SimPronounObjective} a book about needing 10,000 hours of practice to master a skill. That really sums up this stage of {F0.her}{M0.his} career: Endless practice...

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is finally seeing substantial progress in {F0.her}{M0.his} career opportunities. {F0.She's}{M0.He's} getting assigned to more interesting and important projects, working with well-respected engineers, and receiving the trust and approval of {F0.her}{M0.his} peers. The sky's the limit from here!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is finally seeing substantial progress in {F0.her}{M0.his} career opportunities. {F0.She's}{M0.He's} getting assigned to more interesting and important projects, working with well-respected engineers, and receiving the trust and approval of {F0.her}{M0.his} peers. The sky's the limit from here!

String.Source: After countless hours of seemingly endless coding and paying dues, {0.SimFirstName} has finally reached expert status! The opportunity to mentor new engineers is quite thrilling. Maybe {0.SimFirstName} can even send the rookies on coffee runs!
String.Dest: After countless hours of seemingly endless coding and paying dues, {0.SimFirstName} has finally reached expert status! The opportunity to mentor new engineers is quite thrilling. Maybe {0.SimFirstName} can even send the rookies on coffee runs!

String.Source: The world of Engineering has been a dream for {0.SimFirstName} but {F0.she}{M0.he} has always wished to specialize in mechanical engineering. The design and hands-on aspects of a mechanical focus are what really drives {0.SimFirstName}. Today {F0.she's}{M0.he's} making mechanisms... tomorrow self-aware ROBOTS!
String.Dest: The world of Engineering has been a dream for {0.SimFirstName} but {F0.she}{M0.he} has always wished to specialize in mechanical engineering. The design and hands-on aspects of a mechanical focus are what really drives {0.SimFirstName}. Today {F0.she's}{M0.he's} making mechanisms... tomorrow self-aware ROBOTS!

String.Source: Gears, circuit boards, and scrap metal - oh my! there's artistry that goes into the bits and bobs that make machines work and {0.SimFirstName} gets to explore every intricate detail in {F0.her}{M0.his} current position.
String.Dest: Gears, circuit boards, and scrap metal - oh my! there's artistry that goes into the bits and bobs that make machines work and {0.SimFirstName} gets to explore every intricate detail in {F0.her}{M0.his} current position.

String.Source: No component too complex, no invention too intricate. {0.SimFirstName} sees blueprints in {F0.her}{M0.his} sleep, the creations {F0.she}{M0.he} can create are only limited by {F0.her}{M0.his} imagination. Anything is a possibility when driven by such a brilliant mind!
String.Dest: No component too complex, no invention too intricate. {0.SimFirstName} sees blueprints in {F0.her}{M0.his} sleep, the creations {F0.she}{M0.he} can create are only limited by {F0.her}{M0.his} imagination. Anything is a possibility when driven by such a brilliant mind!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has reached the pinnacle of {F0.her}{M0.his} career as a Mechanical Engineer. As a true Master of Machines, each design or machine created showcases the distinct touch of {0.SimFirstName}'s brilliance.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has reached the pinnacle of {F0.her}{M0.his} career as a Mechanical Engineer. As a true Master of Machines, each design or machine created showcases the distinct touch of {0.SimFirstName}'s brilliance.

String.Source: Play SimScuffle Solo Tournaments or Research SimScuffle Strategies ({0.String})
String.Dest: Play SimScuffle Solo Tournaments or Research SimScuffle Strategies ({0.String})

String.Source: It's time to put your skills to the test! {0.SimFirstName} is now invited to participate in University held SimScuffle matches every Friday and Saturday at 6pm. Be there and support your team!
String.Dest: It's time to put your skills to the test! {0.SimFirstName} is now invited to participate in University held SimScuffle matches every Friday and Saturday at 6pm. Be there and support your team!

String.Source: Play Professional SimScuffle Solo Tournaments or Chat With Teammates on the computer. ({0.String})
String.Dest: Play Professional SimScuffle Solo Tournaments or Chat With Teammates on the computer. ({0.String})

String.Source: All those wrist cramps have paid off, {0.SimFirstName} has become quite the E-Sports regular! Continue to attend SimScuffle Matches and carve your way to glory!
String.Dest: All those wrist cramps have paid off, {0.SimFirstName} has become quite the E-Sports regular! Continue to attend SimScuffle Matches and carve your way to glory!

String.Source: Discuss SimScuffle Strategies, Compliment SimScuffle Skills, or Chat With Teammates on the computer. ({0.String})
String.Dest: Discuss SimScuffle Strategies, Compliment SimScuffle Skills, or Chat With Teammates on the computer. ({0.String})

String.Source: Your teammates look up to you as a shining example of an elite player; well done! You can now summon your e-sports team members anywhere on a whim, like ninjas--but less threatening. Let the lessons learned through your e-sports career carry you through life! Also, don't forget to stretch a little...
String.Dest: Your teammates look up to you as a shining example of an elite player; well done! You can now summon your e-sports team members anywhere on a whim, like ninjas--but less threatening. Let the lessons learned through your e-sports career carry you through life! Also, don't forget to stretch a little...

String.Source: As a Student Services Officer you'll be supporting admissions, helping to organize student events, and doing basic administration work—which includes keeping all of the course information updated. It's a lot to juggle all at once, but manage your time and duties well, and you might start moving up the academic collegiate chain.
String.Dest: As a Student Services Officer you'll be supporting admissions, helping to organize student events, and doing basic administration work—which includes keeping all of the course information updated. It's a lot to juggle all at once, but manage your time and duties well, and you might start moving up the academic collegiate chain.

String.Source: You're now officially the Dean of Admissions. In this role, you administrate all work regarding prospective students and the University's recruitment efforts. You enforce the school's standards, even if that means doing the heartbreaking work of saying 'no' to a lot of promising applicants.
String.Dest: You're now officially the Dean of Admissions. In this role, you administrate all work regarding prospective students and the University's recruitment efforts. You enforce the school's standards, even if that means doing the heartbreaking work of saying 'no' to a lot of promising applicants.

String.Source: It's now up to you to ensure the University runs smoothly. You direct and oversee the educational efforts as well as the graduation requirements of your school. Everything has to be in order, and if it's not... well, the University's name is going to suffer for it.
String.Dest: It's now up to you to ensure the University runs smoothly. You direct and oversee the educational efforts as well as the graduation requirements of your school. Everything has to be in order, and if it's not... well, the University's name is going to suffer for it.

String.Source: As Vice-Chancellor, you're the deputy to the University's Chancellor. You oversee the university's interests on a day-to-day basis, taking on any responsibilities the Chancellor is too busy to handle and overseeing a good chunk of the research being done. Keep garnering respect and one day you might find yourself with a Vice-Chancellor of your own.
String.Dest: As Vice-Chancellor, you're the deputy to the University's Chancellor. You oversee the university's interests on a day-to-day basis, taking on any responsibilities the Chancellor is too busy to handle and overseeing a good chunk of the research being done. Keep garnering respect and one day you might find yourself with a Vice-Chancellor of your own.

String.Source: As the Head Chancellor for your University, you stand for and represent everything that the school is, was, and can be. When the world thinks of your school, they think of you. In this position, you have a unique opportunity to leave a mark on all who pass through your campus before sending them off into the world.
String.Dest: As the Head Chancellor for your University, you stand for and represent everything that the school is, was, and can be. When the world thinks of your school, they think of you. In this position, you have a unique opportunity to leave a mark on all who pass through your campus before sending them off into the world.

String.Source: You're the Substitute Teacher—the stand in when the regular teacher is out. Teach off of lessons plans you didn't create, figure out when students are attempting to get away with shenanigans, and maintain the general order of the classroom. Remember, without you, everything hurtles into chaos.
String.Dest: You're the Substitute Teacher—the stand in when the regular teacher is out. Teach off of lessons plans you didn't create, figure out when students are attempting to get away with shenanigans, and maintain the general order of the classroom. Remember, without you, everything hurtles into chaos.

String.Source: You don't have your own classroom yet, but at least you're in the classroom every day. Assist the regular teacher with their recordkeeping and be sure to enforce the classroom rules. Who is tracking attendance? That seems like a job for you!
String.Dest: You don't have your own classroom yet, but at least you're in the classroom every day. Assist the regular teacher with their recordkeeping and be sure to enforce the classroom rules. Who is tracking attendance? That seems like a job for you!

String.Source: You made it! You're officially a teacher with your own classroom, own students, and own problems. Who knew molding the minds of tomorrow would be quite so difficult—and why is there gum everywhere?! Face the trials of each day head-on and you'll be an experienced teacher before you know it!
String.Dest: You made it! You're officially a teacher with your own classroom, own students, and own problems. Who knew molding the minds of tomorrow would be quite so difficult—and why is there gum everywhere?! Face the trials of each day head-on and you'll be an experienced teacher before you know it!

String.Source: You're who all of the other teachers come to when they need advice, your students respect you, and you have your lesson plans down. Teachers like you are the backbone of the school, and everyone knows it. Keep working hard and you might even be considered for the role of Department Head!
String.Dest: You're who all of the other teachers come to when they need advice, your students respect you, and you have your lesson plans down. Teachers like you are the backbone of the school, and everyone knows it. Keep working hard and you might even be considered for the role of Department Head!

String.Source: All that garnered respect has paid off, and you're now the Department Head. Manage the teaching staff beneath you, allocate financial resources, and take responsibility for the holistic development of all students. Oh, and as if that wasn't enough, remember to keep the school board happy!
String.Dest: All that garnered respect has paid off, and you're now the Department Head. Manage the teaching staff beneath you, allocate financial resources, and take responsibility for the holistic development of all students. Oh, and as if that wasn't enough, remember to keep the school board happy!

String.Source: You're the newest instructor at the University. Not a lot of people respect you yet, you're not part of the tenured staff, and it's clear you have nearly as much to learn as the students themselves. Find your distinct lecture style, keep it fun, and show your peers what you're made of!
String.Dest: You're the newest instructor at the University. Not a lot of people respect you yet, you're not part of the tenured staff, and it's clear you have nearly as much to learn as the students themselves. Find your distinct lecture style, keep it fun, and show your peers what you're made of!

String.Source: As students and staff alike have started to learn your name, the University now depends upon you to be a reliable lecturer. They've noticed that you're exceptionally skilled at transferring information into the minds of your students. Keep engaging students while delivering solid results and the University is bound to bring you on as an official professor soon.
String.Dest: As students and staff alike have started to learn your name, the University now depends upon you to be a reliable lecturer. They've noticed that you're exceptionally skilled at transferring information into the minds of your students. Keep engaging students while delivering solid results and the University is bound to bring you on as an official professor soon.

String.Source: You're officially a professor now... an adjunct professor. They have you splitting your time between two different campuses, but the students and other faculty members definitely know who you are. Be someone they need, and you'll be tenured in no time.
String.Dest: You're officially a professor now... an adjunct professor. They have you splitting your time between two different campuses, but the students and other faculty members definitely know who you are. Be someone they need, and you'll be tenured in no time.

String.Source: This is it—what you've worked for your entire career... a prized position as a Tenured Professor. Focus on both your research for the University and your students and you'll keep everyone happy. It's a lot of work, but you wouldn't expect any less from your students, would you Professor {0.SimLastName}?
String.Dest: This is it—what you've worked for your entire career... a prized position as a Tenured Professor. Focus on both your research for the University and your students and you'll keep everyone happy. It's a lot of work, but you wouldn't expect any less from your students, would you Professor {0.SimLastName}?

String.Source: You're well-known at the university, offered as a shining example to the newer staff, and a favorite professor among the students. Each of your classes fills up early as everyone struggles to get a spot under your tutelage. It makes sense given the accolades you've received over the years. Valued immensely by your employer and those you teach, it seems as if you've reached the peak of your career.
String.Dest: You're well-known at the university, offered as a shining example to the newer staff, and a favorite professor among the students. Each of your classes fills up early as everyone struggles to get a spot under your tutelage. It makes sense given the accolades you've received over the years. Valued immensely by your employer and those you teach, it seems as if you've reached the peak of your career.

String.Source: Play SimScuffle Solo or research SimScuffle strategies. ({0.String})
String.Dest: Play SimScuffle Solo or research SimScuffle strategies. ({0.String})

String.Source: You might consider yourself an elite gamer, but you have to start somewhere. Familiarize yourself with SimScuffle and get to know your teammates; soon your mettle will be tested!
String.Dest: You might consider yourself an elite gamer, but you have to start somewhere. Familiarize yourself with SimScuffle and get to know your teammates; soon your mettle will be tested!

String.Source: You're the highest ranking judge of the highest court of law. Every ruling you make has effects far and wide, and legal precedents you set could outlive you. Judge wisely and uphold justice for all Sims!
String.Dest: You're the highest ranking judge of the highest court of law. Every ruling you make has effects far and wide, and legal precedents you set could outlive you. Judge wisely and uphold justice for all Sims!

String.Source: Smashing gavels, upholding laws, rendering judgments... all equally important parts of the job description.
String.Dest: Smashing gavels, upholding laws, rendering judgments... all equally important parts of the job description.

String.Source: Your occupation, in summation, involves judicial arbitration and presiding over litigation, doling out repudiation or condemnation, and hopefully reaching mediation of conflated legal situations.
String.Dest: Your occupation, in summation, involves judicial arbitration and presiding over litigation, doling out repudiation or condemnation, and hopefully reaching mediation of conflated legal situations.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has been authorized by law to deliver summons, writs, and complaints. It's a lot of errand-running and a lot of delivering unwanted paperwork. {F0.She}{M0.He} just needs to be sure to brush up on {F0.her}{M0.his} door-knocking skills and practice those three important words: "You've been served."
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has been authorized by law to deliver summons, writs, and complaints. It's a lot of errand-running and a lot of delivering unwanted paperwork. {F0.She}{M0.He} just needs to be sure to brush up on {F0.her}{M0.his} door-knocking skills and practice those three important words: "You've been served."

String.Source: Nobody ever said filing paperwork was a fun task, but the firm would totally crumble without the power of proper alphabetization.
String.Dest: Nobody ever said filing paperwork was a fun task, but the firm would totally crumble without the power of proper alphabetization.

String.Source: Your growing legal acumen comes in handy when assisting lawyers with their cases, as well as preparing and handling legal documents.
String.Dest: Your growing legal acumen comes in handy when assisting lawyers with their cases, as well as preparing and handling legal documents.

String.Source: Paralegals get to handle substantive legal work and need to have a deep knowledge of the law. You're closing in on that coveted lawyer position!
String.Dest: Paralegals get to handle substantive legal work and need to have a deep knowledge of the law. You're closing in on that coveted lawyer position!

String.Source: As a budding barrister, your hands are dirty with real court cases and litigation. Your knowledge of courtroom advocacy and ability to prepare cases for trial has been noticed by the higher-ups.
String.Dest: As a budding barrister, your hands are dirty with real court cases and litigation. Your knowledge of courtroom advocacy and ability to prepare cases for trial has been noticed by the higher-ups.

String.Source: A major milestone in your law career—you are officially an attorney-at-law! Provide private citizens and businesses with legal advice and represent them in criminal or civil court trials. Even if you're still second chair, you have an opportunity to watch and learn.
String.Dest: A major milestone in your law career—you are officially an attorney-at-law! Provide private citizens and businesses with legal advice and represent them in criminal or civil court trials. Even if you're still second chair, you have an opportunity to watch and learn.

String.Source: Conducting cases against defendants in court and bringing criminals to justice is your goal. You've attracted the attention of many with your promising record—so you better get some convictions!
String.Dest: Conducting cases against defendants in court and bringing criminals to justice is your goal. You've attracted the attention of many with your promising record—so you better get some convictions!

String.Source: Offer Legal Representation and Obtain New Clients ({0.String})
String.Dest: Offer Legal Representation and Obtain New Clients ({0.String})

String.Source: This is it. You made partner. You're at the helm of the most prestigious law firm in the world. Generating revenue for the firm falls to you, so start bringing in clients. And remember—the more clients you represent the higher your profit-sharing will be!
String.Dest: This is it. You made partner. You're at the helm of the most prestigious law firm in the world. Generating revenue for the firm falls to you, so start bringing in clients. And remember—the more clients you represent the higher your profit-sharing will be!

String.Source: Settlements, complaints, lawsuits. If you want to be a successful litigator, you're going to need the spirit of a crocodile.
String.Dest: Settlements, complaints, lawsuits. If you want to be a successful litigator, you're going to need the spirit of a crocodile.

String.Source: You've flown far and made a reputation for yourself as a private attorney. When clients ask for the best, your name is somewhere towards the top of the list. Make top, and maybe they'll make you a partner!
String.Dest: You've flown far and made a reputation for yourself as a private attorney. When clients ask for the best, your name is somewhere towards the top of the list. Make top, and maybe they'll make you a partner!

String.Source:
You're either really bad or really new. Either way, the team doesn't quite trust you enough to put you on the field. Work hard, practice, and someday you'll be kicking it on the field with your teammates during the big weekend game!
• Soccer games are Fridays and Saturdays at 6pm.
String.Dest:
You're either really bad or really new. Either way, the team doesn't quite trust you enough to put you on the field. Work hard, practice, and someday you'll be kicking it on the field with your teammates during the big weekend game!
• Soccer games are Fridays and Saturdays at 6pm.

String.Source:
You may be a backup, but at least the team trusts you enough to put you in when there's a need! Keep working hard, exhibit good teamwork, and show them you can make your shots. It won't be long before you're out there at the start of the next big game.
• Soccer games are Fridays and Saturdays at 6pm.
String.Dest:
You may be a backup, but at least the team trusts you enough to put you in when there's a need! Keep working hard, exhibit good teamwork, and show them you can make your shots. It won't be long before you're out there at the start of the next big game.
• Soccer games are Fridays and Saturdays at 6pm.

String.Source:
You're considered one of the best players on the team, and the coach plays you at the start of every weekend game. With so much riding on your abilities, don't let the pressure get to you. Keep challenging yourself, and maybe you can become the most valuable player.
• Soccer games are Fridays and Saturdays at 6pm.
String.Dest:
You're considered one of the best players on the team, and the coach plays you at the start of every weekend game. With so much riding on your abilities, don't let the pressure get to you. Keep challenging yourself, and maybe you can become the most valuable player.
• Soccer games are Fridays and Saturdays at 6pm.

String.Source:
You've made it! You're the team's most skilled playmaker! Read the field, control the flow of the big weekend game, and use your intuition and creativity to set your team up for that perfect score. Everyone is depending on you, but you've proven you can handle the challenge.
• Soccer games are Fridays and Saturdays at 6pm.
String.Dest:
You've made it! You're the team's most skilled playmaker! Read the field, control the flow of the big weekend game, and use your intuition and creativity to set your team up for that perfect score. Everyone is depending on you, but you've proven you can handle the challenge.
• Soccer games are Fridays and Saturdays at 6pm.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} will be busy playing Soccer in the middle of this Social Event.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} will be busy playing Soccer in the middle of this Social Event.

String.Source: Interested in playing university soccer? Want the 'team' experience? The cool uniform? The impressive soccer skills? Sign up today! Instead of watching games on Friday and Saturday—you'll be playing them!
String.Dest: Interested in playing university soccer? Want the 'team' experience? The cool uniform? The impressive soccer skills? Sign up today! Instead of watching games on Friday and Saturday—you'll be playing them!

String.Source: Sims pursing a career in university administration will fill a variety of roles, all critical to the success of the larger institution. You don't work directly with the students, but your decisions will impact their entire educational experience and their lives for years to come.
String.Dest: Sims pursing a career in university administration will fill a variety of roles, all critical to the success of the larger institution. You don't work directly with the students, but your decisions will impact their entire educational experience and their lives for years to come.

String.Source: Shape tomorrow's minds with a career in Education. Though, at times, challenging, there are few jobs quite as rewarding.
String.Dest: Shape tomorrow's minds with a career in Education. Though, at times, challenging, there are few jobs quite as rewarding.

String.Source: Pursue a career as a university professor. Run lectures, assist students, research for the university, and, of course, assign grades!
String.Dest: Pursue a career as a university professor. Run lectures, assist students, research for the university, and, of course, assign grades!

String.Source: There are many problems in the world that require modern and creative solutions. Take your love of technology and pursue a career in engineering to solve the world's problems with computers and mechanical gadgetry!
String.Dest: There are many problems in the world that require modern and creative solutions. Take your love of technology and pursue a career in engineering to solve the world's problems with computers and mechanical gadgetry!

String.Source: The future is in the hands of Computer Engineers building worlds within worlds to keep our own chugging along efficiently. Rewards include the Computer Glasses.
String.Dest: The future is in the hands of Computer Engineers building worlds within worlds to keep our own chugging along efficiently. Rewards include the Computer Glasses.

String.Source: It's going to take more than software to bring the world into the 22nd Century. That's where Mechanical Engineering comes in! Rewards include the ExoMech Suit and Helmet.
String.Dest: It's going to take more than software to bring the world into the 22nd Century. That's where Mechanical Engineering comes in! Rewards include the ExoMech Suit and Helmet.

String.Source: Sims who pursue a career in law are in a unique position to help others with their legal problems, champion causes, and further the public good (or not). That fancy paycheck doesn't hurt either!
String.Dest: Sims who pursue a career in law are in a unique position to help others with their legal problems, champion causes, and further the public good (or not). That fancy paycheck doesn't hurt either!

String.Source: Judges preside over court proceedings and conduct trials in an impartial and lawful manner. Armed with a gavel and decked out in judicial robes, they wield constitutional authority.
String.Dest: Judges preside over court proceedings and conduct trials in an impartial and lawful manner. Armed with a gavel and decked out in judicial robes, they wield constitutional authority.

String.Source: Handling legal cases, practicing law in court, and recruiting high profile clients. It's all the name of the game when you're a Private Attorney. Work hard, win your cases, and you might make Partner.
String.Dest: Handling legal cases, practicing law in court, and recruiting high profile clients. It's all the name of the game when you're a Private Attorney. Work hard, win your cases, and you might make Partner.

String.Source: This Sim will need to go to a university class in the middle of this Social Event.
String.Dest: This Sim will need to go to a university class in the middle of this Social Event.

String.Source: Put your gaming skills to the test and become part of an E-Sports competitive team! You can meet with your teammates, or play from the comfort of your own room. Once you've proven your worth, you'll be able to participate in University-held matches every weekend. So, come join the action! You already play videogames all day anyway, right?
String.Dest: Put your gaming skills to the test and become part of an E-Sports competitive team! You can meet with your teammates, or play from the comfort of your own room. Once you've proven your worth, you'll be able to participate in University-held matches every weekend. So, come join the action! You already play videogames all day anyway, right?

String.Source: Stay home and prepare until the last possible second.
String.Dest: Stay home and prepare until the last possible second.

String.Source: I'll be taking out numerous loans.
String.Dest: I'll be taking out numerous loans.

String.Source: My parents are paying for it.
String.Dest: My parents are paying for it.

String.Source: I'll be working while in school.
String.Dest: I'll be working while in school.

String.Source: When thinking of University, the thing I look forward to most is...
String.Dest: When thinking of University, the thing I look forward to most is...

String.Source: The Annual Summer Party is tonight, but exams are in the morning; what do I do?
String.Dest: The Annual Summer Party is tonight, but exams are in the morning; what do I do?

String.Source: Even from a young age I wanted to explore...
String.Dest: Even from a young age I wanted to explore...

String.Source: Spring Break is here! How do I spend my time?
String.Dest: Spring Break is here! How do I spend my time?

String.Source: The cost of university doesn't concern me because...
String.Dest: The cost of university doesn't concern me because...

String.Source: Professor of Archaelogy Franzina Platz unearthed this impressive column near Athens. It was thought to have been a part of an ancient oracle, or part of a really big fence.
String.Dest: Professor of Archaelogy Franzina Platz unearthed this impressive column near Athens. It was thought to have been a part of an ancient oracle, or part of a really big fence.

String.Source: Books are heavy. Ceilings are too! This sturdy yet refined column is strong enough to hold up an entire library, so it's more than qualified to hold up whatever you need. But, sssh! There's no need to yell from excitement.
String.Dest: Books are heavy. Ceilings are too! This sturdy yet refined column is strong enough to hold up an entire library, so it's more than qualified to hold up whatever you need. But, sssh! There's no need to yell from excitement.

String.Source: Celebrate the blessings of the Sprites with a congregation of gift-giving and mirth. Learn whether you're in good favor with the Sprites - or if they're feeling neglected.
String.Dest: Celebrate the blessings of the Sprites with a congregation of gift-giving and mirth. Learn whether you're in good favor with the Sprites - or if they're feeling neglected.

String.Source: The Brainiacs have put their heads together and come to the conclusion that they need a break from studying.
String.Dest: The Brainiacs have put their heads together and come to the conclusion that they need a break from studying.

String.Source: What better way to get inspired than with a tasty juice cocktail and some good company? The Art Society has a regular Bar Night where they can socialize and discuss their favorite art.
String.Dest: What better way to get inspired than with a tasty juice cocktail and some good company? The Art Society has a regular Bar Night where they can socialize and discuss their favorite art.

String.Source: After much heated discussion, The Debate Guild finally settled on where to go for drinks.
String.Dest: After much heated discussion, The Debate Guild finally settled on where to go for drinks.

String.Source: Who likes juice? FOXBURY LIKES JUICE! Who likes to mingle? FOXBURY LIKES TO MINGLE! Join the party at Foxbury Spirit Squad's Bar Night! Woo!
String.Dest: Who likes juice? FOXBURY LIKES JUICE! Who likes to mingle? FOXBURY LIKES TO MINGLE! Join the party at Foxbury Spirit Squad's Bar Night! Woo!

String.Source: Win or lose, the Britechester Spirit Corps is meeting at the bar to celebrate the big game!
String.Dest: Win or lose, the Britechester Spirit Corps is meeting at the bar to celebrate the big game!

String.Source: The brilliance of inventing can be exhausting. The mind needs time to recharge. That's why they have Bot Savants' Bar Night.
String.Dest: The brilliance of inventing can be exhausting. The mind needs time to recharge. That's why they have Bot Savants' Bar Night.

String.Source: Why party when you could study instead? The Brainiacs meet in the Library for their Study Session most days of the week where they can discuss upcoming tests and project ideas. If you really want to get ahead, ride with The Brainiacs.
String.Dest: Why party when you could study instead? The Brainiacs meet in the Library for their Study Session most days of the week where they can discuss upcoming tests and project ideas. If you really want to get ahead, ride with The Brainiacs.

String.Source: Every Saturday at sunrise, The Debate Guild meets for a ruthless battle of wits. It's a dirty and ferocious brawl of Your-Word-Against-Mine. Only one master of convincement shall be named Champion. Go verbose or GO HOME.
String.Dest: Every Saturday at sunrise, The Debate Guild meets for a ruthless battle of wits. It's a dirty and ferocious brawl of Your-Word-Against-Mine. Only one master of convincement shall be named Champion. Go verbose or GO HOME.

String.Source: Get your Debate pants on, people. It's time for the Debate Guild's Debate Showdown out on the UBrite Quad!
String.Dest: Get your Debate pants on, people. It's time for the Debate Guild's Debate Showdown out on the UBrite Quad!

String.Source: Celebrate the art of the human form and enjoy some fresh air while you're at it! All artists are welcome; masters and novices alike. Share techniques, take in the scenery, get inspired! Figure painting subject included.
String.Dest: Celebrate the art of the human form and enjoy some fresh air while you're at it! All artists are welcome; masters and novices alike. Share techniques, take in the scenery, get inspired! Figure painting subject included.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}'s Utili-Bot was chosen as the Winner of this week's Utili-Bot Contest! What a masterful specimen of scrap metal!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}'s Utili-Bot was chosen as the Winner of this week's Utili-Bot Contest! What a masterful specimen of scrap metal!

String.Source: The Utili-Bot Contest has come to a close. Unfortunately, {0.SimFirstName}'s Utili-Bot was not chosen as the Winner. Better luck next time!
String.Dest: The Utili-Bot Contest has come to a close. Unfortunately, {0.SimFirstName}'s Utili-Bot was not chosen as the Winner. Better luck next time!

String.Source: The Bot Savants are holding their Utili-Bot Contest on the Foxbury Quad right now! Go check it out!
String.Dest: The Bot Savants are holding their Utili-Bot Contest on the Foxbury Quad right now! Go check it out!

String.Source: Is your Utili-Bot the absolute best bot? But nobody knows it but you? Enter the Utili-Bot Contest on the Foxbury Quad to showcase your contraptions! Here you can get a chance at being named Bot Master. Until next week, at least...
String.Dest: Is your Utili-Bot the absolute best bot? But nobody knows it but you? Enter the Utili-Bot Contest on the Foxbury Quad to showcase your contraptions! Here you can get a chance at being named Bot Master. Until next week, at least...

String.Source: Keg Stands! Juice Pong! STREAKING! This is university at its finest. As tradition insists, no home game would be complete without a righteous pre-game bash outside the Foxbury Sports Arena.
String.Dest: Keg Stands! Juice Pong! STREAKING! This is university at its finest. As tradition insists, no home game would be complete without a righteous pre-game bash outside the Foxbury Sports Arena.

String.Source: School Spirit Day is happening at the Foxbury Campus. Stop by and join in the cheer!
String.Dest: School Spirit Day is happening at the Foxbury Campus. Stop by and join in the cheer!

String.Source: Enjoy a nice Saturday on the Quad with The Foxbury Spirit Squad. Hey, that rhymed. Anyway, School Spirit Day is where students can bop around the Soccer Ball or just kick back with everyone's favorite Mascot, Lobster Larry.
String.Dest: Enjoy a nice Saturday on the Quad with The Foxbury Spirit Squad. Hey, that rhymed. Anyway, School Spirit Day is where students can bop around the Soccer Ball or just kick back with everyone's favorite Mascot, Lobster Larry.

String.Source: The Britechester Spirit Corps is having their Creativity Celebration on the Quad right now!
String.Dest: The Britechester Spirit Corps is having their Creativity Celebration on the Quad right now!

String.Source: The Britechester Spirit Corps like to show school spirit the old-fashioned way: with spray paint! Join the fun with dancing, group mural-painting, and some wholesome school cheer. And give the Dragon a high-five while you're at it.
String.Dest: The Britechester Spirit Corps like to show school spirit the old-fashioned way: with spray paint! Join the fun with dancing, group mural-painting, and some wholesome school cheer. And give the Dragon a high-five while you're at it.

String.Source: Get those Foxbury Lobsters shaking in their boots with a raucous rumble of keg stands, juice pong, and slammin' beats. Challenge our home team? They won't know what hit them!
String.Dest: Get those Foxbury Lobsters shaking in their boots with a raucous rumble of keg stands, juice pong, and slammin' beats. Challenge our home team? They won't know what hit them!

String.Source: Want to meet new people? {0.SimFirstName} should consider joining a University Organization! Find out more in the Social Groups Panel (U).
String.Dest: Want to meet new people? {0.SimFirstName} should consider joining a University Organization! Find out more in the Social Groups Panel (U).

String.Source: Sup, {0.SimFirstName}! Your SimScuffle skills are like, scary good. You should drop this whole "college" thing and just play professionally. We'll hook you up and make sure you're taken care of with a nice signing bonus. So, what do you say?
String.Dest: Sup, {0.SimFirstName}! Your SimScuffle skills are like, scary good. You should drop this whole "college" thing and just play professionally. We'll hook you up and make sure you're taken care of with a nice signing bonus. So, what do you say?

String.Source: Hello, this is concerning your upcoming case. When you're deliberating your ruling—if you happened to rule in our favor... we're willing to offer you a hefty sum of money.
String.Dest: Hello, this is concerning your upcoming case. When you're deliberating your ruling—if you happened to rule in our favor... we're willing to offer you a hefty sum of money.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has failed to make an on-time payment towards {F0.her}{M0.his} student loan. {0.SimFirstName} has a remaining balance of {2.Money}. The bank has extended the payment window and stresses that further non-payment will result in consequences.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has failed to make an on-time payment towards {F0.her}{M0.his} student loan. {0.SimFirstName} has a remaining balance of {2.Money}. The bank has extended the payment window and stresses that further non-payment will result in consequences.

String.Source: Uh… hey… so this might be a bad time but I came back to our place and I seem to have… um… locked myself out. Hahaha, silly me. So… could you come home? Like, no rush… but… right now would be good.
String.Dest: Uh… hey… so this might be a bad time but I came back to our place and I seem to have… um… locked myself out. Hahaha, silly me. So… could you come home? Like, no rush… but… right now would be good.

String.Source: E-Sports matches take place every Friday, 6pm at the Ubrite Arena. Tickets can be purchased from the arena at the start of the match.
String.Dest: E-Sports matches take place every Friday, 6pm at the Ubrite Arena. Tickets can be purchased from the arena at the start of the match.

String.Source: E-Sports matches take place every Saturday, 6pm at the Foxbury Arena. Tickets can be purchased from the arena at the start of the match.
String.Dest: E-Sports matches take place every Saturday, 6pm at the Foxbury Arena. Tickets can be purchased from the arena at the start of the match.

String.Source: Soccer games take place every Saturday, 6pm at the Ubrite Arena. Tickets can be purchased from the arena at the start of the match.
String.Dest: Soccer games take place every Saturday, 6pm at the Ubrite Arena. Tickets can be purchased from the arena at the start of the match.

String.Source: Soccer games take place every Friday, 6pm at the Foxbury Arena. Tickets can be purchased from the arena at the start of the match.
String.Dest: Soccer games take place every Friday, 6pm at the Foxbury Arena. Tickets can be purchased from the arena at the start of the match.

String.Source: Oh, {0.SimName}, I'm so very disappointed to hear that you were cheating on your university homework. Are the classes too much for you? Is the homework too hard? Please, take care of yourself. Cheating isn't the answer!
String.Dest: Oh, {0.SimName}, I'm so very disappointed to hear that you were cheating on your university homework. Are the classes too much for you? Is the homework too hard? Please, take care of yourself. Cheating isn't the answer!

String.Source: I got the most disappointing call, {0.SimName}, informing me that you had cheated on one of your final exams. I thought we'd instilled you with better values, but maybe this'll serve as a wake-up call.
String.Dest: I got the most disappointing call, {0.SimName}, informing me that you had cheated on one of your final exams. I thought we'd instilled you with better values, but maybe this'll serve as a wake-up call.

String.Source: Hello {0.SimFirstName}! Your soccer skills are so good... Why waste time in school when you could be playing professionally? We'll sign you to a sizable starting bonus if you quit college and become a pro athlete immediately. You in?
String.Dest: Hello {0.SimFirstName}! Your soccer skills are so good... Why waste time in school when you could be playing professionally? We'll sign you to a sizable starting bonus if you quit college and become a pro athlete immediately. You in?

String.Source: {0.SimName}, I received word from your university that you were caught plagiarizing your term paper. I am very disappointed in you, and I hope you'll do your own work from here on out.
String.Dest: {0.SimName}, I received word from your university that you were caught plagiarizing your term paper. I am very disappointed in you, and I hope you'll do your own work from here on out.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has failed to pay their loans one too many times. The bank has sent a professional to repossess {M0.his}{F0.her} valuable items in payment.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has failed to pay their loans one too many times. The bank has sent a professional to repossess {M0.his}{F0.her} valuable items in payment.

String.Source: The graduation ceremony is about to happen! Would you like to attend the ceremony? Canceling will not affect your Sim's graduation status.
String.Dest: The graduation ceremony is about to happen! Would you like to attend the ceremony? Canceling will not affect your Sim's graduation status.

String.Source: Are you the type who always needs to get the last word in? Then Debate should be easy! You've been arguing all your life, so you're likely already a pro. But a little practice couldn't hurt. Come on down, meet a good opponent, and brush up on your Debate skills.
String.Dest: Are you the type who always needs to get the last word in? Then Debate should be easy! You've been arguing all your life, so you're likely already a pro. But a little practice couldn't hurt. Come on down, meet a good opponent, and brush up on your Debate skills.

String.Source: Who said university would be easy? No stressed student is alone, though! Join the cram session with other students at the commons. The atmosphere is perfect for learning, whether getting ahead or just squeezing in a last bit of studying.
String.Dest: Who said university would be easy? No stressed student is alone, though! Join the cram session with other students at the commons. The atmosphere is perfect for learning, whether getting ahead or just squeezing in a last bit of studying.

String.Source: A mixer night event is starting at the campus's Commons venue. University isn't all about rivalries; sometimes enemies can be friends! Stop by for an evening of camaraderie and fraternization between students and staff from both Foxbury and UBrite.
String.Dest: A mixer night event is starting at the campus's Commons venue. University isn't all about rivalries; sometimes enemies can be friends! Stop by for an evening of camaraderie and fraternization between students and staff from both Foxbury and UBrite.

String.Source: A Tea & Poetry Reading event is starting at the UBrite Commons. The only thing that goes better than tea and sandwiches, is tea and poetry. All are welcome; a relaxing evening awaits!
String.Dest: A Tea & Poetry Reading event is starting at the UBrite Commons. The only thing that goes better than tea and sandwiches, is tea and poetry. All are welcome; a relaxing evening awaits!

String.Source: It's your turn to practice SimScuffle against the hottest hotshot E-Sports players. They're waiting to be challenged at the Foxbury Commons. You know you can beat them, now you just need to show everyone else.
String.Dest: It's your turn to practice SimScuffle against the hottest hotshot E-Sports players. They're waiting to be challenged at the Foxbury Commons. You know you can beat them, now you just need to show everyone else.

String.Source: It's time to build, build, build! That little robot won't make itself. Work with other Bot Savants to make the perfect gadget.
String.Dest: It's time to build, build, build! That little robot won't make itself. Work with other Bot Savants to make the perfect gadget.

String.Source: Looking for an excuse to get some fresh air? This fence's got you covered. Well, not covered since you'd be standing on one side which would normally be covering you, but it will help prevent you from falling off to the other side during your study break.
String.Dest: Looking for an excuse to get some fresh air? This fence's got you covered. Well, not covered since you'd be standing on one side which would normally be covering you, but it will help prevent you from falling off to the other side during your study break.

String.Source: To give a antiqued look to any lot. Sophisticate your space!
String.Dest: To give a antiqued look to any lot. Sophisticate your space!

String.Source: Accent your home with this Britechester original, typical of pubs and places of gathering. Go on!
String.Dest: Accent your home with this Britechester original, typical of pubs and places of gathering. Go on!

String.Source:
Annnd Juice Pong is done! What a fun game!
Game goes to: {1.SimName} with a score of {3.Number}!
Sorry {2.SimName} better luck next time!
Final Score: {3.Number} to {4.Number}
String.Dest:
Annnd Juice Pong is done! What a fun game!
Game goes to: {1.SimName} with a score of {3.Number}!
Sorry {2.SimName} better luck next time!

String.Source: Our architects may have repeated the same intro to structural design course multiple times, but it's only so they could perfect this fine balcony. Carved from native limestone, it's a solid reason to put off doing homework in favor of loitering around outside.
String.Dest: Our architects may have repeated the same intro to structural design course multiple times, but it's only so they could perfect this fine balcony. Carved from native limestone, it's a solid reason to put off doing homework in favor of loitering around outside.

String.Source: I believe it was the philosopher Shirkergaard who said, “If you don’t feel like comprehendin’, ya might as well be elbow bendin”. Well, the Lollygagger makes the perfect elbow rest for those days when class is in session but you’re not. It’s plenty big for you & 2-3 other slackers from the Frat House to get their Juice on. Now there’s something they don’t teach in school.
String.Dest: I believe it was the philosopher Shirkergaard who said, “If you don’t feel like comprehendin’, ya might as well be elbow bendin”. Well, the Lollygagger makes the perfect elbow rest for those days when class is in session but you’re not. It’s plenty big for you & 2-3 other slackers from the Frat House to get their Juice on. Now there’s something they don’t teach in school.

String.Source: There's one field of study that we could all use more time with -- sleep! Don't daydream during class. Improve your sleep today with this cloud soft double bed, designed to improve sleep quality and comfort. Your brain will thank you!
String.Dest: There's one field of study that we could all use more time with -- sleep! Don't daydream during class. Improve your sleep today with this cloud soft double bed, designed to improve sleep quality and comfort. Your brain will thank you!

String.Source: The college experience! Heavy textbooks, instant noodles, and efficient dorm room furniture to call your own. It can only go up from here, so make sure you've got a decent start!
String.Dest: The college experience! Heavy textbooks, instant noodles, and efficient dorm room furniture to call your own. It can only go up from here, so make sure you've got a decent start!

String.Source: If you've outgrown the classic "throw everything under the bed" method of organization, then perhaps you'd prefer a more sophisticated piece of furniture. This bed still allows you to throw everything under the bed, but in three separate compartments...like an adult!
String.Dest: If you've outgrown the classic "throw everything under the bed" method of organization, then perhaps you'd prefer a more sophisticated piece of furniture. This bed still allows you to throw everything under the bed, but in three separate compartments...like an adult!

String.Source: We can't stop the recurring nightmares of taking tests in your underwear, but we can offer a more comfortable setting to have them in! Let this peaceful bed act as your oasis away from the pressures of education. Give your sleep a full scholarship!
String.Dest: We can't stop the recurring nightmares of taking tests in your underwear, but we can offer a more comfortable setting to have them in! Let this peaceful bed act as your oasis away from the pressures of education. Give your sleep a full scholarship!

String.Source: The Experimental Motivator combines a highly classified olfactory stimulate with electromagnetic pulses to alter the motivations of nearby Sims. The Party Motivator makes nearby Sims feel like the life of the party.
String.Dest: The Experimental Motivator combines a highly classified olfactory stimulate with electromagnetic pulses to alter the motivations of nearby Sims. The Party Motivator makes nearby Sims feel like the life of the party.

String.Source: The Experimental Motivator combines a highly classified olfactory stimulate with electromagnetic pulses to alter the motivations of nearby Sims. The Tidy Motivator motivates nearby Sims to clean.
String.Dest: The Experimental Motivator combines a highly classified olfactory stimulate with electromagnetic pulses to alter the motivations of nearby Sims. The Tidy Motivator motivates nearby Sims to clean.

String.Source: The Experimental Motivator combines a highly classified olfactory stimulate with electromagnetic pulses to alter the motivations of nearby Sims. The Energy Motivator provides an energetic boost to nearby Sims.
String.Dest: The Experimental Motivator combines a highly classified olfactory stimulate with electromagnetic pulses to alter the motivations of nearby Sims. The Energy Motivator provides an energetic boost to nearby Sims.

String.Source: The Experimental Motivator combines a highly classified olfactory stimulate with electromagnetic pulses to alter the motivations of nearby Sims. The Study Motivator motivates nearby Sims to study.
String.Dest: The Experimental Motivator combines a highly classified olfactory stimulate with electromagnetic pulses to alter the motivations of nearby Sims. The Study Motivator motivates nearby Sims to study.

String.Source:
We want you to ride this bicycle We want you to ride this bike We want you to ride it where you like...
Bicycle rides are great to unwind, so forget all your worries and grab a bike. Go around, go to class, so look out for everyone on their bike!
String.Dest:
We want you to ride this bicycle We want you to ride this bike We want you to ride it where you like...
Bicycle rides are great to unwind, so forget all your worries and grab a bike. Go around, go to class, so look out for everyone on their bike!

String.Source:
By: Jing Fen
Knowledge allows a Sim to properly see, analyze, and realize hidden potentials in both word and action. A Sim who can master acquiring and using knowledge is powerful indeed. This book delves deep into such subject matter, making a master of its reader.
String.Dest:
By: Jing Fen
Knowledge allows a Sim to properly see, analyze, and realize hidden potentials in both word and action. A Sim who can master acquiring and using knowledge is powerful indeed. This book delves deep into such subject matter, making a master of its reader.

String.Source: Research & Debate Vol 3: Knowledge is Power
String.Dest: Research & Debate Vol 3: Knowledge is Power

String.Source:
By: Jing Fen
Arm yourself with knowledge and prepare for a battle of wits and charisma! This book covers everything from how to study more efficiently to instructions on how to persuade others to do basic, menial tasks for you. It's not manipulation—it's called 'convincing.'
String.Dest:
By: Jing Fen
Arm yourself with knowledge and prepare for a battle of wits and charisma! This book covers everything from how to study more efficiently to instructions on how to persuade others to do basic, menial tasks for you. It's not manipulation—it's called 'convincing.'

String.Source:
By: Newt C. Speck
So it's finally happening. Sims have cracked the code on intelligent life, creating entities that are like us, but better in every way. This book is mostly self help to assist with collective coping.
String.Dest:
By: Newt C. Speck
So it's finally happening. Sims have cracked the code on intelligent life, creating entities that are like us, but better in every way. This book is mostly self help to assist with collective coping.

String.Source:
By: Newt C. Speck
Bots have rights. At least they should. One of those rights should involve litigation against shoddy workmanship by subpar inventors. A practical young roboticist would protect themselves by reading this book.
String.Dest:
By: Newt C. Speck
Bots have rights. At least they should. One of those rights should involve litigation against shoddy workmanship by subpar inventors. A practical young roboticist would protect themselves by reading this book.

String.Source: Robotics Vol 2: Building a Better Bot
String.Dest: Robotics Vol 2: Building a Better Bot

String.Source: Keep it secret. Keep it safe. It's the team's super secret soccer playbook!
String.Dest: Keep it secret. Keep it safe. It's the team's super secret soccer playbook!

String.Source: Become a Starter on the college soccer team to unlock the Soccer Team Playbook.
String.Dest: Become a Starter on the college soccer team to unlock the Soccer Team Playbook.

String.Source: Study plays or read for fun! It's all about soccer!
String.Dest: Study plays or read for fun! It's all about soccer!

String.Source: So you want to be a bad guy? Well, you have to do good work in this class! The Villainy text book will provide utmost knowledge of how to do things without regard to other Sims - all for your benefit. The world can be yours - get reading!
String.Dest: So you want to be a bad guy? Well, you have to do good work in this class! The Villainy text book will provide utmost knowledge of how to do things without regard to other Sims - all for your benefit. The world can be yours - get reading!

String.Source: Can you REALLY learn drama by reading a course book? Don't be so dramatic - of course you can! Now get studying.
String.Dest: Can you REALLY learn drama by reading a course book? Don't be so dramatic - of course you can! Now get studying.

String.Source: To save you a few Sam’s, we’ve taken this once proud old locker & kinda scraped some of the crud off of it using the latest recycling technology. Now it can stand tall among the other fabulous second hand stuff in your dorm room. And the heavy duty, drop forged steel Book Paladin has plenty of what you want in a bookcase & even some stuff you don’t. Just add books & stuff. (books & stuff not included).
