String.Source: The Book Paladin – by Ramshackle Recyclery
String.Dest: The Book Paladin – by Ramshackle Recyclery

String.Source:
This bookshelf covers the four Cs in bookshelving: Compact, Clean, Customization, and Costumer Focused.
This bookshelf was designed and tested to be a simple and non-intrusive way to store your items - whether they are cubed or not, it doesn't mind at all!
Each cube is designed to provide a comfortable spot to put your book, or items, for easy access while also promoting airflow. To keep that bookshelf looking sharp, the shelves are coated in a rust-resistant paint. As the shelf matures, it becomes more comfortable and easier to move, unless you can't move it... in which we recommend asking for help.
String.Dest:
This bookshelf covers the four Cs in bookshelving: Compact, Clean, Customization, and Costumer Focused.
This bookshelf was designed and tested to be a simple and non-intrusive way to store your items - whether they are cubed or not, it doesn't mind at all!
Each cube is designed to provide a comfortable spot to put your book, or items, for easy access while also promoting airflow. To keep that bookshelf looking sharp, the shelves are coated in a rust-resistant paint. As the shelf matures, it becomes more comfortable and easier to move, unless you can't move it... in which we recommend asking for help.

String.Source: Cube To The Cube Bookshelf Solution
String.Dest: Cube To The Cube Bookshelf Solution

String.Source: Education - the building block of any great nation. Society hinges on its ability to spread information in order to be able to organize itself, set rules, and find ways to progress and evolve. Before the days of posting your latest bowl of spaghetti online for all to marvel at, ancient manuscripts known as books were the medium of choice! And what better way to store these timeless relics of the past then in a bookcase that'll truly make them feel at home. Adorned with an ornate decorative crown, this expertly built piece of furniture would have made the forefathers themselves take a second glance.
String.Dest: Education - the building block of any great nation. Society hinges on its ability to spread information in order to be able to organize itself, set rules, and find ways to progress and evolve. Before the days of posting your latest bowl of spaghetti online for all to marvel at, ancient manuscripts known as books were the medium of choice! And what better way to store these timeless relics of the past then in a bookcase that'll truly make them feel at home. Adorned with an ornate decorative crown, this expertly built piece of furniture would have made the forefathers themselves take a second glance.

String.Source: Not every bookcase houses the ordinary. Inspired by traditional gothic craftsmanship, Mortimer's Secrets bookcase is the ideal place to store all your tomes and grimoires of the less "traditional" nature. With its refined, cathedral-like, accents, plenty of open-air shelving space, and a glass enclosure at the top for your most precious of documents, one cannot deny the almost mystical charm this piece can bring to any home. Word has it that the Alchemist Mortimer himself coats every unit with his own secret snake oil and hogwash lacquer... sounds legit!
String.Dest: Not every bookcase houses the ordinary. Word has it that the Alchemist Mortimer himself coats every unit with his own secret snake oil and hogwash lacquer... sounds legit!

String.Source: One man’s trash is another man’s bookcase. It’s a good thing too because this pipe & cinder block bookcase is trashed. But in a good way. This work of art has plenty of mostly clean space for books & all your other precious junk & such. All at a price to accommodate the starving student. So make your aim to reclaim, & pick up this dumpster delight today - before someone else does.

So make your aim to reclaim, & pick up this dumpster delight today - before someone else does.

String.Source: Trying to figure out exactly what the fine print on your dishwasher's warranty really means? Tired of just hitting that "Accept" button on the dozens of Terms and Conditions documents you must sign on a daily basis? It's time to change that! Renowned lawyer Barry (yep just Barry) has custom picked a vast assortment of legal books and law dictionaries in this ever so stylish mahogany bookcase. Complete with sliding glass covers to keep these judicial gems safe and sound, this is a must have for any aspiring attorney looking to pass that notorious bar exam.

String.Source: Time to get teleported back to the Victorian era with this 3-pot chimney stack. With its sturdy base, you can be certain that this fixture is going nowhere! You may have to dust off the old phone book to find a chimney sweeper in this day and age, but that's a small price to pay to have such an iconic look adorning the roof of your dwelling. You may have to warn good ol' Kris Kringle that he may have to shed a few pounds next time he drops by.
String.Dest: Time to get teleported back to the Victorian era with this 3-pot chimney stack. With its sturdy base, you can be certain that this fixture is going nowhere! You may have to dust off the old phone book to find a chimney sweeper in this day and age, but that's a small price to pay to have such an iconic look adorning the roof of your dwelling. You may have to warn good ol' Kris Kringle that he may have to shed a few pounds next time he drops by.

String.Source: A historical replica of a chimney from the late 1700s. Once displayed at the Britechester historical museum, this antique treasure was lost in a bet during a game of ping pong. Now it can be yours!
String.Dest: A historical replica of a chimney from the late 1700s. Once displayed at the Britechester historical museum, this antique treasure was lost in a bet during a game of ping pong. Now it can be yours!

String.Source: You can watch your lunchtime fantasies become realities as this cute, retro-style apple clock ticks closer to sweet, sweet freedom. String.Source: What does an Electromagnetic Research Archive Machine (ERAM) do?' you ask. Well, it functions not too dissimilarly from a standard computer. Simply access the archives and start learning! ERAM is the perfect tool for any educational foundation to buy in bulk—and we recommend you buy in bulk! After all, when one Sim contributes knowledge to the database, we all benefit. Warning: Over-contributing to ERAM may result in headaches, minor bouts of dizziness, and death.
String.Dest: What does an Electromagnetic Research Archive Machine (ERAM) do?' you ask. Well, it functions not too dissimilarly from a standard computer. Simply access the archives and start learning! ERAM is the perfect tool for any educational foundation to buy in bulk—and we recommend you buy in bulk! After all, when one Sim contributes knowledge to the database, we all benefit. Warning: Over-contributing to ERAM may result in headaches, minor bouts of dizziness, and death.

String.Source: The UoG X19 Athena has more computational power than early space travel guidance computers. When someone else's computer just won't do.

String.Source: New friends are one of higher learning's greatest gifts! However, it can be awkward having new people in your (also new) space. There's nothing more silence-inducing than staring at a blank wall. So, do yourself and your new friends a favor: put stuff on it! That way, when your guests are awkwardly, frantically looking around to make conversation, they'll see your poster, and with a sigh of relief, say "Hey, I like that too." Rejoice.

String.Source: With plenty of space for textbooks, notebooks, three-ring binders, pens and other studying essentials, the LearnWell desk is here for you for every book you read and paper you write. Here at LearnWell, we strive to make products that will propel you through school and help you prove to society that you're a good person due to your education. Get learnin'!
String.Dest: With plenty of space for textbooks, notebooks, three-ring binders, pens and other studying essentials, the LearnWell desk is here for you for every book you read and paper you write. Here at LearnWell, we strive to make products that will propel you through school and help you prove to society that you're a good person due to your education. Get learnin'!

String.Source: No lawyer is complete without a very impressive, big, hulking piece of desk to call their own. It's a fact. A fact you can probably find in this desk in one of many, many books with many, many facts!
String.Dest: No lawyer is complete without a very impressive, big, hulking piece of desk to call their own. It's a fact. A fact you can probably find in this desk in one of many, many books with many, many facts!

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Law career.
String.Dest: Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Law career.

String.Source: Unlocked at level 6 of the Law career.
String.Dest: Unlocked at level 6 of the Law career.

String.Source: This desk isn't messing around. It's going to help teach you something whether you like it or not! With it's sturdy, blocky stature and locked drawers, there's no room for nonsense. This is a classroom, darn it. So you keep your gum-chewing, note-passing, texting, finger-tapping, notebook-doodling business to yourself and PAY ATTENTION. And sit up straight.
String.Dest: This desk isn't messing around. It's going to help teach you something whether you like it or not! With it's sturdy, blocky stature and locked drawers, there's no room for nonsense. This is a classroom, darn it. So you keep your gum-chewing, note-passing, texting, finger-tapping, notebook-doodling business to yourself and PAY ATTENTION. And sit up straight.

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 3 of the Education career.
String.Dest: Unlock by reaching level 3 of the Education career.

String.Source: Unlocked at level 3 of the Education career.
String.Dest: Unlocked at level 3 of the Education career.

String.Source: A step above the ordinary run-of-the-mill classroom doors. No scuff marks here! Only the finest cherry-wood, brass and stone money can buy. Your tuition dollars are hard at work so you can study in peace!
String.Dest: A step above the ordinary run-of-the-mill classroom doors. No scuff marks here! Only the finest cherry-wood, brass and stone money can buy. Your tuition dollars are hard at work so you can study in peace!

String.Source: Guarding the entrance to halls of knowledge and wisdom. This door is also a puzzle, or so it seems. Find your path inside, not only to your dorm or class, but also your mind.
String.Dest: Guarding the entrance to halls of knowledge and wisdom. This door is also a puzzle, or so it seems. Find your path inside, not only to your dorm or class, but also your mind.

String.Source: Classic block design, original from Britechester from the city's age of artistic simplicity. This door reminds you that life is simpler than what you give it credit for, and that if you are blocked while doing homework, that separating things into blocks might help.
String.Dest: Classic block design, original from Britechester from the city's age of artistic simplicity. This door reminds you that life is simpler than what you give it credit for, and that if you are blocked while doing homework, that separating things into blocks might help.

String.Source: If you're trying to keep the noise out, these soundproof doors are just what the librarian ordered. No, really. We get several hundred orders a day for these doors from librarians. EMBRACE PEACE AND QUIET!!!! Order today.
String.Dest: If you're trying to keep the noise out, these soundproof doors are just what the librarian ordered. No, really. We get several hundred orders a day for these doors from librarians. EMBRACE PEACE AND QUIET!!!! Order today.

String.Source: It’s hard to believe that this door is well over 250 years old. Imagine how many student pranks were committed on it in that time all in the name of Tom Foolery. It boggles the mind but every September it looks brand new. But why? Because this door is made of matter and as the Law of Conservation tells us, matter can never be created or destroyed. But it can, however, be refreshed with a damp sponge. It’s the law.
String.Dest: It’s hard to believe that this door is well over 250 years old. Imagine how many student pranks were committed on it in that time all in the name of Tom Foolery. It boggles the mind but every September it looks brand new. But why? Because this door is made of matter and as the Law of Conservation tells us, matter can never be created or destroyed. But it can, however, be refreshed with a damp sponge. It’s the law.

String.Source: The Immortal Portal – by PrankProof Industries
String.Dest: The Immortal Portal – by PrankProof Industries

String.Source: Nothing beats the feeling of coming home to your charming townhouse after a long day’s work. Why not be greeted with this delightfully modest entrance complete with a half-moon window nestled atop the doorway to help get more of that healthy natural light inside. Looks great from the outside, helps brighten up the inside, I believe they call that a win-win!
String.Dest: Nothing beats the feeling of coming home to your charming townhouse after a long day’s work. Why not be greeted with this delightfully modest entrance complete with a half-moon window nestled atop the doorway to help get more of that healthy natural light inside. Looks great from the outside, helps brighten up the inside, I believe they call that a win-win!

String.Source: You were probably too busy partying...ehem, studying in school to remember your first dorm room door, but we recreated it for you! The sturdy frame, whimiscal floral accent, and gentle distressing adds the perfect amount of character to any room.
String.Dest: You were probably too busy partying...ehem, studying in school to remember your first dorm room door, but we recreated it for you! The sturdy frame, whimiscal floral accent, and gentle distressing adds the perfect amount of character to any room.

String.Source: Coming home to a dimly lit foyer can be a straight up bummer. Who wants to arrive to a residence blanketed in darkness as you fumble over your shoes and inevitably step on that one sharp object in the immediate vicinity. With the "Let There Be Light" townhouse door, your dreams of illumination and clarity are a stone's throw away! Framed by two large windows at the top and two sleek windows to each side, your doorway will let all those friendly photons in and really help brighten things up!
String.Dest: Coming home to a dimly lit foyer can be a straight up bummer. Who wants to arrive to a residence blanketed in darkness as you fumble over your shoes and inevitably step on that one sharp object in the immediate vicinity. With the "Let There Be Light" townhouse door, your dreams of illumination and clarity are a stone's throw away! Framed by two large windows at the top and two sleek windows to each side, your doorway will let all those friendly photons in and really help brighten things up!

String.Source: This classic piece was recovered from a yard sale at Foxbury Institute. The previous owner was a sociology student whose thesis was about nudity in society and did lots of hands-on research on the topic. The dresser was barely used and is in excellent condition.
String.Dest: This classic piece was recovered from a yard sale at Foxbury Institute. The previous owner was a sociology student whose thesis was about nudity in society and did lots of hands-on research on the topic. The dresser was barely used and is in excellent condition.

String.Source: You're going to do great things today, and this dresser is going to help you. You're going to get organized, pick out an amazing outfit to wow the world, brush your teeth, go to class, raise your hand, get the question wrong, trip over a stair in front of your crush, come home and be upset that this dresser didn't solve all your problems. But hey, it's got a mirror! And you look good.
String.Dest: You're going to do great things today, and this dresser is going to help you. You're going to get organized, pick out an amazing outfit to wow the world, brush your teeth, go to class, raise your hand, get the question wrong, trip over a stair in front of your crush, come home and be upset that this dresser didn't solve all your problems. But hey, it's got a mirror! And you look good.

String.Source: The boost provided by Power-Sip Classic can increase a Sim's chances at winning video game tournaments.
String.Dest: The boost provided by Power-Sip Classic can increase a Sim's chances at winning video game tournaments.

String.Source: Consuming Power-Sip INFERNO is scientifically proven to increase your odds in video game tournaments!
String.Dest: Consuming Power-Sip INFERNO is scientifically proven to increase your odds in video game tournaments!

String.Source: It's a classic to-go cup of coffee. Mmmm.
String.Dest: It's a classic to-go cup of coffee. Mmmm.

String.Source: A hot drink composed of espresso, drinking chocolate, and milk or cream.
String.Dest: A hot drink composed of espresso, drinking chocolate, and milk or cream.

String.Source: This coffee was brewed in a cezve—which is a traditionally brass or copper handled-pot.
String.Dest: This coffee was brewed in a cezve—which is a traditionally brass or copper handled-pot.

String.Source: Traditionally a short shot of espresso coffee made with the normal amount of ground coffee but extracted with about half the amount of water in the same amount of time by using a finer grind.
String.Dest: Traditionally a short shot of espresso coffee made with the normal amount of ground coffee but extracted with about half the amount of water in the same amount of time by using a finer grind.

String.Source: A good matcha will not taste bitter at all; there will be a slightly sweet taste.
String.Dest: A good matcha will not taste bitter at all; there will be a slightly sweet taste.

String.Source: Sippin' on Blue Raspberry; all's right in the world.
String.Dest: Sippin' on Blue Raspberry; all's right in the world.

String.Source: This passion fruit is making me flirty!
String.Dest: This passion fruit is making me flirty!

String.Source: It's a game piece! It's a juice receptacle! It's maybe the most important invention in Sim history!
String.Dest: It's a game piece! It's a juice receptacle! It's maybe the most important invention in Sim history!

String.Source: Just a little taste of this purple drink is enough to make a Sim playful.
String.Dest: Just a little taste of this purple drink is enough to make a Sim playful.

String.Source: Clemens F. Stokes was one of Britechester's first students. Stokes came from a wealthy family of aristocrats who constantly competed with the Waggledorf family. At the turn of the century, the two families found themselves in a philanthropic bidding war to see whose name could get onto the most university property. This fireplace was a "hot" item, and the Waggledorfs eventually relinquished to Stokes after a vicious croquet match.
String.Dest: Clemens F. Stokes was one of Britechester's first students. Stokes came from a wealthy family of aristocrats who constantly competed with the Waggledorf family. At the turn of the century, the two families found themselves in a philanthropic bidding war to see whose name could get onto the most university property. This fireplace was a "hot" item, and the Waggledorfs eventually relinquished to Stokes after a vicious croquet match.

String.Source: This mini fridge has been handed down through the generations of student to student, held together by the stickers on it's side. It still works well enough, but nobody's quite sure how long that drink has been in there...
String.Dest: This mini fridge has been handed down through the generations of student to student, held together by the stickers on it's side. It still works well enough, but nobody's quite sure how long that drink has been in there...

String.Source: The Sleek n' Steel Mini Fridge is for those that want to ensure that they're able to have the coolest dorm room in the whole university. All those other kids will be jealous of your quick meals hidden away for those midnight snacks.
String.Dest: The Sleek n' Steel Mini Fridge is for those that want to ensure that they're able to have the coolest dorm room in the whole university. All those other kids will be jealous of your quick meals hidden away for those midnight snacks.

String.Source: Servos are generally talented and efficient at cooking, cleaning, and a whole host of other tasks, but don't let the product name fool you, these robots have minds, hearts, and aspirations of their own. It would behoove the Sims around them to keep this in mind.
String.Dest: Servos are generally talented and efficient at cooking, cleaning, and a whole host of other tasks, but don't let the product name fool you, these robots have minds, hearts, and aspirations of their own. It would behoove the Sims around them to keep this in mind.

String.Source: What was once a talking, walking, dancing, hovering, loving system of bolts and circuits has now returned to a state from which another of its kind might find new life.
String.Dest: What was once a talking, walking, dancing, hovering, loving system of bolts and circuits has now returned to a state from which another of its kind might find new life.

String.Source: With knowledge and significance as old as time, this tome is University of Britechester's symbol that represents its connection to the arts. Legend says that if you make an offering, the book might reward you.
String.Dest: With knowledge and significance as old as time, this tome is University of Britechester's symbol that represents its connection to the arts. Legend says that if you make an offering, the book might reward you.

String.Source: The Foxbury Institute symbol of knowledge. It represents science of all things, everything that the Foxbury stands for. Legend has it that if you make offerings to it, the tree might reward you.
String.Dest: The Foxbury Institute symbol of knowledge. It represents science of all things, everything that the Foxbury stands for. Legend has it that if you make offerings to it, the tree might reward you.

Their Pineapple-Lime Juice Keg is a popular juice that'll please anybody and everybody and is sure to leave people smiling.

String.Source:
For when you crave a flavour supreme, SugarFizz has you covered.
Their Supreme Golden Juice Keg is for celebrating those who have hosted amazing juice keg gatherings. Pineapple-Lime Flavour is included! Ideal for celebrating You, yes You! You who has helped in ratcheting up the romance, helped other Sims with confidence, and made people smile and laugh. Go You!

String.Source: Unlocked at Gold Rank for the Keg Party.

String.Source: Honest Abe did all his learning by candlelight & he grew up to be a pretty sharp dude. Imagine all the other righteous stuff he could have done if he’d had the Beacons of Wisdom Lights at study time. Today, The Beacons of Wisdom Lights are installed in hundreds of Hallowed Halls of Higher Learnin’. Including in the LieBerries & Classrumes of my alma mater. Perty luminatin’, huh?
String.Dest: Honest Abe did all his learning by candlelight & he grew up to be a pretty sharp dude. Imagine all the other righteous stuff he could have done if he’d had the Beacons of Wisdom Lights at study time. Today, The Beacons of Wisdom Lights are installed in hundreds of Hallowed Halls of Higher Learnin’. Including in the LieBerries & Classrumes of my alma mater. Perty luminatin’, huh?

String.Source: Beacons of Wisdom – by Seymore Lighting
String.Dest: Beacons of Wisdom – by Seymore Lighting

String.Source: Gone are the days of flaming gas-lamps in the streets, but that doesn't mean the atmosphere has to be any less charming. Let this antique-style wrought iron lampost light your way to evening classes instead! Features solid iron design and two moth-friendly halogen bulbs.
String.Dest: Gone are the days of flaming gas-lamps in the streets, but that doesn't mean the atmosphere has to be any less charming. Let this antique-style wrought iron lampost light your way to evening classes instead! Features solid iron design and two moth-friendly halogen bulbs.

String.Source: Light the Way Lampost - by Seymore Lighting
String.Dest: Light the Way Lampost - by Seymore Lighting

String.Source: This sleek, modern approach to lighting was developed in collaboration with abstract artist Goswin Valentine. Valentine wanted to design a lighting piece that captured society's shift away from mysticism and the occult as it embraces a cold world of technology. The artist performed a six hour spoken word tribute at the campus cafe during the initial lighting ceremony which was met with mixed reviews. Most students call them "those pointy light things."
String.Dest: This sleek, modern approach to lighting was developed in collaboration with abstract artist Goswin Valentine. Valentine wanted to design a lighting piece that captured society's shift away from mysticism and the occult as it embraces a cold world of technology. The artist performed a six hour spoken word tribute at the campus cafe during the initial lighting ceremony which was met with mixed reviews. Most students call them "those pointy light things."

String.Source: Grand Staff Of Light - by Seymore Lighting
String.Dest: Grand Staff Of Light - by Seymore Lighting

String.Source: Wealthy alumnus and croquet enthusiast Edward Waggledorf's great grandfather made his fortune as most old-timey millionaires do: lamps! Great Grandpappy Waggledorf was the biggest lamp baron at the time. This particular lamp was what Waggledorf used to calculate his sales ledgers at night. Hopefully its light will shine fortune on whatever you use it for!
String.Dest: Wealthy alumnus and croquet enthusiast Edward Waggledorf's great grandfather made his fortune as most old-timey millionaires do: lamps! Great Grandpappy Waggledorf was the biggest lamp baron at the time. This particular lamp was what Waggledorf used to calculate his sales ledgers at night. Hopefully its light will shine fortune on whatever you use it for!

String.Source: Sleek, modest, practical and just plain charming, the Lex Light has been a stable of the tabletop lighting scene for decades. Available in a wide array of colorful choices, these fixtures will brighten up anyone’s mood and desk all at once! With its customizable swing arm to adjust height and angle, this desktop pal will guide the way for many lightbulb moments to come!
String.Dest: Sleek, modest, practical and just plain charming, the Lex Light has been a stable of the tabletop lighting scene for decades. Available in a wide array of colorful choices, these fixtures will brighten up anyone’s mood and desk all at once! With its customizable swing arm to adjust height and angle, this desktop pal will guide the way for many lightbulb moments to come!

String.Source: Nothing says modern like brushed metal, sleek lines, and hard edges. Ladies and gents, charge up your flux capacitors, and get yourselves ready for the lighting solution of tomorrow with the Q-Bik tabletop mood light. Featuring a frosted glass enclosure that guarantees a nice diffuse lighting condition, this table lamp will be right at home nestled between your touchscreen robo assistant and your self-lacing shoes... The future is now.
String.Dest: Nothing says modern like brushed metal, sleek lines, and hard edges. Ladies and gents, charge up your flux capacitors, and get yourselves ready for the lighting solution of tomorrow with the Q-Bik tabletop mood light. Featuring a frosted glass enclosure that guarantees a nice diffuse lighting condition, this table lamp will be right at home nestled between your touchscreen robo assistant and your self-lacing shoes... The future is now.

String.Source: Just because you're all grown up and attending a fancy university doesn't mean you can't still have a youthful spirit. This entrancing wall lamp adds whimsy to an otherwise drab, dormy existence. Subtle backlighting provides a glowing statement piece that all your visitors are sure to admire. More importantly, sometimes it's just fun to have big glowing stuff on the wall.
String.Dest: Just because you're all grown up and attending a fancy university doesn't mean you can't still have a youthful spirit. This entrancing wall lamp adds whimsy to an otherwise drab, dormy existence. Subtle backlighting provides a glowing statement piece that all your visitors are sure to admire. More importantly, sometimes it's just fun to have big glowing stuff on the wall.

String.Source: Circle Circle Dot Dot Wall Lamp
String.Dest: Circle Circle Dot Dot Wall Lamp

String.Source:
Order it monogrammed, in other colors, however we have it available! Enjoy mail delivery right by your door, or in the designated space... that is hopefully safe! This mailbox will survive anything and everything! But don't take our word for it, trust our satisfied costumers. Take a look at this review by Becky, a certified unbiased costumer:
"I have used this mailbox for 6 years now as the primary location for my business mail order and as my email forwarding. It is perfect! 10/10 will use again, well I kinda have to though, but I use it everyday! For realsies!"
String.Dest:
Order it monogrammed, in other colors, however we have it available! Enjoy mail delivery right by your door, or in the designated space... that is hopefully safe! This mailbox will survive anything and everything! But don't take our word for it, trust our satisfied costumers. Take a look at this review by Becky, a certified unbiased costumer:
"I have used this mailbox for 6 years now as the primary location for my business mail order and as my email forwarding. It is perfect! 10/10 will use again, well I kinda have to though, but I use it everyday! For realsies!"

String.Source: What's on the Menu? Well, you can have anything with Fish on it. There is pan fried, deep fried, stir-fried. There is Fish Hand Pie, Chip Butty, Fish And Chips, Fish Sandwich. And for those days you wouldn't want fish, there is also some delicious Sausage rolls and mushy peas, a British delight! That- that's about it.
String.Dest: What's on the Menu? Well, you can have anything with Fish on it. There is pan fried, deep fried, stir-fried. There is Fish Hand Pie, Chip Butty, Fish And Chips, Fish Sandwich. And for those days you wouldn't want fish, there is also some delicious Sausage rolls and mushy peas, a British delight! That- that's about it.

String.Source: This coffee cart has long protected the University of Britechester's students from their sleep deprived states! Also, snacks. University Students love snacks.
String.Dest: This coffee cart has long protected the University of Britechester's students from their sleep deprived states! Also, snacks. University Students love snacks.

String.Source: This coffee cart has long protected the Foxbury Institute's students from their sleep deprived states! Also, snacks. University Students love snacks.
String.Dest: This coffee cart has long protected the Foxbury Institute's students from their sleep deprived states! Also, snacks. University Students love snacks.

String.Source: Low-key casual and relaxed direct to costumer venue to Mediterranean delights. Sample a variety of kebab inspired dishes for on the go, or a study break! Ask about our Tabbouleh, best in town!
String.Dest: Low-key casual and relaxed direct to costumer venue to Mediterranean delights. Sample a variety of kebab inspired dishes for on the go, or a study break! Ask about our Tabbouleh, best in town!

String.Source:
Head to Tam Tam's for some pizza and take away! The perfect weekday lunch (dinner?) or quick snack when you haven't got time to sit down and dine. Grab two slices (because at Tam's we don't serve just one!), or a whole pizza pie. Flavors include combinations that Tam Tam's got inspired from his travels around the world. Every flavor has a story, so stay a while and listen.
Don't forget to ask about our specials!
String.Dest:
Head to Tam Tam's for some pizza and take away! The perfect weekday lunch (dinner?) or quick snack when you haven't got time to sit down and dine. Grab two slices (because at Tam's we don't serve just one!), or a whole pizza pie. Flavors include combinations that Tam Tam's got inspired from his travels around the world. Every flavor has a story, so stay a while and listen.
Don't forget to ask about our specials!

String.Source: Tam Tam's More Than One Slice - Pizza Pop Up

String.Dest: The Mechanism is a crucial crafting material used to create Utili-Bots, Servos, and more.

String.Source: The ExoMech Suit was built to help the body focus on physical tasks. The suit is particularly helpful when doing anything involving Fitness and Handiness skill.
String.Dest: The ExoMech Suit was built to help the body focus on physical tasks. The suit is particularly helpful when doing anything involving Fitness and Handiness skill.

String.Source: The ExoMech Helmet was built to help the mind focus on mental tasks. The helmet is particularly helpful when doing anything involving Logic and Robotics skill.
String.Dest: The ExoMech Helmet was built to help the mind focus on mental tasks. The helmet is particularly helpful when doing anything involving Logic and Robotics skill.

String.Source: Kim Mik, mirror extraordinaire, knows you can handle the truth and The Whole Truth delivers just that. What you get is a full-length mirror with tons of surface space so you can admire your latest fashion win in its entire glory. Plenty of surface area means you can go crazy and make it your own with your own stickers or decals. If that pristine, clean look is more your style, keep it bare and bask in the glory that is your unobstructed reflection. Now who's the fairest of them all?
String.Dest: Kim Mik, mirror extraordinaire, knows you can handle the truth and The Whole Truth delivers just that. What you get is a full-length mirror with tons of surface space so you can admire your latest fashion win in its entire glory. Plenty of surface area means you can go crazy and make it your own with your own stickers or decals. If that pristine, clean look is more your style, keep it bare and bask in the glory that is your unobstructed reflection. Now who's the fairest of them all?

String.Source: The Whole Truth - By Kim Mik
String.Dest: The Whole Truth - By Kim Mik

String.Source: Unleash your inner artist with Rob Russ' Happy Little Easel! Create marvelous landscapes with white tipped mountain ranges and maybe one or two babbling brooks. Want to add a joyful little shrub down there in the corner? You go right ahead; it'll be our little secret! Now if only there were some kind of show that could help me understand what this knife they included in my paint kit is for...

String.Source:
Legend in Britechester, McFreely Wheely left his mark in the sports scene in the city. His superior Underspins and Topspins helped him win more championships that he can count. This table right here is the table he played his last championship for the University of Britechester. Of course he won that one as well!
This is a piece of history, and some say that if you play on this table, you can too win any match. Good Luck!

String.Source: Sleek, chic, and inexpensive potted plant to adorn any dorm situation you would find yourself in. Dainty plants potted in a minimal chic concrete pot can help a room look put together. There is nothing wrong to add a little green without clashing with your style.
String.Dest: Sleek, chic, and inexpensive potted plant to adorn any dorm situation you would find yourself in. Dainty plants potted in a minimal chic concrete pot can help a room look put together. There is nothing wrong to add a little green without clashing with your style.

String.Source: I started with a basic little green one, and some small ones as well, got tiny little pots for them to live in. For my very first succulent, I had to cut one down to the size that would fit neatly into a little container, I even tried to grab cheap cooking sheets to help until I found the perfect vessels for these precious beings. Some of this pottery smiles at me, some have no faces... nonetheless I hope these little beings planted in these pots grow. -Memories of a Gardener
String.Dest: I started with a basic little green one, and some small ones as well, got tiny little pots for them to live in. For my very first succulent, I had to cut one down to the size that would fit neatly into a little container, I even tried to grab cheap cooking sheets to help until I found the perfect vessels for these precious beings. Some of this pottery smiles at me, some have no faces... nonetheless I hope these little beings planted in these pots grow. -Memories of a Gardener

String.Source: Bright floral bouquet with easy to mount hanging brackets! Doesn't get easier than that... unless you are terrible with some power tools, in which case you may want to get some help so you don't hurt yourself (safety first!) or maybe this could work as a normal potted plant, why not? It also looks like a Pom Pom so you have a bit of school spirit in your lot... right?

String.Source: This planter is earth friendly, made from reclaimed Britechester wood used in recycled pallets. It is complemented by eye catching coats of paint and simple design that will bring some life to any lot. Plants are included and perfectly matched to the planter's color pallete! So we know even though we spruced this planter up, it might look a bit rough, but you know what they say about judging books by looking just at their covers...

String.Source: Welcome to the University of Britechester, we've everything you need right here! Come show your support and help ensure that the other team knows that, clearly, they made bad life choices when it came to which educational institution they chose to fraternize with.

String.Source: Greetings fellow Foxbury Institute classmate. If you'd like to learn more on how to attend one of our many talks on Quantum Astrophysical Time Theories or perhaps deepen your understanding of Advanced Hydrodynamic Physics we encourage you to drop by our booths and we'll be delighted to help facilitate that. You can't miss them, they are the ones made of 61.6% aluminum, 22.9% steel, 12.2% limestone and just a hint of miscellaneous other materials to make it all work together.

If you'd like to learn more on how to attend one of our many talks on Quantum Astrophysical Time Theories or perhaps deepen your understanding of Advanced Hydrodynamic Physics we encourage you to drop by our booths and we'll be delighted to help facilitate that. You can't miss them, they are the ones made of 61.6% aluminum, 22.9% steel, 12.2% limestone and just a hint of miscellaneous other materials to make it all work together.

String.Source:
Built from parts designed for construction jobs, this Robotics Workstation is to be used to build and dismantle projects big and small. No job is trivial for this station!
The station is fully self-contained, and can run on batteries (feature to be implemented soon!). It uses knobs and thingamabobs for precise control. We guarantee its efficacy and reliability, and has been tested in labs for the use of creating small projects and projects with complex motions. Every robotics project built here is in accordance to existing safety standards, we guarantee it!
String.Dest:
Built from parts designed for construction jobs, this Robotics Workstation is to be used to build and dismantle projects big and small. No job is trivial for this station!

We guarantee its efficacy and reliability, and has been tested in labs for the use of creating small projects and projects with complex motions. Every robotics project built here is in accordance to existing safety standards, we guarantee it!

String.Source: Remember when Granny wouldn't let you touch the fine china and instead you had to eat your toaster pastry off a sad, dented plastic plate? Well, you're an adult now, and you can use fine china for whatever you want. Toaster pastries, cheese puffs, meatballs, pizza, pizza with cheese puffs on it. Forget plastic dorm plates. It's fine china time. Sorry, granny.

String.Source: Being underprepared for the gross personal habits of your first roommate can scar you for life. I mean, somethings you just can’t un-see, right? Be prepared for even the groadiest stuff a bunkmate could dish out with the Gross Guard Plus. Not only is it a visual barrier between you and roomie, it’s also a tough physical barrier that protects you from errant toenail projectiles, airborne socks, spitwads and the like.

String.Source: Looking to get more visibility on that big upcoming debate? How about that science fair next week, are people in the know? The standalone Lone-1 floor banner is perfect for whatever the occasion, whatever the location. These little marvels are the perfect communication device if you need to get the word out on the street or circulating through the hallways. Place them in high traffic spots and people will practically be running into them!

String.Source: When it comes to styling at an affordable price, ICYA reigns supreme! Sure, you may have to spend the better part of your evening trying to decipher the wordless instruction manual pictographs as your thumbs scream for sweet relief while you try to jam a circle in a square peg, only to realize that you used the wrong piece about 12 steps back and now have to undo most of the progress you've made. But at ICYA, they know that the journey you take towards assembly helps creates a lasting bond between you and your furniture. What's more, nothing beats the unmistakable feeling of accomplishment that comes once you've fastened that final bolt. The ICYA chest comes in a variety of trendy colors and is great for young and old alike!
String.Dest: When it comes to styling at an affordable price, ICYA reigns supreme! Sure, you may have to spend the better part of your evening trying to decipher the wordless instruction manual pictographs as your thumbs scream for sweet relief while you try to jam a circle in a square peg, only to realize that you used the wrong piece about 12 steps back and now have to undo most of the progress you've made. But at ICYA, they know that the journey you take towards assembly helps creates a lasting bond between you and your furniture. What's more, nothing beats the unmistakable feeling of accomplishment that comes once you've fastened that final bolt. The ICYA chest comes in a variety of trendy colors and is great for young and old alike!

String.Source: The perfect roof window for any academic shut-ins wanting to stare out at the world, or have someone stare back at them and wonder "What's their deal? What are they studying? And why are they always staring out of a window?" WHY?! Ha! The world will never understand you, but at least you can stare at it.

String.Source: Geometry seems useless most of the time unless you're an avid pinball player or a stop sign, but in the case of this dormer window, it's a thing of beauty! From the structure of the window itself to the delicate interlocking diamond pattern, this dormer window is enough to convert even the strongest of geometry haters.

Unless you're one of those shady lawyers in which case, you probably want the dollar store ambulance-chaser section.

String.Source:
Carved in marble, this crest is the original design of the Foxbury Institute Crest. Its flower-like design gives life to the Foxbury's favorite saying - "For All The Science Things!"
At the Foxbury you might see this crest, you might not. But if you do, take a moment and shout to the heavens the famous saying to get into the school spirit.

String.Source: Originally displayed outside the Dean's office, this carved marble crest is inscribed with the school's most notable slogan: Do Your Homework. Unfortunately, the maintenance worker who mounted it did not do their homework, and as a result, the crest was slightly lopsided.

String.Source: Gooooooo Fish! Ah, yes… I still remember my 7 great years at Dorfman State College. We’d sit in the stands & cheer on the Fighting Halibut to their inevitable demise. But it didn’t matter ‘cause we had staunch school spirit. Now you can buy some school spirit of your own with a Banners of Cheer Flag. We might even have one in your school colors. Go (team name here)!

String.Source: This is just about the most versatile bar stool you’ll ever sled down a hill on. Just drag the stool up to the top of Lunch Chucker Hill at the Quad. Tip it on its back. Park your tookas on the backrest & put your feet up on her footrest. As you hurtle down the hill with no regard for school rules or personal safety, you can almost see your college career pass right before your very eyes… Then again, you could just enjoy a nice worry-free hot chocky on it back at the juice bar.

String.Source: Autumn has arrived! Time to put away the beach towel, pack up the cooler, and get thee to a library to reclaim what's left of your brain by stuffing it with knowledge. So, take a seat! This solid-framed, cushiony chair is the perfect spot for you to soak up books, even if you're still fantasizing about your carefree, chair-free summer days. Sigh.

String.Source: A classically sumptuous advancement in the world of fine seatery! This chair will surely be the talk of any casual dorm party or fancy alumni luncheon. Sure, there's other good gossip too, like the dean's latest love interest or the identity of the faculty lunchroom thief, but after those topics, well-made chairs are pretty far up the list.

Perusing a PC, pushing pen on paper, or just picking pickled peppers, the pleasure is palpable pending parking in the Polymer Perch. Possession propels a plain pad into a pretentious palace – pronto! Hmmm, I don’t feel alliterate.

String.Source: No lawyer is complete without a big desk to call their own, but no desk is complete without a chair to call it's own. Unless you have one of those fancy standing desks, but if you have that, you wouldn't be able to slowly, pensively turn your chair to face the window as you pensively think about a case. Or swivel abruptly back around and say "Eureka! I've got it!" to a hopeful client. "Impressive!" your client will reply. "Very impressive."

Or swivel abruptly back around and say "Eureka! I've got it!" to a hopeful client. "Impressive!" your client will reply. "Very impressive."

String.Source: Picture this: it's chilly outside. You're sitting in this chair by the fire, laughing at a funny joke you or your friend told as you grab your mug, wishing this warm and cozy catalogue-worthy moment could last forever. It's so comfy. It's so warm. You have FRIENDS! This fantasy could be your reality... with the right chair!

String.Source: Britechester's first economics professor Franklin Taylor theorized that if furniture and necessities should be "no frills" to allow consumers to spend their money on more important things like index funds and 3 ring binders. (The dude really loved 3 ring binders.) This chair was his own design and fulfilled the basic human need to sit down comfortably, but without the added cost of legs, arms or any "ancillary hoo ha." Form, function and no nonsense!
String.Dest: Britechester's first economics professor Franklin Taylor theorized that if furniture and necessities should be "no frills" to allow consumers to spend their money on more important things like index funds and 3 ring binders. Form, function and no nonsense!

String.Source: Inspired by those unique carved stone head thingies on Eastern Island in the Pacific. You know, the ones you read about in your history class? Well, these stone benches are not at all reminiscent of those ancient wonders in any way. But for cement they are rather comfy to sit on and can be found all over most university grounds. The stone heads? Not so much.

String.Source: Ready for another fireside fantasy? Picture this: you're laughing with your many, many friends by a roaring fire and they're hanging on your every word. Suddenly, your crush puts their arm around you. You snuggle in closer, but then realize they were just trying to pick a fallen leaf out of your hair. They laugh uncomfortably. You laugh uncomfortably and beads of sweat start to form since you've been staring at them for too long. There's too much silence. WHY IS IT SO SILENT? Somebody say something! "Uhhh... this a cool couch right?" you mumble. Good job. No one said this couch could cure social anxiety, but it still looks good.
String.Dest: Ready for another fireside fantasy? Picture this: you're laughing with your many, many friends by a roaring fire and they're hanging on your every word. You laugh uncomfortably and beads of sweat start to form since you've been staring at them for too long. There's too much silence. WHY IS IT SO SILENT? Somebody say something! "Uhhh... this a cool couch right?" you mumble. Good job. No one said this couch could cure social anxiety, but it still looks good.

String.Source: After tireless crash testing, the MiniVan Sofa received a 99 rating by the USSA (University Sofa Safety Administration). That means you’ll feel good about shipping your student off to college with one of these Backseat Beauties for their Dorm. The 3-point safety belts will keep up to 3 students snug in the event that one of them should crash on it during an all-nighter study session. Buckle up when you buckle down.

String.Source: Fancy a little antique charm for your humble abode? Then look no further than this elegant blast from the past. The Gilded Dreams Coffee Table will make everyone think twice about kicking their feet atop this bonafied piece of art from times long past. Here, Rene Sans truly tapped into the essence of old Victorian styling by not only delivering her signature refined table-top inlays, but going above and beyond and delivering a piece of furniture that will withstand the test of time with superior build quality. Your grand-children's grand-children will be passing this down to their young ones as they all try to piece together where this luxe, indestructible table came from.

String.Source: While everyone’s getting around campus cycling, you’re re-cycling in your dorm because you bought the Planks for Nothing coffee table. Since it was hacked together with found wood & paint, it’s ultra-cheap & planet friendly. The wood has that “crustic, just fell off a truck look.” You get to pick the color palette that’s just right for your pallets which will be tastefully applied with that “who cares” style paint job. Big Plus: Everyone will think you just snagged this off the side of the road. That is SO full metal Hipster.

String.Source: Oi! Lookin' for a good ol' fashion pub table for you and yer mates to just unwind and share a couple pints? Well you can thank the luck o' the Irish, as this beaute is the answer to yer prayers! Aye, nothing but happy days ahead friend, Sláinte!

String.Source: Time to gather your fellowship of merry men around this marvel of old-world engineering. Take a giant chunk of wood and treat it the way it was intended to be; no frills, no fuss. This is craftsmanship at its finest. Bulky, reinforced, durable, this is the definition of built to last. Next time you're asked, "What's best in life?" you'll know to answer "Little John's Big Table."

String.Source: Back in those carefree days when everything was still injection molded we truly believed that Polymers were forever. But with all the recycling going on these days plastic may go the way of the Donut. Then what? Is it over? Was it over when Napoleon crossed the Delaware? Heck No! Well, I say plastic is not over until we say it’s over! So, have the greatest night of your life with all your buddies gathered around the Frat House Frolicker Polymer Top Table. I love the smell of molded plastic in the morning. (Please Recycle)
String.Dest: Back in those carefree days when everything was still injection molded we truly believed that Polymers were forever. I love the smell of molded plastic in the morning. (Please Recycle)

String.Source: When it comes to styling at an affordable price, ICYA reigns supreme! Sure, you may have to spend the better part of your evening trying to decipher the wordless instruction manual pictographs as your thumbs scream for sweet relief while you try to jam a circle in a square peg, only to realize that you used the wrong piece about 12 steps back and now have to undo most of the progress you've made. But at ICYA, they know that the journey you take towards assembly helps creates a lasting bond between you and your furniture. What's more, nothing beats the unmistakable feeling of accomplishment that comes once you've fastened that final bolt. This little end table has all the necessities; a flat top, a variety of colors to choose from, as well as a small drawer to store all those extra small assembly parts that you're not quite sure what to do with (are they extras? or did you miss a step?).
String.Dest: When it comes to styling at an affordable price, ICYA reigns supreme! Sure, you may have to spend the better part of your evening trying to decipher the wordless instruction manual pictographs as your thumbs scream for sweet relief while you try to jam a circle in a square peg, only to realize that you used the wrong piece about 12 steps back and now have to undo most of the progress you've made. But at ICYA, they know that the journey you take towards assembly helps creates a lasting bond between you and your furniture. What's more, nothing beats the unmistakable feeling of accomplishment that comes once you've fastened that final bolt. This little end table has all the necessities; a flat top, a variety of colors to choose from, as well as a small drawer to store all those extra small assembly parts that you're not quite sure what to do with (are they extras? or did you miss a step?).

String.Source: In today's world of fast fashion and planned obsolescence, it warms one’s heart to know that there are still pieces of furniture out there that can withstand the test of time. New furniture can sometimes look too pristine and stick out like a sore thumb in a room filled with furniture that you've lived with and enjoyed for years, no one wants that! This previously loved end table comes complete with worn edges and slight scuff marks that show that it has a story to tell and will fit right in! No one's perfect, so why should your furniture be?
String.Dest: In today's world of fast fashion and planned obsolescence, it warms one’s heart to know that there are still pieces of furniture out there that can withstand the test of time. This previously loved end table comes complete with worn edges and slight scuff marks that show that it has a story to tell and will fit right in! No one's perfect, so why should your furniture be?

String.Source: Math. Who needs it? You do! I know it’s hard to remember all that smarty-pants stuff like X+Y= BlaBla.C. But once you know it, it’s your friend for life. So, as educational inspiration Piper Plastics created the Polymer Sine Wave End Table. Shaped like a sine wave, it’ll remind you every day that mastering math will make the world your oyster. If that doesn’t work you can always just put stuff on it.

String.Source: Chute Chute - The Trash Chute can be located, or placed, in one or more buildings. If you want to take out the trash, you need to find out where the trash chutes are, of course! You can do that by going up to each building and standing in the right hand corner, because somehow we find that they are always on the right side, not sure why... but we find it always on the right side. But you can try this yourself to see how true this is. If you get a bit lost, that is okay. When you see one, keep it handy!
