String.Dest: Have we always had the desire to create art? What lies behind our creative urges? This course attempts to answer these questions by looking at the earliest evidence of art.

String.Source: No, this course isn't about deciding what is and isn't art! But as a question that constantly arises in art circles, this course does look into why we seem obsessed with classifying things as art (or not).
String.Dest: No, this course isn't about deciding what is and isn't art! But as a question that constantly arises in art circles, this course does look into why we seem obsessed with classifying things as art (or not).

String.Source: But Is It Art? Critical Thinking About Art
String.Dest: But Is It Art? Critical Thinking About Art

String.Source: The biggest art venue nowadays is the Internet, which means that even the simplest piece can be viewed by more eyes than a painting hanging in a museum a hundred years ago. What does this mean for the world of art?
String.Dest: The biggest art venue nowadays is the Internet, which means that even the simplest piece can be viewed by more eyes than a painting hanging in a museum a hundred years ago. What does this mean for the world of art?

String.Source: It's Viral! When Art Spreads Online
String.Dest: It's Viral! When Art Spreads Online

String.Source: The world of art often intersects with the world of literature, as stories often reference art pieces of the day. How does art function on the page, when the visual element is removed?
String.Dest: The world of art often intersects with the world of literature, as stories often reference art pieces of the day. How does art function on the page, when the visual element is removed?

String.Source: Some of the most famous artists of the modern era display their works on the streets and work in secret. This course explores how these artists work, along with the public reception of their work.
String.Dest: Some of the most famous artists of the modern era display their works on the streets and work in secret. This course explores how these artists work, along with the public reception of their work.

String.Source: Out of the Studio: Art on the Streets
String.Dest: Out of the Studio: Art on the Streets

String.Source: As long as there has been expensive art, there have been forgers. This course looks into the battle between artists and forgers, along with the drawbacks and unlikely benefits of this ongoing tension.
String.Dest: As long as there has been expensive art, there have been forgers. This course looks into the battle between artists and forgers, along with the drawbacks and unlikely benefits of this ongoing tension.

String.Source: Finding the Fakes: a History of Forgery
String.Dest: Finding the Fakes: a History of Forgery

String.Source: As art moved from private work to public exhibitions, being a painter became easier with the privilege of being born to the right parents. This class looks at how these barriers affect art, even today.
String.Dest: As art moved from private work to public exhibitions, being a painter became easier with the privilege of being born to the right parents. This class looks at how these barriers affect art, even today.

String.Source: How did painting become an art form? What materials were used for painting before modern paint became easily available? These questions (and more!) are explored in this course.
String.Dest: How did painting become an art form? What materials were used for painting before modern paint became easily available? These questions (and more!) are explored in this course.

String.Source: What is a piece of art really worth? This class uses some basic economic principles along with a vast history of art sales to attempt to understand how the market for art changes over time.
String.Dest: What is a piece of art really worth? This class uses some basic economic principles along with a vast history of art sales to attempt to understand how the market for art changes over time.

String.Source: How Much? Valuating Art in Today's Economy
String.Dest: How Much? Valuating Art in Today's Economy

String.Source: What does art mean in our modern age? Can we draw a line from historical peer-curated salons to modern social media like Simstagram? This course looks to examine how art has spread in the past, along with what the future may hold.
String.Dest: What does art mean in our modern age? Can we draw a line from historical peer-curated salons to modern social media like Simstagram? This course looks to examine how art has spread in the past, along with what the future may hold.

String.Source: The Spread of Art, from Salons to Online
String.Dest: The Spread of Art, from Salons to Online

String.Source: The classic wisdom of artwork is that the best place for it is on public display in a museum. This course examines the possible benefits of private collections and the interesting role they play in art history.
String.Dest: The classic wisdom of artwork is that the best place for it is on public display in a museum. This course examines the possible benefits of private collections and the interesting role they play in art history.

String.Source: It Belongs in a Museum! Or Does It?
String.Dest: It Belongs in a Museum! Or Does It?

String.Source: With a large amount of art being stored and shown in museums nowadays, curators have a responsibility for what art is available to the public. This course examines this responsibility and the role of museums in the art world.
String.Dest: With a large amount of art being stored and shown in museums nowadays, curators have a responsibility for what art is available to the public. This course examines this responsibility and the role of museums in the art world.

String.Source: Mastering Museums: A Course in Curation
String.Dest: Mastering Museums: A Course in Curation

String.Source: Like putting together a puzzle where every piece looks similar, cells can be used in large numbers to create almost any form of biological life. For students, this serves as an introduction to some of the larger topics explored within the biology degree.
String.Dest: Like putting together a puzzle where every piece looks similar, cells can be used in large numbers to create almost any form of biological life. For students, this serves as an introduction to some of the larger topics explored within the biology degree.

String.Source: As an introduction to the biology degree, this course starts with the mighty cell and uses this biological building block to explore the science of life.
String.Dest: As an introduction to the biology degree, this course starts with the mighty cell and uses this biological building block to explore the science of life.

String.Source: The leg bone's connected to the knee bone. This fun anatomy fact joins 472 others in a course that introduces body basics for all biology students.
String.Dest: The leg bone's connected to the knee bone. This fun anatomy fact joins 472 others in a course that introduces body basics for all biology students.

String.Source: Life began in the water. This course looks at how the liquid environment provided the basis for such life, along with how the changing ratio of water to land has steered the course of life in both.
String.Dest: Life began in the water. This course looks at how the liquid environment provided the basis for such life, along with how the changing ratio of water to land has steered the course of life in both.

String.Source: Dead bodies aren't the only thing worth examining out in the woods! Forest pathology takes tree illness and examines it with an eye for the cause, along with a knowledge of the consequences for ill-maintained forests.
String.Dest: Dead bodies aren't the only thing worth examining out in the woods! Forest pathology takes tree illness and examines it with an eye for the cause, along with a knowledge of the consequences for ill-maintained forests.

String.Source: CSI Tree: Intro to Forest Pathology
String.Dest: CSI Tree: Intro to Forest Pathology

String.Source: The ground we all walk on supports so much life - what makes this planet so suited for this life? How do the different types of earth grow such different plants?
String.Dest: The ground we all walk on supports so much life - what makes this planet so suited for this life? How do the different types of earth grow such different plants?

String.Source: Using the wonder of photosynthesis as a central theme, this class looks in detail at each step of how plants grow in order to better understand how our planet sustains itself in broader terms.
String.Dest: Using the wonder of photosynthesis as a central theme, this class looks in detail at each step of how plants grow in order to better understand how our planet sustains itself in broader terms.

String.Source: We treat animals and plants very differently, but are they so different? This class explores the nature of plants and if we are to consider their feelings or "dreams."
String.Dest: We treat animals and plants very differently, but are they so different? This class explores the nature of plants and if we are to consider their feelings or "dreams."

String.Source: When breaking down nature to its component parts, scientists through history have found startling mathematical properties at the center of biological organisms. Students will explore the connection between the precision of math and the seeming chaos of nature, finding suprising connections.
String.Dest: When breaking down nature to its component parts, scientists through history have found startling mathematical properties at the center of biological organisms. Students will explore the connection between the precision of math and the seeming chaos of nature, finding suprising connections.

String.Source: Zooming into biology at the molecular level, this course reviews the basics of molecular proteins, then delves into more advanced topics on the interactions between biomolecules.
String.Dest: Zooming into biology at the molecular level, this course reviews the basics of molecular proteins, then delves into more advanced topics on the interactions between biomolecules.

String.Source: Genes used to be simple, but with modern innovation, it has become easier than ever to duplicate and modify genetic material. This class asks: what advancements can help future understanding of genes and which ones bring up thorny moral issues?
String.Dest: Genes used to be simple, but with modern innovation, it has become easier than ever to duplicate and modify genetic material. This class asks: what advancements can help future understanding of genes and which ones bring up thorny moral issues?

String.Source: By looking at simple organisms and plants through several generations, this course explores the ways in which genetics can or cannot predict properties of future offspring.
String.Dest: By looking at simple organisms and plants through several generations, this course explores the ways in which genetics can or cannot predict properties of future offspring.

String.Source: A large variety of plants nowadays undergo some sort of genetic manipulation. Students will explore early genetic manipulation techniques and talk about what "natural" means in such an environment.
String.Dest: A large variety of plants nowadays undergo some sort of genetic manipulation. Students will explore early genetic manipulation techniques and talk about what "natural" means in such an environment.

String.Source: Splicing Shoots and Other Genetic Manipulations
String.Dest: Splicing Shoots and Other Genetic Manipulations

String.Source: Trees get sick too! With this introduction to forest pathology, students will learn about what tree health means for the ecosystem at large, as well as ways to maintain healthy wooded environments.
String.Dest: Trees get sick too! With this introduction to forest pathology, students will learn about what tree health means for the ecosystem at large, as well as ways to maintain healthy wooded environments.

String.Source: Forest Pathology: Think of the Trees!
String.Dest: Forest Pathology: Think of the Trees!

String.Source: With a focus on the desert, the tundra, and the rainforest, this course examines the animals that live within each biome, along with the unlikely similarities they all share.
String.Dest: With a focus on the desert, the tundra, and the rainforest, this course examines the animals that live within each biome, along with the unlikely similarities they all share.

String.Source: With an examination of the variety of flowers that flourish on land and sea, students will be able to identify the major ways in which plants support life in these vast but different ecosystems.
String.Dest: With an examination of the variety of flowers that flourish on land and sea, students will be able to identify the major ways in which plants support life in these vast but different ecosystems.

String.Source: By closely examining how a wide variety of organisms give birth, grow, and age, this course hopes to teach students to be able to understand the biological properties important to sustaining life.
String.Dest: By closely examining how a wide variety of organisms give birth, grow, and age, this course hopes to teach students to be able to understand the biological properties important to sustaining life.

String.Source: As life developed the ability to think, organisms developed more and more complex nervous systems. This course looks at what we mean when we say that an organism can think and the less obvious benefits of possessing a nervous system.
String.Dest: As life developed the ability to think, organisms developed more and more complex nervous systems. This course looks at what we mean when we say that an organism can think and the less obvious benefits of possessing a nervous system.

String.Source: What Nerve! An Examination of Nerve Systems
String.Dest: What Nerve! An Examination of Nerve Systems

String.Source: With a deeper look at the defensive systems our bodies have in place to stay healthy, this course builds off of anatomic principles to teach about the natural defenses we all possess, as well as a bit on how our bodies react to different medicines.
String.Dest: With a deeper look at the defensive systems our bodies have in place to stay healthy, this course builds off of anatomic principles to teach about the natural defenses we all possess, as well as a bit on how our bodies react to different medicines.

String.Source: Blood Cell Battle: How Bodies Fight Disease
String.Dest: Blood Cell Battle: How Bodies Fight Disease

String.Source: Our bodies are wonderlands of bone and muscle, criss-crossed by labyrinths of blood vessels and nerves. Advanced Anatomy will delve into how our bodies work and where they differ from body to body.
String.Dest: Our bodies are wonderlands of bone and muscle, criss-crossed by labyrinths of blood vessels and nerves. Advanced Anatomy will delve into how our bodies work and where they differ from body to body.

String.Source: As simpler organisms evolved and mammals became more prevalent, the ways in which early mammals have diversified into the panoply we currently see in the world provides fascinating hints into how life changes and grows in general.
String.Dest: As simpler organisms evolved and mammals became more prevalent, the ways in which early mammals have diversified into the panoply we currently see in the world provides fascinating hints into how life changes and grows in general.

String.Source: Using mathematical models, this course uses historical epidemic data to try to predict how future outbreaks may spread, along with teaching best practices for dealing with such emergencies.
String.Dest: Using mathematical models, this course uses historical epidemic data to try to predict how future outbreaks may spread, along with teaching best practices for dealing with such emergencies.

String.Source: Epidemic: Modeling the Spread of Disease
String.Dest: Epidemic: Modeling the Spread of Disease

String.Source: While biology has always dealt with how bodies function, technology has introduced ways in which bodies themselves are changing. Using nanotechnology as an example, this course looks at what future bodies may contain, how they may function, and why biotechnology may change the way we view our very selves.
String.Dest: While biology has always dealt with how bodies function, technology has introduced ways in which bodies themselves are changing. Using nanotechnology as an example, this course looks at what future bodies may contain, how they may function, and why biotechnology may change the way we view our very selves.

String.Source: Nanotechnology and the Bodies of Tomorrow
String.Dest: Nanotechnology and the Bodies of Tomorrow

String.Source: With the principles of biology now well in hand, this class takes a big-picture view of organisms throughout various ecosystems, tying them together to teach ecological lessons on the interdependencies of all life.
String.Dest: With the principles of biology now well in hand, this class takes a big-picture view of organisms throughout various ecosystems, tying them together to teach ecological lessons on the interdependencies of all life.

String.Source: Using a variety of communications careers as examples, this class looks at the many ways communications affects all of our lives, from the news we consume to the choices we make as consumers and citizens.
String.Dest: Using a variety of communications careers as examples, this class looks at the many ways communications affects all of our lives, from the news we consume to the choices we make as consumers and citizens.

String.Source: As toddlers, we learn to talk, but in this class, new Communications students will learn that the breadth and depth of communication goes way beyond simple speech. This course sets students up for success by introducing many core concepts.
String.Dest: As toddlers, we learn to talk, but in this class, new Communications students will learn that the breadth and depth of communication goes way beyond simple speech. This course sets students up for success by introducing many core concepts.

String.Source: Understanding the ways in which media communicates with its audience - both overtly and in less-obvious subtext - is an important aspect of understanding how cultural ideas are processed in general.
String.Dest: Understanding the ways in which media communicates with its audience - both overtly and in less-obvious subtext - is an important aspect of understanding how cultural ideas are processed in general.

String.Source: Ideas flow from individuals, but also from groups, companies, and media. This class breaks down how cultural ideas are introduced into society, how they take hold, and what lasting effects they may have on the ways in which we communicate.
String.Dest: Ideas flow from individuals, but also from groups, companies, and media. This class breaks down how cultural ideas are introduced into society, how they take hold, and what lasting effects they may have on the ways in which we communicate.

String.Source: Sometimes, journalism doesn't have the luxury of time. This class looks at how to effectively write stories when news is happening at a faster pace than normal, while still maintaining good sources and solid facts.
String.Dest: Sometimes, journalism doesn't have the luxury of time. This class looks at how to effectively write stories when news is happening at a faster pace than normal, while still maintaining good sources and solid facts.

String.Source: A major skill for any aspiring journalist is the ability to find reliable sources and data when writing on any given topic. Students should feel confident in understanding what good sources look like after taking this course.
String.Dest: A major skill for any aspiring journalist is the ability to find reliable sources and data when writing on any given topic. Students should feel confident in understanding what good sources look like after taking this course.

String.Source: Communicating important and complex ideas is hard enough without limits. Is it possible to do a good job when you need to do it in only a sentence or two? This course examines the limits of communication on social media and how to be an effective communicator regardless of the medium.
String.Dest: Communicating important and complex ideas is hard enough without limits. Is it possible to do a good job when you need to do it in only a sentence or two? This course examines the limits of communication on social media and how to be an effective communicator regardless of the medium.

String.Source: Catered Communication: the Limits of Social Media
String.Dest: Catered Communication: the Limits of Social Media

String.Source: What is truth? While no class can answer this easily, this one attempts to teach how to discern what truth looks like on the page, with sections on fact-checking and unconscious bias.
String.Dest: What is truth? While no class can answer this easily, this one attempts to teach how to discern what truth looks like on the page, with sections on fact-checking and unconscious bias.

String.Source: So much writing and reading now happens online, where data is collected at every turn. Students will learn how to use this data to their advantage by learning what readers respond to and how subtle changes to their writing can greatly boost readership.
String.Dest: So much writing and reading now happens online, where data is collected at every turn. Students will learn how to use this data to their advantage by learning what readers respond to and how subtle changes to their writing can greatly boost readership.

String.Source: We are all living in the age of big data and to effectively communicate what is happening in the world around us, we must understand what all this data means. This course uses basic statistics to help students decipher and communicate the meaning behind the data.
String.Dest: We are all living in the age of big data and to effectively communicate what is happening in the world around us, we must understand what all this data means. This course uses basic statistics to help students decipher and communicate the meaning behind the data.

String.Source: Who is actually on the other side of that keyboard? When communicating online, there's always the possibility that it isn't a real person at all, but a bot! Learn how to tell the difference and the ways in which online bots are permanently changing online communication.
String.Dest: Who is actually on the other side of that keyboard? When communicating online, there's always the possibility that it isn't a real person at all, but a bot! Learn how to tell the difference and the ways in which online bots are permanently changing online communication.

String.Source: Virtual Dialogues: a Modern Turing Test
String.Dest: Virtual Dialogues: a Modern Turing Test

String.Source: In a time when communicating with others online means not knowing true identities, how can trust be built? Using what students learned about sourcing data, this course examines the ways in which online communication can make trusting information harder - but not impossible!
String.Dest: In a time when communicating with others online means not knowing true identities, how can trust be built? Using what students learned about sourcing data, this course examines the ways in which online communication can make trusting information harder - but not impossible!

String.Source: Finally, a class where students won't need a compelling opening sentence! Here, the focus is on the efficient communication of established information, and students should leave with the skills needed for writing things like manuals and other instructional pieces of communication.
String.Dest: Finally, a class where students won't need a compelling opening sentence! Here, the focus is on the efficient communication of established information, and students should leave with the skills needed for writing things like manuals and other instructional pieces of communication.

String.Source: Touching on the basics of legal writing, this course is not meant to make students lawyers but rather to allow them to feel comfortable when they encounter legal documents in the future. Often, news stories or contract jobs will require the ability to parse such language.
String.Dest: Touching on the basics of legal writing, this course is not meant to make students lawyers but rather to allow them to feel comfortable when they encounter legal documents in the future. Often, news stories or contract jobs will require the ability to parse such language.

String.Source: In a world where large news stories break on countless platforms simultaneously, the scoop is no longer what it used to be. This course pushes students to look at news, analysis, and other writing about current events from unique angles, finding a story that plays to their writing styles and strengths.
String.Dest: In a world where large news stories break on countless platforms simultaneously, the scoop is no longer what it used to be. This course pushes students to look at news, analysis, and other writing about current events from unique angles, finding a story that plays to their writing styles and strengths.

String.Source: How does an idea change when it is picked up by the mass media? This course looks at how cultural discourse changes at the mass media level, along with how different types of media alter how we perceive the information they give.
String.Dest: How does an idea change when it is picked up by the mass media? This course looks at how cultural discourse changes at the mass media level, along with how different types of media alter how we perceive the information they give.

String.Source: This course uses popular memes as a starting point to examine what can be communicated within a shareable piece of content. Memes often encapsulate a lot of context into a single image and are used here to spark exercises in how to encapsulate complex information in simpler packages.
String.Dest: This course uses popular memes as a starting point to examine what can be communicated within a shareable piece of content. Memes often encapsulate a lot of context into a single image and are used here to spark exercises in how to encapsulate complex information in simpler packages.

String.Source: O RLY? The Power of Memes
String.Dest: O RLY? The Power of Memes

String.Source: This class looks at how individuals have started to act like brands and what this may mean for the ways we all communicate with each other. A section of the class will focus on how the idea of privacy has changed and the norms surrounding what is expected of the way we present ourselves.
String.Dest: This class looks at how individuals have started to act like brands and what this may mean for the ways we all communicate with each other. A section of the class will focus on how the idea of privacy has changed and the norms surrounding what is expected of the way we present ourselves.

String.Source: Personal Brand: Public Privacy in Our Modern Age
String.Dest: Personal Brand: Public Privacy in Our Modern Age

String.Source: The term "free speech" is bandied about a fair bit. This course sets out to define what free speech has historically meant, in what ways it is used now as a rallying call to some, and what the benefits and drawbacks are to platforms that either allow all speech or seek to set rules around it.
String.Dest: The term "free speech" is bandied about a fair bit. This course sets out to define what free speech has historically meant, in what ways it is used now as a rallying call to some, and what the benefits and drawbacks are to platforms that either allow all speech or seek to set rules around it.

String.Source: Say What You Want: What is Free Speech?
String.Dest: Say What You Want: What is Free Speech?

String.Source: In professional or political communication, topics can often be divisive or controversial. This course examines how to meaningfully present ideas when this is the case, and how to avoid the pitfalls of specious arguments.
String.Dest: In professional or political communication, topics can often be divisive or controversial. This course examines how to meaningfully present ideas when this is the case, and how to avoid the pitfalls of specious arguments.

String.Source: How Controversial! Difficult or Divisive Discussions
String.Dest: How Controversial! Difficult or Divisive Discussions

String.Source: Technology has the power nowadays to make some startling suggestions: when to publish a story, what words will interest readers, and even how many words are the ideal length for a piece. This class looks at when to trust the answers an algorithm provides and when to look a bit closer.
String.Dest: Technology has the power nowadays to make some startling suggestions: when to publish a story, what words will interest readers, and even how many words are the ideal length for a piece. This class looks at when to trust the answers an algorithm provides and when to look a bit closer.

String.Source: In collaboration with the history department, this course uses historical movements toward democracy to examine how political writing or grassroots ideas can engage a mass audience and lead to larger movements.
String.Dest: In collaboration with the history department, this course uses historical movements toward democracy to examine how political writing or grassroots ideas can engage a mass audience and lead to larger movements.

String.Source: Vote Yes: the Communication of Democratic Ideas
String.Dest: Vote Yes: the Communication of Democratic Ideas

String.Source: With the rise of machine learning, computers have started to take on tasks once thought impossible. This advanced course examines the future of computers writing and interrogates where machines may excel and where they may lack the necessary nuances that still require a living communicator.
String.Dest: With the rise of machine learning, computers have started to take on tasks once thought impossible. This advanced course examines the future of computers writing and interrogates where machines may excel and where they may lack the necessary nuances that still require a living communicator.

String.Source: Bits and Bots: Machines Learning to Write
String.Dest: Bits and Bots: Machines Learning to Write

String.Source: As communications careers begin to think about click-through-rates and search engine optimization, writing skill alone isn't enough. This course looks at the shifting ways readers now find reading material and what effective communication looks like in such an environment.
String.Dest: As communications careers begin to think about click-through-rates and search engine optimization, writing skill alone isn't enough. This course looks at the shifting ways readers now find reading material and what effective communication looks like in such an environment.

String.Source: To help students succeed in the Computer Science degree program, Programming Principles provides some dos and don'ts that'll mean less frustration and easier debugging in the future.
String.Dest: To help students succeed in the Computer Science degree program, Programming Principles provides some dos and don'ts that'll mean less frustration and easier debugging in the future.

String.Source: The courses here aren't really numbered, but we couldn't help making a computer science joke. 101 - it's binary! Get it? Anyway, welcome to your new life amongst the 1s and 0s.
String.Dest: The courses here aren't really numbered, but we couldn't help making a computer science joke. 101 - it's binary! Get it? Anyway, welcome to your new life amongst the 1s and 0s.

String.Source: The field of computer science isn't only typing code into machines; there is a vast array of fascinating computational ideas that have already changed the way we live and work. This course takes a look at the few of the most important and influential ones.
String.Dest: The field of computer science isn't only typing code into machines; there is a vast array of fascinating computational ideas that have already changed the way we live and work. This course takes a look at the few of the most important and influential ones.

String.Source: At the core of any computer program is an algorithm - a method and process to get good results from lines of code. This course introduces a set of basic algorithms that tackle most of the programming problems students may encounter in the future.
String.Dest: At the core of any computer program is an algorithm - a method and process to get good results from lines of code. This course introduces a set of basic algorithms that tackle most of the programming problems students may encounter in the future.

String.Source: This course explores the uses and misuses of AI and asks students to consider what steps should be taken to ensure that artificial intelligence isn't used for nefarious purposes or to provide technological cover for amoral behavior.
String.Dest: This course explores the uses and misuses of AI and asks students to consider what steps should be taken to ensure that artificial intelligence isn't used for nefarious purposes or to provide technological cover for amoral behavior.

String.Source: As students write more complex problems, the possibility of bad actors finding ways to exploit these programs increases. This course pokes at the programming methods taught so far in an attempt to get students thinking securely.
String.Dest: As students write more complex problems, the possibility of bad actors finding ways to exploit these programs increases. This course pokes at the programming methods taught so far in an attempt to get students thinking securely.

String.Source: Always wanted to try breaking into some secure networks? This class allows students the chance to do just that in a controlled environment, learning about strong security protocols by being on the other side of the firewall.
String.Dest: Always wanted to try breaking into some secure networks? This class allows students the chance to do just that in a controlled environment, learning about strong security protocols by being on the other side of the firewall.

String.Source: This course examines how much of a computer's intelligence is truly artificial and how much is beholden to the programmer. How does a computer learn? What does it mean for a computer to learn?
String.Dest: This course examines how much of a computer's intelligence is truly artificial and how much is beholden to the programmer. How does a computer learn? What does it mean for a computer to learn?

String.Source: Applying the properties of trigonometry, vectors, and matrix math, this class will have students programming a simple robotic arm to learn how to calculate angles and movement in 3-D space.
String.Dest: Applying the properties of trigonometry, vectors, and matrix math, this class will have students programming a simple robotic arm to learn how to calculate angles and movement in 3-D space.

String.Source: As an introduction to programming bots, this course teaches the basics of how to calculate a bot's movement, senses, and reactions based on a combination of math principles.
String.Dest: As an introduction to programming bots, this course teaches the basics of how to calculate a bot's movement, senses, and reactions based on a combination of math principles.

String.Source: After reviewing a brief overview of sensor technology, this course will apply those learnings on real robots by having students run bots through a series of "sight tests," learning methods and strategies to give these mechanical marvels a way to see what is around them.
String.Dest: After reviewing a brief overview of sensor technology, this course will apply those learnings on real robots by having students run bots through a series of "sight tests," learning methods and strategies to give these mechanical marvels a way to see what is around them.

String.Source: To help understand what is easy and hard about bot programming, this class examines common tasks we do and explores what makes certain tasks a great fit for bots while others remain nearly impossible to automate.
String.Dest: To help understand what is easy and hard about bot programming, this class examines common tasks we do and explores what makes certain tasks a great fit for bots while others remain nearly impossible to automate.

String.Source: A large amount of Internet traffic nowadays is dictated by malevolent botnets - large numbers of computers running bad code the owner is completely unaware of. This course looks at ways of identifying botnets and strategies for neutralizing their threats.
String.Dest: A large amount of Internet traffic nowadays is dictated by malevolent botnets - large numbers of computers running bad code the owner is completely unaware of. This course looks at ways of identifying botnets and strategies for neutralizing their threats.

String.Source: Sometimes the greatest security threat isn't even part of the machine, but rather the user sitting in front of it. This course looks at the assumptions and use patterns of vulnerable programs and how to boost their safety by improving the user.
String.Dest: Sometimes the greatest security threat isn't even part of the machine, but rather the user sitting in front of it. This course looks at the assumptions and use patterns of vulnerable programs and how to boost their safety by improving the user.

String.Source: Everything can be faked nowadays; doctored text, photos and videos are growing more commonplace every day. This course looks at the advances in machine learning that have made this possible and pushes student to use the tech in more beneficial ways.
String.Dest: Everything can be faked nowadays; doctored text, photos and videos are growing more commonplace every day. This course looks at the advances in machine learning that have made this possible and pushes student to use the tech in more beneficial ways.

String.Source: Learning to Fake It: Malevolent Machine Learning
String.Dest: Learning to Fake It: Malevolent Machine Learning

String.Source: Do you smell what the network is passing? This class exposes just how much data gets passed on every network and what a malicious network owner may be able to discover.
String.Dest: Do you smell what the network is passing? This class exposes just how much data gets passed on every network and what a malicious network owner may be able to discover.

String.Source: While most problems in computer science may be considered solved, the solutions can often be clunky or inefficient. This class challenges students to go beyond the tried and true algorithms, considering methods outside the box to optimize their programs.
String.Dest: While most problems in computer science may be considered solved, the solutions can often be clunky or inefficient. This class challenges students to go beyond the tried and true algorithms, considering methods outside the box to optimize their programs.

String.Source: In addition to teaching formal mathematical logic, this course applies that logic to system programming to better understand how every action a computer takes can be broken down into simple logic gates.
String.Dest: In addition to teaching formal mathematical logic, this course applies that logic to system programming to better understand how every action a computer takes can be broken down into simple logic gates.

String.Source: What lies in the future of computing? This course not only looks at nascent technological advances but further dives into the theoretical problems that will need to be solved in these new technologies, with some thought experiments that have kept past students thinking for weeks!
String.Dest: What lies in the future of computing? This course not only looks at nascent technological advances but further dives into the theoretical problems that will need to be solved in these new technologies, with some thought experiments that have kept past students thinking for weeks!

String.Source: An advanced theory course, Quantum Computing Theory both hypothesizes what problems may become solvable with quantum computing, but also teaches students how to determine the difficulty of an existing computing problem.
String.Dest: An advanced theory course, Quantum Computing Theory both hypothesizes what problems may become solvable with quantum computing, but also teaches students how to determine the difficulty of an existing computing problem.

String.Source: With access to more advanced bots in this class, students will be able to program bots to perform more complex functions. Teachings will also include the practical balance of work between hardware and software.
String.Dest: With access to more advanced bots in this class, students will be able to program bots to perform more complex functions. Teachings will also include the practical balance of work between hardware and software.

String.Source: Machine learning can sometime feel like a black box - computer scientists see inputs and outputs, but aren't sure how one has turned into the other. This course looks to open that box in an attempt to better understand how to better teach robots.
String.Dest: Machine learning can sometime feel like a black box - computer scientists see inputs and outputs, but aren't sure how one has turned into the other. This course looks to open that box in an attempt to better understand how to better teach robots.

String.Source: Breaking the Black Box: Making Robots Learn
String.Dest: Breaking the Black Box: Making Robots Learn

String.Source: Can robots feel? Can they cry? What does it mean when a robot emulates emotion? Are we all simply robots pretending to feel things anyway? This course pokes at the deep questions on the line between sentience and simulation.
String.Dest: Can robots feel? Can they cry? What does it mean when a robot emulates emotion? Are we all simply robots pretending to feel things anyway? This course pokes at the deep questions on the line between sentience and simulation.

String.Source: Most programs do exactly what you tell them to do. But give automata of different kinds the ability to sense and change and a large enough decision space, and it can really feel like they're doing things on their own.
String.Dest: Most programs do exactly what you tell them to do. But give automata of different kinds the ability to sense and change and a large enough decision space, and it can really feel like they're doing things on their own.

String.Source: No wants to suffer food poisoning, but it may be even worse to be responsible for someone else getting sick off the food you created! This introductory course goes over how to handle raw food safely and steps to take to keep a kitchen clean and sanitary.
String.Dest: No wants to suffer food poisoning, but it may be even worse to be responsible for someone else getting sick off the food you created! This introductory course goes over how to handle raw food safely and steps to take to keep a kitchen clean and sanitary.

String.Source: Basic Food Safety: Don't Get Sick!
String.Dest: Basic Food Safety: Don't Get Sick!

String.Source: Before turning up the heat, it's good to know the tools at your disposal! This introductory course identifies the many utensils and appliances used in a modern kitchen, setting students up for success in the Culinary Arts degree.
String.Dest: Before turning up the heat, it's good to know the tools at your disposal! This introductory course identifies the many utensils and appliances used in a modern kitchen, setting students up for success in the Culinary Arts degree.

String.Source: The flavors we perceive start with our taste buds. What can closely examining these tiny wonders reveal about cooking, food, and the sensations we experience when we eat?
String.Dest: The flavors we perceive start with our taste buds. What can closely examining these tiny wonders reveal about cooking, food, and the sensations we experience when we eat?

String.Source: Best Buds: The Science of Taste
String.Dest: Best Buds: The Science of Taste

String.Source: What makes food taste good? Can you tell the difference between the different flavors in a dish? This course breaks apart individual flavors so students can understand what makes a dish taste unique or familiar.
String.Dest: What makes food taste good? Can you tell the difference between the different flavors in a dish? This course breaks apart individual flavors so students can understand what makes a dish taste unique or familiar.

String.Source: Kind of Chew: Refining the Palate
String.Dest: Kind of Chew: Refining the Palate

String.Source: Treating different cuts of meat as protagonists in their own romantic comedies, this unconventional course takes students on a journey to find each cut a suitable partner, whether it be starch, vegetable, or fruit.
String.Dest: Treating different cuts of meat as protagonists in their own romantic comedies, this unconventional course takes students on a journey to find each cut a suitable partner, whether it be starch, vegetable, or fruit.

String.Source: Different cuts of meat can make for large differences - in preparation, in cooking, and in consumption! This class trains students on how to identify and prepare different cuts of meat successfully.
String.Dest: Different cuts of meat can make for large differences - in preparation, in cooking, and in consumption! This class trains students on how to identify and prepare different cuts of meat successfully.

String.Source: This class takes a tour through flavors as they have risen and fallen in popularity, attempting to identify what has made a flavor capture the public imagination and to predict future flavor trends.
String.Dest: This class takes a tour through flavors as they have risen and fallen in popularity, attempting to identify what has made a flavor capture the public imagination and to predict future flavor trends.

String.Source: The true culinary artist knows that a good sauce can transform anything it is spread, drizzled, or splashed on. After an examination of the myriad sauces that already exist, students will be tasked with concocting their own signature sauce, using some established sauce standards.
String.Dest: The true culinary artist knows that a good sauce can transform anything it is spread, drizzled, or splashed on. After an examination of the myriad sauces that already exist, students will be tasked with concocting their own signature sauce, using some established sauce standards.

String.Source: It's a class all about fish, and how to cook them! From scaling to gutting to deboning, students will leave with a new appreciation for how to prepare seafood and an eagle eye on spotting the differences between commonly served fish.
String.Dest: It's a class all about fish, and how to cook them! From scaling to gutting to deboning, students will leave with a new appreciation for how to prepare seafood and an eagle eye on spotting the differences between commonly served fish.

String.Source: Look past the fins and scales and little tiny legs - there's plenty to learn about how to prepare seafood well. This course covers seafood dishes from the everyday to the extravagant that should whet the appetite of any shellfish fan.
String.Dest: Look past the fins and scales and little tiny legs - there's plenty to learn about how to prepare seafood well. This course covers seafood dishes from the everyday to the extravagant that should whet the appetite of any shellfish fan.

String.Source: Cooking for yourself can be hard enough, but do you have what it takes to run a kitchen? This course prepares students for working in a kitchen where they're not the only chef, whether they're delegating cooking tasks to others or taking orders from a more experienced chef.
String.Dest: Cooking for yourself can be hard enough, but do you have what it takes to run a kitchen? This course prepares students for working in a kitchen where they're not the only chef, whether they're delegating cooking tasks to others or taking orders from a more experienced chef.

String.Source: There's more to being a chef than preparing good food! This course looks at the practical skills and requirements for running a successful restaurant, touching on responsibly sourcing ingredients to some light business planning.
String.Dest: There's more to being a chef than preparing good food! This course looks at the practical skills and requirements for running a successful restaurant, touching on responsibly sourcing ingredients to some light business planning.

String.Source: Following recipes as they travel across borders, this course uses food to teach students about how flavors, ingredients, and cooking methods have traveled with individuals and groups to new places.
String.Dest: Following recipes as they travel across borders, this course uses food to teach students about how flavors, ingredients, and cooking methods have traveled with individuals and groups to new places.

String.Source: Roaming Recipes: Breaking Borders with Food
String.Dest: Roaming Recipes: Breaking Borders with Food

String.Source: Tour the world without ever leaving the classroom, as this class takes students on a whirlwind trip around the world through an examination of 80 dishes from the places near and far, familiar and surprising, similar and startlingly unique.
String.Dest: Tour the world without ever leaving the classroom, as this class takes students on a whirlwind trip around the world through an examination of 80 dishes from the places near and far, familiar and surprising, similar and startlingly unique.

String.Source: Around in the World in 80 Dishes
String.Dest: Around in the World in 80 Dishes

String.Source: Every good chef should understand the scientific properties that cook the food they prepare, and this course provides a look inside the pans and stoves students have been using, teaching about heat transfer and how heat can transform the properties of food cells.
String.Dest: Every good chef should understand the scientific properties that cook the food they prepare, and this course provides a look inside the pans and stoves students have been using, teaching about heat transfer and how heat can transform the properties of food cells.

String.Source: Some may view desserts as the most expendable course, but this course posits that desserts are a place where true culinary artists are given a chance to shine and set themselves apart, training students on some of the most luxurious dishes ever invented.
String.Dest: Some may view desserts as the most expendable course, but this course posits that desserts are a place where true culinary artists are given a chance to shine and set themselves apart, training students on some of the most luxurious dishes ever invented.

String.Source: The frontier of culinary science combines chemical knowledge with the expert techniques of a top chef. This course explores how to combine the art and science of cooking to create inspiring new dishes.
String.Dest: The frontier of culinary science combines chemical knowledge with the expert techniques of a top chef. This course explores how to combine the art and science of cooking to create inspiring new dishes.

String.Source: Students explore the history of spice, studying the discovery, proliferation, farming, and even synthesis of spices as a way of understanding how food impacts global trade and markets.
String.Dest: Students explore the history of spice, studying the discovery, proliferation, farming, and even synthesis of spices as a way of understanding how food impacts global trade and markets.

String.Source: A superbly cooked dish can be undermined by poor presentation. To minimize the chances of that happening, this course gives students guidelines and plenty of practice in creating aesthetically pleasing dishes with a wide variety of food shapes and sizes.
String.Dest: A superbly cooked dish can be undermined by poor presentation. To minimize the chances of that happening, this course gives students guidelines and plenty of practice in creating aesthetically pleasing dishes with a wide variety of food shapes and sizes.

String.Source: Whether in a restaurant or when cooking at home for a dinner party, creating a cohesive and pleasing menu is no easy task. This course looks at how people eat in order to push students to think about what dishes go well together and why.
String.Dest: Whether in a restaurant or when cooking at home for a dinner party, creating a cohesive and pleasing menu is no easy task. This course looks at how people eat in order to push students to think about what dishes go well together and why.

String.Source: There are whole schools on choosing the perfect nectar for a dinner, but this advanced course builds off of students' knowledge of food to provide a broad understanding of pairing the appropriate beverage to a meal, useful in restaurant management or as an impressive dinner party trick.
String.Dest: There are whole schools on choosing the perfect nectar for a dinner, but this advanced course builds off of students' knowledge of food to provide a broad understanding of pairing the appropriate beverage to a meal, useful in restaurant management or as an impressive dinner party trick.

String.Source: Wash It Down: Pairing the Right Drink
String.Dest: Wash It Down: Pairing the Right Drink

String.Source: As every eater is unique, it can be hard to have a single size serving that fits everyone. This course looks at the right proportions that go into making a dish, as well as how to decide ingredient amount to maximize flavor and appeal.
String.Dest: As every eater is unique, it can be hard to have a single size serving that fits everyone. This course looks at the right proportions that go into making a dish, as well as how to decide ingredient amount to maximize flavor and appeal.

String.Source: By unpacking the intersection of culture and cuisine, we can learn a lot about both. This course traces the history of cultures mixing, clashing, and merging through the same events with their food and cuisine.
String.Dest: By unpacking the intersection of culture and cuisine, we can learn a lot about both. This course traces the history of cultures mixing, clashing, and merging through the same events with their food and cuisine.

String.Source: A lot of eating has nothing to do with our mouths. This course explores the ideas of comfort food, how our experiences influence our enjoyment of certain dishes, and how a chef may be able to use these learnings to enhance the presentation of their food.
String.Dest: A lot of eating has nothing to do with our mouths. This course explores the ideas of comfort food, how our experiences influence our enjoyment of certain dishes, and how a chef may be able to use these learnings to enhance the presentation of their food.

String.Source: Big Food: The Psychology of Eating
String.Dest: Big Food: The Psychology of Eating

String.Source: This course guides students through some of the important tragedies and comedies that have graced the stage and screen, tracking their transformation from words on a page to highly-praised performances.
String.Dest: This course guides students through some of the important tragedies and comedies that have graced the stage and screen, tracking their transformation from words on a page to highly-praised performances.

String.Source: Waiting for the Show: Tragedy & Comedy
String.Dest: Waiting for the Show: Tragedy & Comedy

String.Source: As an introduction to the Drama degree, this course has students open up about the storms within themselves, harnessing their emotions to bring out characters that can feel like variants of themselves.
String.Dest: As an introduction to the Drama degree, this course has students open up about the storms within themselves, harnessing their emotions to bring out characters that can feel like variants of themselves.

String.Source: Strip a performer of costumes, props, and lighting design and what have you got? Emotion! Performance! This class looks at the raw power of drama by attempting to examine the very essence of what it means to perform.
String.Dest: Strip a performer of costumes, props, and lighting design and what have you got? Emotion! Performance! This class looks at the raw power of drama by attempting to examine the very essence of what it means to perform.

String.Source: This is an early practical course designed to help students navigate the different unions within the entertainment industry, covering the benefits of being party of an equity or other union, along with their rights working as part of a larger production.
String.Dest: This is an early practical course designed to help students navigate the different unions within the entertainment industry, covering the benefits of being party of an equity or other union, along with their rights working as part of a larger production.

String.Source: A comedian's worst nemesis is often the blank page. This course teaches common strategies and helpful tips for creating original jokes. Students should emerge with the confidence to tackle joke-writing on their own, as well as the basics of comedy routine construction.
String.Dest: A comedian's worst nemesis is often the blank page. This course teaches common strategies and helpful tips for creating original jokes. Students should emerge with the confidence to tackle joke-writing on their own, as well as the basics of comedy routine construction.

String.Source: Every aspiring comedian has a small amount of solid material. This class pushes students into a more uncomfortable scenario: do they have enough fresh stuff to last through a dozen nightclub performances? After this course, students should feel more comfortable doing comedy in a stressful setting.
String.Dest: Every aspiring comedian has a small amount of solid material. This class pushes students into a more uncomfortable scenario: do they have enough fresh stuff to last through a dozen nightclub performances? After this course, students should feel more comfortable doing comedy in a stressful setting.

String.Source: For even the most serious dramatist, there is a bit of a clown on the inside. This course teaches students to harness the humor that lies within all us, whatever form it may take, and infuse their performance and work with it.
String.Dest: For even the most serious dramatist, there is a bit of a clown on the inside. This course teaches students to harness the humor that lies within all us, whatever form it may take, and infuse their performance and work with it.

String.Source: This class explores the age-old question: what is funny? It starts by looking at errors and mistakes, along with the psychology of why we laugh at them, and then tasks students with creating situations, scripts, and jokes that sprout from errors themselves.
String.Dest: This class explores the age-old question: what is funny? It starts by looking at errors and mistakes, along with the psychology of why we laugh at them, and then tasks students with creating situations, scripts, and jokes that sprout from errors themselves.

String.Source: By taking a look at working conditions in a few different performance art industries, this course prepares students for long shoots or marathon streams by building their endurance and providing recommended guidelines on nutrition and physical activity.
String.Dest: By taking a look at working conditions in a few different performance art industries, this course prepares students for long shoots or marathon streams by building their endurance and providing recommended guidelines on nutrition and physical activity.

String.Source: Being a performer can mean more than just emoting on a raised platform! More and more, performers are expected to be ad hoc stage crew as well, lifting, moving, and striking props and set pieces themselves. This class teaches students how to do this safely and efficiently.
String.Dest: Being a performer can mean more than just emoting on a raised platform! More and more, performers are expected to be ad hoc stage crew as well, lifting, moving, and striking props and set pieces themselves. This class teaches students how to do this safely and efficiently.

String.Source: Performance is a layer of the unreal masking the real, and a true performer is able to use this paradox to heighten the experience of both the reality and unreality of the whole thing. This course examines how reality is used in performance and how to infuse any character or story - no matter how unreal - with life.
String.Dest: Performance is a layer of the unreal masking the real, and a true performer is able to use this paradox to heighten the experience of both the reality and unreality of the whole thing. This course examines how reality is used in performance and how to infuse any character or story - no matter how unreal - with life.

String.Source: This course gives students a look inside the costume shop, providing information on how to successfully create interesting costumes and how to properly move and act within a wide variety of outfits of different cuts, fabrics, and flexibilities.
String.Dest: This course gives students a look inside the costume shop, providing information on how to successfully create interesting costumes and how to properly move and act within a wide variety of outfits of different cuts, fabrics, and flexibilities.

String.Source: Making a living as a performer can be a challenge, but this course hopes to teach students how to stay aware and in charge of their personal worth, as well as how their performing charisma can be used to heighten their earning power.
String.Dest: Making a living as a performer can be a challenge, but this course hopes to teach students how to stay aware and in charge of their personal worth, as well as how their performing charisma can be used to heighten their earning power.

String.Source: There can be no success in a performance space without an audience, and this class uses modern data to give students an overview on how to market themselves and the art they present, all while maintaining their dignity and vision.
String.Dest: There can be no success in a performance space without an audience, and this class uses modern data to give students an overview on how to market themselves and the art they present, all while maintaining their dignity and vision.

String.Source: The setting for where a performance takes place can greatly impact how it is received, and in this course students will explore a variety of stages around the world. They'll also learn what they can do cater their performances to particular attributes of the location.
String.Dest: The setting for where a performance takes place can greatly impact how it is received, and in this course students will explore a variety of stages around the world. They'll also learn what they can do cater their performances to particular attributes of the location.

String.Source: All performers, but especially comedians, will eventually encounter a heckler or other disruptive audience member. This class looks at strategies for handling such disruption, as well as ways to constructively include audience members in the fun.
String.Dest: All performers, but especially comedians, will eventually encounter a heckler or other disruptive audience member. This class looks at strategies for handling such disruption, as well as ways to constructively include audience members in the fun.

String.Source: Most audiences come to shows to have a good time, and this course examines ways obvious and subtle to raise the fun at shows, from the importance of pacing to the spectacle of technical razzle dazzle.
String.Dest: Most audiences come to shows to have a good time, and this course examines ways obvious and subtle to raise the fun at shows, from the importance of pacing to the spectacle of technical razzle dazzle.

String.Source: An often unseen proportion of a performer's time is spent editing and honing their craft. This can involve jotting down ideas, editing half-formed bits, or trying slightly different lines with the same meaning. This course tries to find the balance between script and improvisation for students that may never be novelists but should understand the structure of language enough to play with it.
String.Dest: An often unseen proportion of a performer's time is spent editing and honing their craft. This can involve jotting down ideas, editing half-formed bits, or trying slightly different lines with the same meaning. This course tries to find the balance between script and improvisation for students that may never be novelists but should understand the structure of language enough to play with it.

String.Source: Death scenes can be a favorite for many performers, but to truly emulate dying can be a taxing experience. Students are not only given an opportunity to practice, but are also taught how to condition their bodies and minds for these fatal moments.
String.Dest: Death scenes can be a favorite for many performers, but to truly emulate dying can be a taxing experience. Students are not only given an opportunity to practice, but are also taught how to condition their bodies and minds for these fatal moments.

String.Source: A well-stage fight - be it with fists, swords, or something even more exotic - can make the difference between a good production and a great one. This class breaks down the basics of safe stage combat that looks risky, and how to work together to make a staged fight look real.
String.Dest: A well-stage fight - be it with fists, swords, or something even more exotic - can make the difference between a good production and a great one. This class breaks down the basics of safe stage combat that looks risky, and how to work together to make a staged fight look real.

String.Source: Modern comedy performances can be so hyperbolic and absurd that a feeling of normalcy can elevate the art and make it stand out. In this course, students explore what it means to be normal and - perhaps more importantly - to act normal.
String.Dest: Modern comedy performances can be so hyperbolic and absurd that a feeling of normalcy can elevate the art and make it stand out. In this course, students explore what it means to be normal and - perhaps more importantly - to act normal.

String.Source: Using the lives of some of the most famous comedians of the past, this course looks at the dichotomy of a life lived in almost constant public laughter with attempts to keep a private life that is, often, much quieter.
String.Dest: Using the lives of some of the most famous comedians of the past, this course looks at the dichotomy of a life lived in almost constant public laughter with attempts to keep a private life that is, often, much quieter.

String.Source: Many scripts climax in a scene where a performer will need to act angry. When this happens again and again, how is a professional meant to add nuance to their performance? This class unpacks the single emotion into a dozen motivations that students can use to provide their characters with more than just simple anger.
String.Dest: Many scripts climax in a scene where a performer will need to act angry. When this happens again and again, how is a professional meant to add nuance to their performance? This class unpacks the single emotion into a dozen motivations that students can use to provide their characters with more than just simple anger.

String.Source: Dramaturgy is the hidden weapon of advanced performers. By being someone who can give context to the words and the performance, students who are able to develop dramaturgy skills will always be in high demand and give themselves an edge in every aspect of the dramatic process.
String.Dest: Dramaturgy is the hidden weapon of advanced performers. By being someone who can give context to the words and the performance, students who are able to develop dramaturgy skills will always be in high demand and give themselves an edge in every aspect of the dramatic process.

String.Source: This course introduces many economic concepts to students pursuing the degree, giving them overviews of macro and microeconomic ideas with questions meant to help them find economic topics they may wish to explore further.
String.Dest: This course introduces many economic concepts to students pursuing the degree, giving them overviews of macro and microeconomic ideas with questions meant to help them find economic topics they may wish to explore further.

String.Source: Our everyday language is infused with money-based phrases and idioms. This introductory course uses the way we talk about money to explore the many economic aspects of how money influences the way individuals and groups think and make decisions.
String.Dest: Our everyday language is infused with money-based phrases and idioms. This introductory course uses the way we talk about money to explore the many economic aspects of how money influences the way individuals and groups think and make decisions.

String.Source: Making investments is as much about the timing as the actual stock or property being invested in. This course looks at market patterns and the strategies of top investors to explore when the right or wrong time to invest may be.
String.Dest: Making investments is as much about the timing as the actual stock or property being invested in. This course looks at market patterns and the strategies of top investors to explore when the right or wrong time to invest may be.

String.Source: What makes us decide to trust some other person or company with our money? Students explore the ways in which we build the transactional trust often associated with the movement of money and uncover the tricks companies use to get there quickly.
String.Dest: What makes us decide to trust some other person or company with our money? Students explore the ways in which we build the transactional trust often associated with the movement of money and uncover the tricks companies use to get there quickly.

String.Source: Currency is a tricky thing, as it is affected by global economics, national politics, and social perception of its value. This course uses mathematical models to tackle one of the more volatile pieces of the economic puzzle.
String.Dest: Currency is a tricky thing, as it is affected by global economics, national politics, and social perception of its value. This course uses mathematical models to tackle one of the more volatile pieces of the economic puzzle.

String.Source: Students will each be in charge of the economic policies of a fictional nation in this class, learning the basics of macroeconomic issues such as employment, trade policy, and inflation.
String.Dest: Students will each be in charge of the economic policies of a fictional nation in this class, learning the basics of macroeconomic issues such as employment, trade policy, and inflation.

String.Source: A broad-ranging class that explores some of the macroeconomic principles that are dealt with on a global level. Students will explore historical and modern instances of inflation and trade conflicts, then be given a chance to "solve" these problems through the use of economic incentives and punishments.
String.Dest: A broad-ranging class that explores some of the macroeconomic principles that are dealt with on a global level. Students will explore historical and modern instances of inflation and trade conflicts, then be given a chance to "solve" these problems through the use of economic incentives and punishments.

String.Source: This course introduces concepts useful for viewing economic theory as an individual, but then moves to broaden its focus so that most students come out of the class with a stronger ability to make logical economic decisions for themselves.
String.Dest: This course introduces concepts useful for viewing economic theory as an individual, but then moves to broaden its focus so that most students come out of the class with a stronger ability to make logical economic decisions for themselves.

String.Source: Running a business is no small task, as students will discover in this class where they will role-play as small business owners. Through this exercise, students will discover first-hand the many laws, restrictions, and safeguards in place for businesses, along with how to handle some common pitfalls.
String.Dest: Running a business is no small task, as students will discover in this class where they will role-play as small business owners. Through this exercise, students will discover first-hand the many laws, restrictions, and safeguards in place for businesses, along with how to handle some common pitfalls.

String.Source: Everyone hates to waste money but sometimes economics tells us that walking away after an initial spend is the best option. This course, a collaboration with the psychology department, looks at what happens when clear economic logic clashes with gut reactions and feelings.
String.Dest: Everyone hates to waste money but sometimes economics tells us that walking away after an initial spend is the best option. This course, a collaboration with the psychology department, looks at what happens when clear economic logic clashes with gut reactions and feelings.

String.Source: In for a Penny: Handling Sunk Costs
String.Dest: In for a Penny: Handling Sunk Costs

String.Source: While most economic models place or predict values on physical goods, this class takes a look at a more abstract idea - public perception - and asks students to consider its value in economic decision-making.
String.Dest: While most economic models place or predict values on physical goods, this class takes a look at a more abstract idea - public perception - and asks students to consider its value in economic decision-making.

String.Source: Economic study often arrives at conclusions that may seem obvious, but can also feel cold. This course complicates matters by considering the economic cost of engaging in unethical behavior as a business and asks students how to consider these moral motivators in the context of established economic theory.
String.Dest: Economic study often arrives at conclusions that may seem obvious, but can also feel cold. This course complicates matters by considering the economic cost of engaging in unethical behavior as a business and asks students how to consider these moral motivators in the context of established economic theory.

String.Source: For many years, economists did most of their forecasting by hand or by using large spreadsheets with hand-crafted and highly-researched values. With modern technology, is there a benefit to allowing algorithms that learn to be better forecasters without the need for manual intervention?
String.Dest: For many years, economists did most of their forecasting by hand or by using large spreadsheets with hand-crafted and highly-researched values. With modern technology, is there a benefit to allowing algorithms that learn to be better forecasters without the need for manual intervention?

String.Source: In the modern world of cryptocurrency and international accounts, it can be hard to understand what effective money management looks like. This class uses real-life case studies to teach about the many weird ways money now moves.
String.Dest: In the modern world of cryptocurrency and international accounts, it can be hard to understand what effective money management looks like. This class uses real-life case studies to teach about the many weird ways money now moves.

String.Source: Financial models, often the crux of good business analytics, are often very large and very intensive, taking long periods of time to produce results. Thus, any small optimization within these models, as this course teaches, can reap huge benefits over time.
String.Dest: Financial models, often the crux of good business analytics, are often very large and very intensive, taking long periods of time to produce results. Thus, any small optimization within these models, as this course teaches, can reap huge benefits over time.

String.Source: Reading data effectively and being able to form conclusions and predictions is the newest and hottest skill being looked for on the job market. This course aims to give students a leg up by looking at the types of datasets being used and breaking down tips for starting to parse this data.
String.Dest: Reading data effectively and being able to form conclusions and predictions is the newest and hottest skill being looked for on the job market. This course aims to give students a leg up by looking at the types of datasets being used and breaking down tips for starting to parse this data.

String.Source: The right employment and leadership structure can be crucial to a successful business. This class invites some leading managers and executives to talk about how their business structures make for a successful workforce. Students are then tasked with analyzing the strengths and weaknesses of each structure.
String.Dest: The right employment and leadership structure can be crucial to a successful business. This class invites some leading managers and executives to talk about how their business structures make for a successful workforce. Students are then tasked with analyzing the strengths and weaknesses of each structure.

String.Source: By examining the ways demand on large markets increases or decreases and then applying it to marketing efforts by an individual or company, this course teaches practical application of market principles in generating demand for anything, be it a product, brand, or even an individual.
String.Dest: By examining the ways demand on large markets increases or decreases and then applying it to marketing efforts by an individual or company, this course teaches practical application of market principles in generating demand for anything, be it a product, brand, or even an individual.

String.Source: What can the properties of supply and demand teach us about our personal relationships? This course takes economic decision-making and pulls it into the personal sphere, urging students to consider that the way we make our personal decisions may be driven by those very same economic models they've been examining in their degree.
String.Dest: What can the properties of supply and demand teach us about our personal relationships? This course takes economic decision-making and pulls it into the personal sphere, urging students to consider that the way we make our personal decisions may be driven by those very same economic models they've been examining in their degree.

String.Source: At its core, all currency is based on upholding the collective promise that it has inherent worth. What can the way we treat currency teach us about the value of a promise in general? Students examine what makes a promise feel sincere and how to support a promise with social backing.
String.Dest: At its core, all currency is based on upholding the collective promise that it has inherent worth. What can the way we treat currency teach us about the value of a promise in general? Students examine what makes a promise feel sincere and how to support a promise with social backing.

String.Source: Whether in a dialog with an individual, company, or country, negotiations can be an inevitable step in reaching an agreement. This class looks at what it means to compromise and what economic ideas can be used to reach a conclusion where everyone comes out ahead.
