String.Dest: Whether in a dialog with an individual, company, or country, negotiations can be an inevitable step in reaching an agreement. This class looks at what it means to compromise and what economic ideas can be used to reach a conclusion where everyone comes out ahead.

String.Source: So very often, there is an instinct to financially reward based on merit, but is this the right thing to do? This course follows the economic threads of what we believe merit to mean and the consequences that may emerge if those beliefs are strictly adhered to.
String.Dest: So very often, there is an instinct to financially reward based on merit, but is this the right thing to do? This course follows the economic threads of what we believe merit to mean and the consequences that may emerge if those beliefs are strictly adhered to.

String.Source: The difference between a good investor and an economic sage is the ability to distinguish between a solid investment and tomorrow's breakout business. This course looks at how developing good research skills can help decipher this seemingly magical ability to unearth these rare investments.
String.Dest: The difference between a good investor and an economic sage is the ability to distinguish between a solid investment and tomorrow's breakout business. This course looks at how developing good research skills can help decipher this seemingly magical ability to unearth these rare investments.

String.Source: Economists are often - to their chagrin - asked to predict the future. While that particular request may be a futile proposition, economics does show historical cycles that repeat with surprising consistency. This course considers what these past cycles may mean for our economic future.
String.Dest: Economists are often - to their chagrin - asked to predict the future. While that particular request may be a futile proposition, economics does show historical cycles that repeat with surprising consistency. This course considers what these past cycles may mean for our economic future.

String.Source: Method acting trains actors to work “sensorially” and “craft” these things. A “method” actor does their work, and then lets it go. They do NOT stay in character 24/7. This notion is ridiculous. This course offers techniques to make the process achievable and sustainable over time. Students in the class will go over relaxation techniques, sense memory and concentration practices, and helpful advice when embodying your subject.
String.Dest: Method acting trains actors to work “sensorially” and “craft” these things. A “method” actor does their work, and then lets it go. They do NOT stay in character 24/7. This notion is ridiculous. This course offers techniques to make the process achievable and sustainable over time. Students in the class will go over relaxation techniques, sense memory and concentration practices, and helpful advice when embodying your subject.

String.Source: Whether you're searching for a creative outlet, or to hone your craft, this course covers learning and exploring the art of improvisation. String.Dest: In this course, students will learn about most types of plugins currently in the market, how to consider usability to make plugins friendly to adopt and interact with, and how to translate your ideas into usable plugins.

String.Source: Critical thinking can shape our logic and reasoning. Writing can make us aware of gaps in our understanding. Therefore this course focuses on giving outlines to students to be able to maximize their thoughts for arguments or everyday situations. Kids are welcome, ask for schedule.
String.Dest: Critical thinking can shape our logic and reasoning. Writing can make us aware of gaps in our understanding. Therefore this course focuses on giving outlines to students to be able to maximize their thoughts for arguments or everyday situations. Kids are welcome, ask for schedule.

String.Source: A good debate is as good as your best argument. Learn in this course to dissect information to create an outline that will completely overthrow the opposing side. All levels welcome!
String.Dest: A good debate is as good as your best argument. Learn in this course to dissect information to create an outline that will completely overthrow the opposing side. All levels welcome!

String.Source: In this course you will apply principles of robotics to create the servobot of your dreams. Do you want your servos to be smarter or to display emotion as any human? This is the course for you. Science fiction, is not really fiction!
String.Dest: In this course you will apply principles of robotics to create the servobot of your dreams. Do you want your servos to be smarter or to display emotion as any human? This is the course for you. Science fiction, is not really fiction!

String.Source: Are they real? Do they have feelings? Robotics can explore the depths of the thought in terms of other forms of life. In this course, students will learn about how humanoids could be considered sentient lifeforms, as well as robotics techniques to improve humanoid robot building.
String.Dest: Are they real? Do they have feelings? Robotics can explore the depths of the thought in terms of other forms of life. In this course, students will learn about how humanoids could be considered sentient lifeforms, as well as robotics techniques to improve humanoid robot building.

String.Source: Steer, steer, slow! This course covers the advance techniques for maneuvering in space, the final frontier. Students will learn about gravity, and how it matters, as well as how not to carry open liquids on board so your instruments don't suddenly say "I can't do that."
String.Dest: Steer, steer, slow! This course covers the advance techniques for maneuvering in space, the final frontier. Students will learn about gravity, and how it matters, as well as how not to carry open liquids on board so your instruments don't suddenly say "I can't do that."

String.Source: Landing with stabilizing instruments is overrated! This course focuses on the mechanics of landing with instinct and skill to make the perfect landing… always! Requirements: 132103920392 Pilot hours of experience preferred but anybody is welcome!
String.Dest: Landing with stabilizing instruments is overrated! This course focuses on the mechanics of landing with instinct and skill to make the perfect landing… always! Requirements: 132103920392 Pilot hours of experience preferred but anybody is welcome!

String.Source: It is never to soon for holiday songs! No matter how many times your peers say "IT IS NOT PRESENT DAY, STOP IT." In this course, learn sneak techniques to incorporate holiday songs in your everyday life, even without your coworkers noticing. Holiday attire required in order to attend.
String.Dest: It is never to soon for holiday songs! No matter how many times your peers say "IT IS NOT PRESENT DAY, STOP IT." In this course, learn sneak techniques to incorporate holiday songs in your everyday life, even without your coworkers noticing. Holiday attire required in order to attend.

String.Source: Learn to project your voice in one of the most common, but also challenging environments to sing... the shower! With water and heat running, your voice will need to adjust to be able to be heard and appreciated. Learn from expert vocal instructors, the only requirement is to be prepared to interface with an actual shower.
String.Dest: Learn to project your voice in one of the most common, but also challenging environments to sing... the shower! With water and heat running, your voice will need to adjust to be able to be heard and appreciated. Learn from expert vocal instructors, the only requirement is to be prepared to interface with an actual shower.

String.Source: Students in this course will learn what Plasma is made out of, and how to create Plasma Packs. They will learn also what properties in Plasma are the culprit for vampire hunger and how Vampire Sims have researched for other sources of food over the centuries. This course is open for human and vampire Sims alike.
String.Dest: Students in this course will learn what Plasma is made out of, and how to create Plasma Packs. They will learn also what properties in Plasma are the culprit for vampire hunger and how Vampire Sims have researched for other sources of food over the centuries. This course is open for human and vampire Sims alike.

String.Source: Feared and dreaded by Vampires. In this course, we examine the chemistry and biological compositions of garlic and its effects on Vampires through history. Required textbook: Encyclopedia Vampirica I.
String.Dest: Feared and dreaded by Vampires. In this course, we examine the chemistry and biological compositions of garlic and its effects on Vampires through history. Required textbook: Encyclopedia Vampirica I.

String.Source: While you are treating an animal, you need to keep their stress down. Each test or procedure can be stressful. In this course, learn to properly deal with animal stress and helpful tips you can practice to help with this.
String.Dest: While you are treating an animal, you need to keep their stress down. Each test or procedure can be stressful. In this course, learn to properly deal with animal stress and helpful tips you can practice to help with this.

String.Source: This course will focus on techniques to craft Poop Randomizer Treats, Ambrosia Treat, and perfecting the Lubricate Tailwagger Joint procedure. Veterinarians of all levels welcome!
String.Dest: This course will focus on techniques to craft Poop Randomizer Treats, Ambrosia Treat, and perfecting the Lubricate Tailwagger Joint procedure. Veterinarians of all levels welcome!

String.Source: Whether you fancy tactical games or not, tactical decisions in all video game genres exist. This course teaches the basic simple rules for each game genre and how you can identify them in every game you play. All skill levels welcome!
String.Dest: Whether you fancy tactical games or not, tactical decisions in all video game genres exist. This course teaches the basic simple rules for each game genre and how you can identify them in every game you play. All skill levels welcome!

String.Source: The game that started it all! This course takes you through the history of video games using BlicBlock as a foundation for game development fundamentals, and tips and tricks to master the highest score!
String.Dest: The game that started it all! This course takes you through the history of video games using BlicBlock as a foundation for game development fundamentals, and tips and tricks to master the highest score!

String.Source: Country is often associated with guitars, however this course explores the genre through a violin's point of view. Learn how classical components can complement the experience of quintessential country pieces.
String.Dest: Country is often associated with guitars, however this course explores the genre through a violin's point of view. Learn how classical components can complement the experience of quintessential country pieces.

String.Source: In this advanced course for violinists, students will learn the art of expressing themselves through their instrument. Move as one, to convey any emotion and delight anyone who is willing to listen. Violin required to attend!
String.Dest: In this advanced course for violinists, students will learn the art of expressing themselves through their instrument. Move as one, to convey any emotion and delight anyone who is willing to listen. Violin required to attend!

String.Source: Not feeling super flexible? No need to worry. This course will teach the Yoga essentials for every body. Regardless their skill level, students will learn the basic poses to craft routines that will enhance their mind, body, and spirit.
String.Dest: Not feeling super flexible? No need to worry. This course will teach the Yoga essentials for every body. Regardless their skill level, students will learn the basic poses to craft routines that will enhance their mind, body, and spirit.

String.Source: It is said that if you see it, it will come. In this course, our experts will teach you how visualizing your goals, no matter how small they are, will help them come to fruition. You will create a variety of vision boards with different materials. All skill levels welcome, materials are provided.
String.Dest: It is said that if you see it, it will come. In this course, our experts will teach you how visualizing your goals, no matter how small they are, will help them come to fruition. You will create a variety of vision boards with different materials. All skill levels welcome, materials are provided.

String.Source: Sometimes sadness is part of our lives, and writing can help express those feelings. This course focuses on heart wrenching stories that will give readers deep thoughts. Not to worry, they all will have happy endings!
String.Dest: Sometimes sadness is part of our lives, and writing can help express those feelings. This course focuses on heart wrenching stories that will give readers deep thoughts. Not to worry, they all will have happy endings!

String.Source: Who says fiction is actually fiction? Students in this course will learn to tell stories that even them will question if they are writing reality or fiction. Advanced techniques will be taught by special guests that will challenge students to bend the words of reality. All skills welcome to attend.
String.Dest: Who says fiction is actually fiction? Students in this course will learn to tell stories that even them will question if they are writing reality or fiction. Advanced techniques will be taught by special guests that will challenge students to bend the words of reality. All skills welcome to attend.

String.Source: Students will begin with an introductory painting class, giving them an overview of technique, style, and art history to prepare them for creating a large amount of original artwork as they pursue their Fine Art degree.
String.Dest: Students will begin with an introductory painting class, giving them an overview of technique, style, and art history to prepare them for creating a large amount of original artwork as they pursue their Fine Art degree.

String.Source: Fine Art students will begin with a course that covers the basics of brushwork, ensuring that everyone has the necessary skills in the degree to tackle more advance topics later. This course covers technique and style regarding most of popular painting styles in modern times.
String.Dest: Fine Art students will begin with a course that covers the basics of brushwork, ensuring that everyone has the necessary skills in the degree to tackle more advance topics later. This course covers technique and style regarding most of popular painting styles in modern times.

String.Source: With digital art on the rise, this course starts students with traditional painting on canvas, but quickly moves to a virtual space where artists can paint with an infinite number of brush types on canvases as large as the imagination.
String.Dest: With digital art on the rise, this course starts students with traditional painting on canvas, but quickly moves to a virtual space where artists can paint with an infinite number of brush types on canvases as large as the imagination.

String.Source: This course focuses on painting the human form, and will have students exploring their sense of proportion and perspective, along with a careful study of ways to draw limbs, weight, and balance.
String.Dest: This course focuses on painting the human form, and will have students exploring their sense of proportion and perspective, along with a careful study of ways to draw limbs, weight, and balance.

String.Source: This course provides a history of the violin since it was first introduced as an instrument, with details on how its form and creation has evolved. Students will also play musical pieces written for violin throughout its life, from the earliest folk songs to avant-garde modern arrangements.
String.Dest: This course provides a history of the violin since it was first introduced as an instrument, with details on how its form and creation has evolved. Students will also play musical pieces written for violin throughout its life, from the earliest folk songs to avant-garde modern arrangements.

String.Source: With an overview of violin music, starting with the rise of the stringed instrument in the Baroque period, this course aims to teach about the history of the instrument itself along with instruction on how to play a violin like a Baroque master.
String.Dest: With an overview of violin music, starting with the rise of the stringed instrument in the Baroque period, this course aims to teach about the history of the instrument itself along with instruction on how to play a violin like a Baroque master.

String.Source: This introductory music theory class assumes some amount of student knowledge with the violin, using a variety of standard pieces for the instrument to demonstrate concepts in classical music. Students will attempt to pen their own short violin pieces to show what they've learned.
String.Dest: This introductory music theory class assumes some amount of student knowledge with the violin, using a variety of standard pieces for the instrument to demonstrate concepts in classical music. Students will attempt to pen their own short violin pieces to show what they've learned.

String.Source: Violins are sometimes considered the most emotional instrument, and while most music will pull at heartstrings or enflame passions, a song that evokes silliness and playfulness may be the biggest challenge. This course explores ways in which a violin can seem full of frivolity while maintaining its rich musical sounds.
String.Dest: Violins are sometimes considered the most emotional instrument, and while most music will pull at heartstrings or enflame passions, a song that evokes silliness and playfulness may be the biggest challenge. This course explores ways in which a violin can seem full of frivolity while maintaining its rich musical sounds.

String.Source: In a world where everyone walks around with a camera in their pockets, how does the art of photography change? This course looks at the state of photography with modern phones with high-quality embedded cameras, and explores the rise of the selfie and how it relates to our historical fascination with portrait photography.
String.Dest: In a world where everyone walks around with a camera in their pockets, how does the art of photography change? This course looks at the state of photography with modern phones with high-quality embedded cameras, and explores the rise of the selfie and how it relates to our historical fascination with portrait photography.

String.Source: Students will learn the ins and outs of camera settings in this course, allowing them to understand the correct aperture and shutter speed to deliver a stunning photo of any subject at any distance. In previous years, this class was sometimes called "F-Stop in the Name of Art."
String.Dest: Students will learn the ins and outs of camera settings in this course, allowing them to understand the correct aperture and shutter speed to deliver a stunning photo of any subject at any distance. In previous years, this class was sometimes called "F-Stop in the Name of Art."

String.Source: With the majority of photographs being taken digitally nowadays, it's easy to adjust a few pixels through filters, algorithms, or manual retouching. As consumers have become more familiar with different photo styles, learning digital photo enhancement software has become a necessary skill for any budding photographer.
String.Dest: With the majority of photographs being taken digitally nowadays, it's easy to adjust a few pixels through filters, algorithms, or manual retouching. As consumers have become more familiar with different photo styles, learning digital photo enhancement software has become a necessary skill for any budding photographer.

String.Source: Using the Golden Ratio as a starting point, this course has students explore what makes a photo good. Words like "well-framed" or "busy" are sometimes used to judge photos, but what can a photographer do to make the final product work? Lastly, students will discuss whether a photograph needs to be pleasing to the viewer to serve as effective art.
String.Dest: Using the Golden Ratio as a starting point, this course has students explore what makes a photo good. Words like "well-framed" or "busy" are sometimes used to judge photos, but what can a photographer do to make the final product work? Lastly, students will discuss whether a photograph needs to be pleasing to the viewer to serve as effective art.

String.Source: In collaboration with the physics department, this course looks at the specific ways in which stringed musical instruments make sound. Students will explore the basics of how sound travels through space, how our ears and brains interpret sound, and the slip-stick physics of stringed instruments.
String.Dest: In collaboration with the physics department, this course looks at the specific ways in which stringed musical instruments make sound. Students will explore the basics of how sound travels through space, how our ears and brains interpret sound, and the slip-stick physics of stringed instruments.

String.Source: There is a natural musical rhythm that flows through us all. Students will explore their own personal rhythms before receiving instruction on how to best harness that rhythm to play music that may be slower or faster while maintaining their core musicality.
String.Dest: There is a natural musical rhythm that flows through us all. Students will explore their own personal rhythms before receiving instruction on how to best harness that rhythm to play music that may be slower or faster while maintaining their core musicality.

String.Source: Most consider the fiddle and violin to be the same instrument, with the musical genres that instrument plays determining what to call it. This course explores music beyond the classical that is played by the violin, along with an examination of the differences in actual playing method when encountering fiddle music.
String.Dest: Most consider the fiddle and violin to be the same instrument, with the musical genres that instrument plays determining what to call it. This course explores music beyond the classical that is played by the violin, along with an examination of the differences in actual playing method when encountering fiddle music.

String.Source: If students choose to pursue playing as a professional musician, they'll almost certainly be in positions where they need to play as part of a group. Whether as a chamber quartet or in a full symphony, playing the violin changes depending on what part it is meant to play. This course helps students fill roles as soloists and ensemble members, preparing them for wherever their work may take them.
String.Dest: If students choose to pursue playing as a professional musician, they'll almost certainly be in positions where they need to play as part of a group. Whether as a chamber quartet or in a full symphony, playing the violin changes depending on what part it is meant to play. This course helps students fill roles as soloists and ensemble members, preparing them for wherever their work may take them.

String.Source: Taking painting outside of the studio environment, this class looks at the many spaces that public art occupies, as well as teaching students the skills necessary to make art in venues where the artist may have less control and unconventional materials.
String.Dest: Taking painting outside of the studio environment, this class looks at the many spaces that public art occupies, as well as teaching students the skills necessary to make art in venues where the artist may have less control and unconventional materials.

String.Source: This class pushes students out of the studio, giving them the necessary tools to successfully create art outdoors. Despite the unique obstacles to plein air work - changing light and weather, not to mention no stationary models - students may find that some of their most interesting art will emerge as a result!
String.Dest: This class pushes students out of the studio, giving them the necessary tools to successfully create art outdoors. Despite the unique obstacles to plein air work - changing light and weather, not to mention no stationary models - students may find that some of their most interesting art will emerge as a result!

String.Source: Can a well-written program help create new works of art? In collaboration with the Computer Science department, this course teaches artists the basic building blocks of coding and allows them to experiment with using the medium to help create algorithmic artwork that may inspire a painting from their hands.
String.Dest: Can a well-written program help create new works of art? In collaboration with the Computer Science department, this course teaches artists the basic building blocks of coding and allows them to experiment with using the medium to help create algorithmic artwork that may inspire a painting from their hands.

String.Source: So much of what goes into a painting is the context and texture of the painter's life at that moment. Yet, artists deserve privacy and often do not reveal their full intent in anything other the artwork itself. In this course, we examine the connection between art and artist and delve into what - if anything - the artist owes us once their art is public.
String.Dest: So much of what goes into a painting is the context and texture of the painter's life at that moment. Yet, artists deserve privacy and often do not reveal their full intent in anything other the artwork itself. In this course, we examine the connection between art and artist and delve into what - if anything - the artist owes us once their art is public.

String.Source: Stripping the color away from a photograph can place a larger focus on its subject. This course uses black and white photography as a tool to teach students how to find compelling photograph subjects first and worry about color palette second.
String.Dest: Stripping the color away from a photograph can place a larger focus on its subject. This course uses black and white photography as a tool to teach students how to find compelling photograph subjects first and worry about color palette second.

String.Source: As digital photography becomes ever more popular, this class takes a closer look at the differences between digital and film photography. With instruction on the full development process of film, along with some basic scientific background, this class hopes to instill students with a love of a medium that some consider a lost art.
String.Dest: As digital photography becomes ever more popular, this class takes a closer look at the differences between digital and film photography. With instruction on the full development process of film, along with some basic scientific background, this class hopes to instill students with a love of a medium that some consider a lost art.

String.Source: Having now painted a plethora of pieces in different sizes, styles, and expressions, students are taught how to look amongst their work for cohesive themes. This course also gives tips on how to pick pieces for a portfolio that will highlight an artist's distinctive skills and range.
String.Dest: Having now painted a plethora of pieces in different sizes, styles, and expressions, students are taught how to look amongst their work for cohesive themes. This course also gives tips on how to pick pieces for a portfolio that will highlight an artist's distinctive skills and range.

String.Source: With any visual medium, the artist must always pick what colors to work with. While free to pick any palette, this course looks at the ways in which colors relate to each other along with the emotions they are known to evoke. Students should leave with greater color instincts and confidence in their choices.
String.Dest: With any visual medium, the artist must always pick what colors to work with. While free to pick any palette, this course looks at the ways in which colors relate to each other along with the emotions they are known to evoke. Students should leave with greater color instincts and confidence in their choices.

String.Source: Red or Not: Advanced Color Theory
String.Dest: Red or Not: Advanced Color Theory

String.Source: All History students will begin with this introductory course that takes the long view by considering general patterns of historical events. Historical ages will be touched upon and similarities will be teased out in order to give students a sense of how history - as the phrase goes - repeats itself.
String.Dest: All History students will begin with this introductory course that takes the long view by considering general patterns of historical events. Historical ages will be touched upon and similarities will be teased out in order to give students a sense of how history - as the phrase goes - repeats itself.

String.Source: By providing a variety of historical voices speaking from opposite perspectives, this introductory course in the History degree encourages students to consider history not only as an infallible and established set of facts.
String.Dest: By providing a variety of historical voices speaking from opposite perspectives, this introductory course in the History degree encourages students to consider history not only as an infallible and established set of facts.

String.Source: Through an examination of various world leaders, both historical and present-day, this course analyzes how different peoples have formed societies around sets of laws or through the orders given by their leaders. Students will get a chance to see if the rules of a place or people can predict its historical arc and story.
String.Dest: Through an examination of various world leaders, both historical and present-day, this course analyzes how different peoples have formed societies around sets of laws or through the orders given by their leaders. Students will get a chance to see if the rules of a place or people can predict its historical arc and story.

String.Source: There are moments in history that, when viewed in hindsight, become clear inflection points in radical cultural change. This course looks at these moments in detail and traces their ripple effects through history.
String.Dest: There are moments in history that, when viewed in hindsight, become clear inflection points in radical cultural change. This course looks at these moments in detail and traces their ripple effects through history.

String.Source: Communication between distant nations has always been a factor in times of historical peace. What can be learned from some of the highest-stakes long distance relationships the world has ever seen? This class looks at the benefits of being open or secretive with friendly, antagonistic, or frenemy nations.
String.Dest: Communication between distant nations has always been a factor in times of historical peace. What can be learned from some of the highest-stakes long distance relationships the world has ever seen? This class looks at the benefits of being open or secretive with friendly, antagonistic, or frenemy nations.

String.Source: Leaders come in all sorts, each with their own ideas for what power means and what responsibility it comes with. Students will examine the political choices various leaders have made, attempting to understand both why these decisions were made and what the political cost was.
String.Dest: Leaders come in all sorts, each with their own ideas for what power means and what responsibility it comes with. Students will examine the political choices various leaders have made, attempting to understand both why these decisions were made and what the political cost was.

String.Source: The story of history cannot be told without understanding the movement of people around the world. This class encourages students to trace the populations of modern-day locations backwards through time, considering how and when the current inhabitants arrived.
String.Dest: The story of history cannot be told without understanding the movement of people around the world. This class encourages students to trace the populations of modern-day locations backwards through time, considering how and when the current inhabitants arrived.

String.Source: Chronicling the movement of groups of people, this course explores how the desire to colonize has shaped the course of history, providing pathways of movement - both voluntary and otherwise - around the world.
String.Dest: Chronicling the movement of groups of people, this course explores how the desire to colonize has shaped the course of history, providing pathways of movement - both voluntary and otherwise - around the world.

String.Source: It may be tempting to think that the mathematical theories and equations we all know and love have been around forever, but this course traces the origins of common math formulas and looks at how their use has changed history.
String.Dest: It may be tempting to think that the mathematical theories and equations we all know and love have been around forever, but this course traces the origins of common math formulas and looks at how their use has changed history.

String.Source: By studying periods of scientific advancement, students will gain a stronger grasp of how certain science-based accidents, inventions, and revolutions kicked off periods of great cultural and societal change, along with what indicators may forecast future eras of scientific progress.
String.Dest: By studying periods of scientific advancement, students will gain a stronger grasp of how certain science-based accidents, inventions, and revolutions kicked off periods of great cultural and societal change, along with what indicators may forecast future eras of scientific progress.

String.Source: Modern history is divided quite clearly by transformative industrial moments. Students will look at a few important historical inventions in this course, learning both how they revolutionized the idea of work and following their effects all the way to the present moment.
String.Dest: Modern history is divided quite clearly by transformative industrial moments. Students will look at a few important historical inventions in this course, learning both how they revolutionized the idea of work and following their effects all the way to the present moment.

String.Source: Discovering certain raw materials or ways to process those materials into useful applications occurred historically in geographically diverse areas. How did the location and timing for these discoveries affect the course of history? If these discoveries had been made in a different place, under a different kingdom, could the world be fundamentally different?
String.Dest: Discovering certain raw materials or ways to process those materials into useful applications occurred historically in geographically diverse areas. How did the location and timing for these discoveries affect the course of history? If these discoveries had been made in a different place, under a different kingdom, could the world be fundamentally different?

String.Source: Cultures around the world have independently developed systems of belief that were both there as an explanation of complex phenomena and as a comfort for those that needed it. This course looks at these historical ideas, their conflict with scientific advancement, and how they've transformed over time.
String.Dest: Cultures around the world have independently developed systems of belief that were both there as an explanation of complex phenomena and as a comfort for those that needed it. This course looks at these historical ideas, their conflict with scientific advancement, and how they've transformed over time.

String.Source: When founding a new country, one of the largest early challenges is drawing up a constitution to lay out the ground rules. This course examines a number of constitutions across time, having students tease out commonalities and differences, and have a go at writing their own constitution.
String.Dest: When founding a new country, one of the largest early challenges is drawing up a constitution to lay out the ground rules. This course examines a number of constitutions across time, having students tease out commonalities and differences, and have a go at writing their own constitution.

String.Source: Throughout history, as nations expanded - both in terms of population and ambition - they have often used their might or technology to conquer lands and enforce their will on others. This course is about what happens when these imperial ambitions run up against the lives of those already living on those lands.
String.Dest: Throughout history, as nations expanded - both in terms of population and ambition - they have often used their might or technology to conquer lands and enforce their will on others. This course is about what happens when these imperial ambitions run up against the lives of those already living on those lands.

String.Source: While there are a few exceptions, the march of history generally coincides with the advancement and expansion of rights, giving more freedom to more people. This course explores what factors can help speed up this expansion, along with how to avoid historical events that seemed to have slowed or sometimes even reversed such progress.
String.Dest: While there are a few exceptions, the march of history generally coincides with the advancement and expansion of rights, giving more freedom to more people. This course explores what factors can help speed up this expansion, along with how to avoid historical events that seemed to have slowed or sometimes even reversed such progress.

String.Source: Everyone is aware of the big wars, but history is filled with smaller conflicts as well. This class offers a tour of several "forgotten" battles that nevertheless had extraordinary historical consequences.
String.Dest: Everyone is aware of the big wars, but history is filled with smaller conflicts as well. This class offers a tour of several "forgotten" battles that nevertheless had extraordinary historical consequences.

String.Source: This advanced course focuses on the military history of a few large historical conflicts, along with particular battles that either marked an important change in the war or had a surprising result. Students will also look at the modern-day locations of these battlegrounds and consider how the local area has been affected by their persistent proximity to these historical markers.
String.Dest: This advanced course focuses on the military history of a few large historical conflicts, along with particular battles that either marked an important change in the war or had a surprising result. Students will also look at the modern-day locations of these battlegrounds and consider how the local area has been affected by their persistent proximity to these historical markers.

String.Source: With a focused look at the ways in which people lived in medieval times, this course looks at how life functioned without modern necessities, as well as what lessons we can draw from the harsh living conditions for today's problems.
String.Dest: With a focused look at the ways in which people lived in medieval times, this course looks at how life functioned without modern necessities, as well as what lessons we can draw from the harsh living conditions for today's problems.

String.Source: As long as there have been powerful people intent on keeping their power, there have been those that seek to topple the status quo and provide more to the powerless. This course will focus on both the theory and practice of historical revolutions, including how resistance changes based on the context of the power it opposes and what groups typically form the sides of a revolutionary conflict.
String.Dest: As long as there have been powerful people intent on keeping their power, there have been those that seek to topple the status quo and provide more to the powerless. This course will focus on both the theory and practice of historical revolutions, including how resistance changes based on the context of the power it opposes and what groups typically form the sides of a revolutionary conflict.

String.Source: The historical record is vast and, with modern storage and sorting, there is an enormous amount of data about people that sits waiting to be used. This class considers the value of slicing that data in different ways, looking for useful correlations that can help us better understand the patterns of history.
String.Dest: The historical record is vast and, with modern storage and sorting, there is an enormous amount of data about people that sits waiting to be used. This class considers the value of slicing that data in different ways, looking for useful correlations that can help us better understand the patterns of history.

String.Source: Technology moves forward and often seems oblivious to any efforts to slow or corral it. This class looks at this in a historical context, asking whether technology has always seemed this inevitable and exploring the different ways in which machines have influenced history.
String.Dest: Technology moves forward and often seems oblivious to any efforts to slow or corral it. This class looks at this in a historical context, asking whether technology has always seemed this inevitable and exploring the different ways in which machines have influenced history.

String.Source: As people emigrate, settle down, and have children, the demographics of regions around the world constantly shift over time. Students will explore how these demographic changes have historically affected things like societal assumptions, political policies, and cultural traditions.
String.Dest: As people emigrate, settle down, and have children, the demographics of regions around the world constantly shift over time. Students will explore how these demographic changes have historically affected things like societal assumptions, political policies, and cultural traditions.

String.Source: The story of the history of people is one that can be viewed through the lens of resource production and consumption. This class asks students to carefully map out or chart the historical impact of things like the shift from hunting to growing, or the invention and rise of electricity.
String.Dest: The story of the history of people is one that can be viewed through the lens of resource production and consumption. This class asks students to carefully map out or chart the historical impact of things like the shift from hunting to growing, or the invention and rise of electricity.

String.Source: This introductory literature class teaches students some basic strategies for how to break down a piece of literature, investigating its themes, subtext, and use of language to be able to discuss things like the author's intent or cultural worldview.
String.Dest: This introductory literature class teaches students some basic strategies for how to break down a piece of literature, investigating its themes, subtext, and use of language to be able to discuss things like the author's intent or cultural worldview.

String.Source: This initial course in the Language & Literature degree attempts to set students up for success by helping to define what the expectations are, answering questions like: how is success defined in a craft that can feel so personal and solitary? How can we fairly judge and grade something as subjective as writing?
String.Dest: This initial course in the Language & Literature degree attempts to set students up for success by helping to define what the expectations are, answering questions like: how is success defined in a craft that can feel so personal and solitary? How can we fairly judge and grade something as subjective as writing?

String.Source: For aspiring writers, the blank page can sometimes be their greatest foe. This class looks at ways to approach starting a new writing project, and has students workshop prompts, inspiration exercises, and other ways to crack that dreaded writer's block.
String.Dest: For aspiring writers, the blank page can sometimes be their greatest foe. This class looks at ways to approach starting a new writing project, and has students workshop prompts, inspiration exercises, and other ways to crack that dreaded writer's block.

String.Source: Language: what's it all about? This course explores the pride speakers feel about their native language while also breaking apart how the rules of grammar can change the very nature of what kinds of words get to exist from language to language.
String.Dest: Language: what's it all about? This course explores the pride speakers feel about their native language while also breaking apart how the rules of grammar can change the very nature of what kinds of words get to exist from language to language.

String.Source: By examining a wide variety of novels set in real-life locations, this course considers the many effective ways to convey the feeling and details of an environment. Students are then assigned work to bring a setting to life through language of their own.
String.Dest: By examining a wide variety of novels set in real-life locations, this course considers the many effective ways to convey the feeling and details of an environment. Students are then assigned work to bring a setting to life through language of their own.

String.Source: Literature that stands the test of time isn't simply a string of pretty words in a row. There is a force of the story behind it, and with this course, students will analyze the methods and charisma great storytellers use in a variety of literary classics.
String.Dest: Literature that stands the test of time isn't simply a string of pretty words in a row. There is a force of the story behind it, and with this course, students will analyze the methods and charisma great storytellers use in a variety of literary classics.

String.Source: Authors can often draw inspiration from their own lives. This course examines cases where fictional characters may seem like variants on a real-life person, and the ways in which various authors will choose to obfuscate this similarity.
String.Dest: Authors can often draw inspiration from their own lives. This course examines cases where fictional characters may seem like variants on a real-life person, and the ways in which various authors will choose to obfuscate this similarity.

String.Source: One of the most exciting and frustrating things about studying language is that there is never a chance to stand still. Authors regularly invent new words, and any literary work often anchors itself in the linguistic context during which it was created. This course looks at the fluidity with which language evolves and pushes students to explore how they can use this to their advantage.
String.Dest: One of the most exciting and frustrating things about studying language is that there is never a chance to stand still. Authors regularly invent new words, and any literary work often anchors itself in the linguistic context during which it was created. This course looks at the fluidity with which language evolves and pushes students to explore how they can use this to their advantage.

String.Source: Is That Me? Drawing from Life
String.Dest: Is That Me? Drawing from Life

String.Source: When writing about a historical period, or even if only a part of a story takes place during a time that is not one that the author has lived in, the proper research is required in order to have the world, characters, and actions feel authentic to their time. This course teaches the necessary tools and methods for writing outside of one's temporal knowledge.
String.Dest: When writing about a historical period, or even if only a part of a story takes place during a time that is not one that the author has lived in, the proper research is required in order to have the world, characters, and actions feel authentic to their time. This course teaches the necessary tools and methods for writing outside of one's temporal knowledge.

String.Source: Students are often told to "write what they know" but understanding what you know about yourself can be a daunting challenge. This course offers strategies for memoir-writing, which can require more research than expected, not to mention a few awkward conversations with close friends and family.
String.Dest: Students are often told to "write what they know" but understanding what you know about yourself can be a daunting challenge. This course offers strategies for memoir-writing, which can require more research than expected, not to mention a few awkward conversations with close friends and family.

String.Source: So you want to write some science fiction? Good for you! Focusing on one of the most popular fictional genres, this course considers what is needed in order to create a convincing world of tomorrow. When one can't research a place or time that is meant to be more advanced, what methods exist to ensure that the story still feels grounded enough to be satisfying to readers?
String.Dest: So you want to write some science fiction? Good for you! Focusing on one of the most popular fictional genres, this course considers what is needed in order to create a convincing world of tomorrow. When one can't research a place or time that is meant to be more advanced, what methods exist to ensure that the story still feels grounded enough to be satisfying to readers?

String.Source: Every novelist may have their own way of writing a novel, but that doesn't mean there aren't core organizational skills that can help every writer. Students will explore different research methods and tools in this course and come away with strategies for organizing longer pieces of writing.
String.Dest: Every novelist may have their own way of writing a novel, but that doesn't mean there aren't core organizational skills that can help every writer. Students will explore different research methods and tools in this course and come away with strategies for organizing longer pieces of writing.

String.Source: While every artist grows and evolves based on others they're inspired by, there can sometimes be a blurred line between inspiration and plagiarism. This course looks at a few of the more controversial allegations in the literary community, as well as allowing students to explore where inspiration ends and duplication begins.
String.Dest: While every artist grows and evolves based on others they're inspired by, there can sometimes be a blurred line between inspiration and plagiarism. This course looks at a few of the more controversial allegations in the literary community, as well as allowing students to explore where inspiration ends and duplication begins.

String.Source: Whether to an agent, publisher, or just a friend, a piece of writing often needs a good pitch to gather interest. This course looks at the business of selling writing, along with alternatives to the classic publisher relationship.
String.Dest: Whether to an agent, publisher, or just a friend, a piece of writing often needs a good pitch to gather interest. This course looks at the business of selling writing, along with alternatives to the classic publisher relationship.

String.Source: Writing may be one of the few professions where a celebrated, famous author remains an anti-social hermit. This course looks at how social (or not) some famous authors past and present have been, along with an exploration of the types of literature that come from authors of both types.
String.Dest: Writing may be one of the few professions where a celebrated, famous author remains an anti-social hermit. This course looks at how social (or not) some famous authors past and present have been, along with an exploration of the types of literature that come from authors of both types.

String.Source: When a character seems like a stand-in for the author - whether because of their appearance, personality, relationships, or history - what are readers to make of this mixing of fiction and reality? This course examines that thin line and analyzes literature on either side.
String.Dest: When a character seems like a stand-in for the author - whether because of their appearance, personality, relationships, or history - what are readers to make of this mixing of fiction and reality? This course examines that thin line and analyzes literature on either side.

String.Source: By choosing to focus on the punctuation that helps shape the tone and pace with which language is spoken and written, this course both covers a history of punctuation as well as giving students insight into just how hard it can be to convey meaning without the tools punctuation gives us.
String.Dest: By choosing to focus on the punctuation that helps shape the tone and pace with which language is spoken and written, this course both covers a history of punctuation as well as giving students insight into just how hard it can be to convey meaning without the tools punctuation gives us.

String.Source: Many of the most beloved literary works we remember are books that we read as young children. Yet these works are separated, often not considered proper literature at all. This class looks at whether this divide is fair and at what it takes to make a book for young readers a success.
String.Dest: Many of the most beloved literary works we remember are books that we read as young children. Yet these works are separated, often not considered proper literature at all. This class looks at whether this divide is fair and at what it takes to make a book for young readers a success.

String.Source: OMG. Literally. Yeet. One can clench their fists and insist that words, their meanings, and usage be forever frozen, but - as this course will show - it has historically been a losing battle. Students will explore the ways in which language changes and how new words and phrases are invented, spread, and then potentially fall out of usage.
String.Dest: OMG. Literally. Yeet. One can clench their fists and insist that words, their meanings, and usage be forever frozen, but - as this course will show - it has historically been a losing battle. Students will explore the ways in which language changes and how new words and phrases are invented, spread, and then potentially fall out of usage.

String.Source: When it comes to literature, readers often put a lot of emphasis on the ending. Students will read a variety of works with notoriously good or bad endings, focusing on what this judgement of the end does to the rest of the work and exploring why the ending feels so much more critical to our judgements of such literature.
String.Dest: When it comes to literature, readers often put a lot of emphasis on the ending. Students will read a variety of works with notoriously good or bad endings, focusing on what this judgement of the end does to the rest of the work and exploring why the ending feels so much more critical to our judgements of such literature.

String.Source: OMG: the Evolution of Linguistic Style
String.Dest: OMG: the Evolution of Linguistic Style

String.Source: One of the biggest tools language gives us is the ability to understand, disagree, and convince one another of differing viewpoints. This course looks at the history of argument, how to recognize when someone is arguing bad faith, and what successful argument looks like, regardless of subject matter.
String.Dest: One of the biggest tools language gives us is the ability to understand, disagree, and convince one another of differing viewpoints. This course looks at the history of argument, how to recognize when someone is arguing bad faith, and what successful argument looks like, regardless of subject matter.

String.Source: A challenge for all writers is how to imbue their work with a sense of reality. This class looks at the lengths different writers go to when researching for a book, as well as the details that can make a setting or time feel authentic when correct or phony when incorrect.
String.Dest: A challenge for all writers is how to imbue their work with a sense of reality. This class looks at the lengths different writers go to when researching for a book, as well as the details that can make a setting or time feel authentic when correct or phony when incorrect.

String.Source: Where do our stories come from? This course traces many of classic tales back to the days before writing was the norm and considers the power and tradition of oral storytelling. Moving forward from there, students will track how these stories survived until being written down, along with how they can be shown to have influenced most of modern literature.
String.Dest: Where do our stories come from? This course traces many of classic tales back to the days before writing was the norm and considers the power and tradition of oral storytelling. Moving forward from there, students will track how these stories survived until being written down, along with how they can be shown to have influenced most of modern literature.

String.Source: There are a variety of factors that go into whether a piece of literature may be remembered, and this course challenges students to explore them all. How do certain books or authors stand the test of time? What factors lead to the magic of a literary masterpiece?
String.Dest: There are a variety of factors that go into whether a piece of literature may be remembered, and this course challenges students to explore them all. How do certain books or authors stand the test of time? What factors lead to the magic of a literary masterpiece?

String.Source: The Oldest Story in the Book
String.Dest: The Oldest Story in the Book

String.Source: This course serves as an introduction for the Physics degree by teaching how magnetic forces inform our physical world. Students will examines these forces at microscopic levels and follow their effects to mechanical applications in real-life machines.
String.Dest: This course serves as an introduction for the Physics degree by teaching how magnetic forces inform our physical world. Students will examines these forces at microscopic levels and follow their effects to mechanical applications in real-life machines.

String.Source: This introductory course teaches students the basic mechanics of machines both large and small, breaking them down into components, and then breaking those components down into the fundamental properties of physics.
String.Dest: This introductory course teaches students the basic mechanics of machines both large and small, breaking them down into components, and then breaking those components down into the fundamental properties of physics.

String.Source: After examining how objects wear down, erode, or break over time, students will explore methods of fixing these broken objects by understanding the way the broken mechanisms work. Students will consider the benefits and differences between choosing to replace or repair such parts.
String.Dest: After examining how objects wear down, erode, or break over time, students will explore methods of fixing these broken objects by understanding the way the broken mechanisms work. Students will consider the benefits and differences between choosing to replace or repair such parts.

String.Source: Building upon Physics I, this course examines mechanical components once more, but with a focus on how their use may alter their efficacy. Where Physics I often teaches about properties in an ideal environment, this class explains how environments are never ideal and how to deal with such discrepancies.
String.Dest: Building upon Physics I, this course examines mechanical components once more, but with a focus on how their use may alter their efficacy. Where Physics I often teaches about properties in an ideal environment, this class explains how environments are never ideal and how to deal with such discrepancies.

String.Source: Using smaller robots, students will consider the energy requirements that allow these bots to do the tasks they are designed to do, eventually researching and presenting ways to provide the minimum energy required to do the task properly.
String.Dest: Using smaller robots, students will consider the energy requirements that allow these bots to do the tasks they are designed to do, eventually researching and presenting ways to provide the minimum energy required to do the task properly.

String.Source: Electricity powers so many of the things we take for granted nowadays, but how does it actually work? Students will be given a brief overview of the early days of electrical discovery and then delve into the details of how electrons act.
String.Dest: Electricity powers so many of the things we take for granted nowadays, but how does it actually work? Students will be given a brief overview of the early days of electrical discovery and then delve into the details of how electrons act.

String.Source: As more and more information is transmitted digitally, this course goes back to the roots of remote control and electronic communication by teaching students the ins and outs of electric and radio signals.
String.Dest: As more and more information is transmitted digitally, this course goes back to the roots of remote control and electronic communication by teaching students the ins and outs of electric and radio signals.

String.Source: Analog Robotics in a Digital World
String.Dest: Analog Robotics in a Digital World

String.Source: Using small robots, students will break down the mechanics of how things move. They will learn about the laws of motion, as well as encounter real-world problems of dealing with movement from the perspective of the machine itself as opposed to an outside observer.
String.Dest: Using small robots, students will break down the mechanics of how things move. They will learn about the laws of motion, as well as encounter real-world problems of dealing with movement from the perspective of the machine itself as opposed to an outside observer.

String.Source: Zooming into the molecular level, this course provides details about how atoms behave and interact with each other to provide an understanding of what properties hold true throughout the universe. The course also gives an overview of recent learnings from space travel.
String.Dest: Zooming into the molecular level, this course provides details about how atoms behave and interact with each other to provide an understanding of what properties hold true throughout the universe. The course also gives an overview of recent learnings from space travel.

String.Source: With sections on the big bang, historical uses of the sky, and modern space exploration, this course is meant to give students an overview of the variety of ways in which physics is core to our understanding of the universe.
String.Dest: With sections on the big bang, historical uses of the sky, and modern space exploration, this course is meant to give students an overview of the variety of ways in which physics is core to our understanding of the universe.

String.Source: This class takes students on a whirlwind tour of space and time, with a stop for explaining the theory of general relativity and how it can help us understand the ways in which the gravity of large bodies affects our observations of the cosmos.
String.Dest: This class takes students on a whirlwind tour of space and time, with a stop for explaining the theory of general relativity and how it can help us understand the ways in which the gravity of large bodies affects our observations of the cosmos.

String.Source: We are limited in the amount we can learn about the cosmos when observing from the ground. This course looks at what it means to send shuttles and satellites into space, along with how certainties of being on this planet become less certain in other parts of the universe.
String.Dest: We are limited in the amount we can learn about the cosmos when observing from the ground. This course looks at what it means to send shuttles and satellites into space, along with how certainties of being on this planet become less certain in other parts of the universe.

String.Source: Taking stock of robots currently in use out in the wild, this course tasks students with researching the ways in which these robots are able to withstand differing and extreme conditions, along with the physical forces at play in these various environments.
String.Dest: Taking stock of robots currently in use out in the wild, this course tasks students with researching the ways in which these robots are able to withstand differing and extreme conditions, along with the physical forces at play in these various environments.

String.Source: Robots of Land, Sea, and Sky
String.Dest: Robots of Land, Sea, and Sky

String.Source: As robots are sometimes built to do jobs too dangerous for Sims, building robots must take these kinds of conditions into consideration. This course looks at how to use physics knowledge to build bots for the conditions they will be working in, whether it be in the deep sea or out in space.
String.Dest: As robots are sometimes built to do jobs too dangerous for Sims, building robots must take these kinds of conditions into consideration. This course looks at how to use physics knowledge to build bots for the conditions they will be working in, whether it be in the deep sea or out in space.

String.Source: After an overview of the basic properties of electromagnetism, students will explore a number of case-studies of how understanding these forces can help provide creative solutions to real-life problems.
String.Dest: After an overview of the basic properties of electromagnetism, students will explore a number of case-studies of how understanding these forces can help provide creative solutions to real-life problems.

String.Source: By understanding the properties of electromagnetism, students - with a hands-on approach with robotics - will be able to harness natural forces to build things like simple sensors and hoverpods.
String.Dest: By understanding the properties of electromagnetism, students - with a hands-on approach with robotics - will be able to harness natural forces to build things like simple sensors and hoverpods.

String.Source: Starting with a thought experiment - what if a toilet needed to be built on Sixam? - this course breaks down the details of what such a question means in terms of both the astrophysics of the alien planet and the fluid dynamic needs of a toilet.
String.Dest: Starting with a thought experiment - what if a toilet needed to be built on Sixam? - this course breaks down the details of what such a question means in terms of both the astrophysics of the alien planet and the fluid dynamic needs of a toilet.

String.Source: How to Build a Toilet on Sixam
String.Dest: How to Build a Toilet on Sixam

String.Source: Lots of lessons in physics are taught with the assumption that the materials in question are solid. This course looks at what happens when that assumption is false and gives students the equations and extra tools needed to accurately calculate, simulate, and understand the movements of fluids.
String.Dest: Lots of lessons in physics are taught with the assumption that the materials in question are solid. This course looks at what happens when that assumption is false and gives students the equations and extra tools needed to accurately calculate, simulate, and understand the movements of fluids.

String.Source: Series of Tubes: Advanced Fluid Dynamics
String.Dest: Series of Tubes: Advanced Fluid Dynamics

String.Source: Using the classic design of a mousetrap, students will analyze each of the individual components and the properties of physics that allows each of them to work in concert. Students are then tasked with choosing and improving one part in that mousetrap.
String.Dest: Using the classic design of a mousetrap, students will analyze each of the individual components and the properties of physics that allows each of them to work in concert. Students are then tasked with choosing and improving one part in that mousetrap.

String.Source: One of the secrets of the universe is that every super small thing that we imagine in our heads as a dot or particle can actually be seen to act like a wave under the right circumstances. Students will examine the properties of waves, along with experimenting with how treating particles as waves can help us with some otherwise impossible physics conundrums.
String.Dest: One of the secrets of the universe is that every super small thing that we imagine in our heads as a dot or particle can actually be seen to act like a wave under the right circumstances. Students will examine the properties of waves, along with experimenting with how treating particles as waves can help us with some otherwise impossible physics conundrums.

String.Source: An exploration into the subatomic world that surrounds us, this class breaks particles into parts and has students study the latest research into what we do and don't know about this tiny world. Students are then asked to apply this knowledge to understand what happens in the furthest expanses of space.
String.Dest: An exploration into the subatomic world that surrounds us, this class breaks particles into parts and has students study the latest research into what we do and don't know about this tiny world. Students are then asked to apply this knowledge to understand what happens in the furthest expanses of space.

String.Source: As scholars of science, we always feel the urge to push beyond our current limits of knowledge. There is perhaps no greater challenge for physicists than to understand what happens to our studied atomic truths as we approach extreme phenomena - like black holes - or if there exists a different set of physics inside or beyond the black hole itself.
String.Dest: As scholars of science, we always feel the urge to push beyond our current limits of knowledge. There is perhaps no greater challenge for physicists than to understand what happens to our studied atomic truths as we approach extreme phenomena - like black holes - or if there exists a different set of physics inside or beyond the black hole itself.

String.Source: Putting together the many aspects of physics that students have learned, this course teaches how string theory ties together both explained and unexplained phenomena in our universe. Students are then tasked with writing a paper offering possible ways to experimentally show the existence of these strings.
String.Dest: Putting together the many aspects of physics that students have learned, this course teaches how string theory ties together both explained and unexplained phenomena in our universe. Students are then tasked with writing a paper offering possible ways to experimentally show the existence of these strings.

String.Source: While most gravitational calculation on this planet is trivial, one of the central forces of understanding the ways celestial bodies work becomes much more important out in space. This course studies how gravity shaped the current state of the universe and how, when we understand its properties, we can use it for travel or prediction.
String.Dest: While most gravitational calculation on this planet is trivial, one of the central forces of understanding the ways celestial bodies work becomes much more important out in space. This course studies how gravity shaped the current state of the universe and how, when we understand its properties, we can use it for travel or prediction.

String.Source: Orbits and Other Benefits of Gravity
String.Dest: Orbits and Other Benefits of Gravity

String.Source: All students will begin with this Psychology I class, which will provide an education on the roots of this behavior-centered science. Students will trace psychology from early philosophical thought exercises through to modern experimental research.
String.Dest: All students will begin with this Psychology I class, which will provide an education on the roots of this behavior-centered science. Students will trace psychology from early philosophical thought exercises through to modern experimental research.

String.Source: This initial course dives into psychology with a history of how identity and thought have informed our sense of selves since the first psychologist's brain began to think about itself.
String.Dest: This initial course dives into psychology with a history of how identity and thought have informed our sense of selves since the first psychologist's brain began to think about itself.

String.Source: Therefore I Am: Intro to Psychology
String.Dest: Therefore I Am: Intro to Psychology

String.Source: With every new era of brain research, two questions seem to open up for every answer. This course uses a timeline of neuroscience to teach the evolution of knowledge we've gained on the brain and how this research may be used for understanding both most of modern psychology theory and how shortcomings of historical theory.
String.Dest: With every new era of brain research, two questions seem to open up for every answer. This course uses a timeline of neuroscience to teach the evolution of knowledge we've gained on the brain and how this research may be used for understanding both most of modern psychology theory and how shortcomings of historical theory.

String.Source: The Legacy of the Brain: Psychology II
String.Dest: The Legacy of the Brain: Psychology II

String.Source: Students will explore the many ways the world is perceived in this course, and trace those methods of perception to the mental processes that are responsible for translating those perceptions into thoughts and motivations.
String.Dest: Students will explore the many ways the world is perceived in this course, and trace those methods of perception to the mental processes that are responsible for translating those perceptions into thoughts and motivations.

String.Source: This course applies some fairly recent advances in computational complexity into modeling the brain as a programmable, learning machine. Students will map physical regions of the brain to various learning algorithms and will need to handle cases where the biological brain is too mysterious or complex to capture digitally.
String.Dest: This course applies some fairly recent advances in computational complexity into modeling the brain as a programmable, learning machine. Students will map physical regions of the brain to various learning algorithms and will need to handle cases where the biological brain is too mysterious or complex to capture digitally.

String.Source: After a brief overview of basic statistics, this course seeks to examine the all-too-common ways in which statistics can be presented to fool our minds into believing data-backed research that may not be saying exactly what we think it is.
String.Dest: After a brief overview of basic statistics, this course seeks to examine the all-too-common ways in which statistics can be presented to fool our minds into believing data-backed research that may not be saying exactly what we think it is.

String.Source: For students who can't get enough of the biological brain, this course bridges the physical with the psychological by exploring the ways in which physical changes or injuries to the brain may affect decision-making and mental motivation afterwards.
String.Dest: For students who can't get enough of the biological brain, this course bridges the physical with the psychological by exploring the ways in which physical changes or injuries to the brain may affect decision-making and mental motivation afterwards.

String.Source: For students that will be looking to turn their psychological education into a business, this course explores the basics of clinical psychology, along with some studies on recent advancements in patient treatment and mental wellness.
String.Dest: For students that will be looking to turn their psychological education into a business, this course explores the basics of clinical psychology, along with some studies on recent advancements in patient treatment and mental wellness.

String.Source: Have a Seat: Clinical Psychology Basics
String.Dest: Have a Seat: Clinical Psychology Basics

String.Source: Using personality as a strong part of identity, this class examines the ways in which our senses of self affect our view of the world. Certain extreme and archetypal personality types are described and categorized, as students look at the various behaviors attributed to each one, fairly or unfairly as the case may be.
String.Dest: Using personality as a strong part of identity, this class examines the ways in which our senses of self affect our view of the world. Certain extreme and archetypal personality types are described and categorized, as students look at the various behaviors attributed to each one, fairly or unfairly as the case may be.

String.Source: Supported by a number of interesting and exciting in-class experiments using the class as the social group being experimented on, this course provides insight into how our behaviors change and adapt when exposed to group dynamics.
String.Dest: Supported by a number of interesting and exciting in-class experiments using the class as the social group being experimented on, this course provides insight into how our behaviors change and adapt when exposed to group dynamics.

String.Source: With the advent of an always-connected society and social communities that live online, psychological science must evolve to understand how to talk about, diagnose, and build mental wellness in this new era.
String.Dest: With the advent of an always-connected society and social communities that live online, psychological science must evolve to understand how to talk about, diagnose, and build mental wellness in this new era.

String.Source: In addition to providing a motherlode of nonverbal cues and hints as to a person's feelings, body language serves some very important purposes when studying psychology. While others focus on the person exhibiting the body language in question, this course questions those very examiners, asking why they perceive certain signals the way they do.
String.Dest: In addition to providing a motherlode of nonverbal cues and hints as to a person's feelings, body language serves some very important purposes when studying psychology. While others focus on the person exhibiting the body language in question, this course questions those very examiners, asking why they perceive certain signals the way they do.

String.Source: One of the great tools for modern machine learning depends on creating large, complex decision trees. This course examines these computational structures and applies them to decisions we make without machines, analyzing how well these trees model the way our minds actually work.
String.Dest: One of the great tools for modern machine learning depends on creating large, complex decision trees. This course examines these computational structures and applies them to decisions we make without machines, analyzing how well these trees model the way our minds actually work.
